properties.name: A.M.Chumaceiro Bulevar 11, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached 18th century two-storey mansion with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular top end. Two dormers with ditto fronton on both sides of roof. Front façade with moulded arches on ground floor between door and windows. Stone wall fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of typical 18th century inward and outward curved gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Abraham de Veerstraat 12, Punda
properties.characteristics: Former convent with chapel and court-yard. Large complex consisting of two-storey and one-storey wings. Composite floor and roof plan with hipped roofs enclosing a rectangular court-yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a former convent and as an element of the history of Roman Catholicism on Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 10, Punda
properties.characteristics: Large two storey block-shaped structure. Hipped roof parallel to street and topped with finials. Cornice over façades, pilasters on corners. Horizontal band around façades. Short front terrace and walled fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a typical urban two- storey dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape situated on the boundary of the old and new built-up area of Punda.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 11-13, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-story cube-shaped urban dwelling. Concrete- built structure with flat roof. Building structure is similar to adjacent building Ansinghstraat 15-17. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with horizontal course pattern. Doors and windows placed in three vertical axes. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as part of the oldest buildings on the north side of Ansinghstraat and as a typical cube-shaped concrete-built urban dwelling, adapted to the existing older buildings. Specific value as part of a prot

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 14, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-story structure. Slant roof with high end to street. Symmetrically laid out front façade with panelled shutter door and flanking shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of modest housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 15-17, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-story cube-shaped urban dwelling. Concrete- built structure with flat roof. Building structure is similar to adjacent building Ansinghstraat 11-13. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with doors and windows placed in three vertical axes. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical cube-shaped concrete-built urban dwelling adapted to the existing older buildings, while at the same, it is part of the oldest buildings on the north side of Ansinghstraat. Specific value

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 20-22, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey cube-shaped urban dwelling. Gable roof, slant roof over adjoining additional section. Front façade: lay-out with openings in three vertical axes, three- banded cornice with profiled moulding and two full frontage horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a two-storey cube-shaped urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Ansinghstraat 22C, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey urban dwelling. Concrete-built structure designed according to a traditional historical concept. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof. Cornice over all façades. Front façade: central door with sidelights and flanking three-blade shutter windows. Short front terrace with balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a dwelling with a traditional design constructed in concrete. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Klein Curaçao / Old
properties.characteristics: Remnants of old lighthouse on northeast coast of Klein Curaçao dating from the 18th or 19th century. Scattered artefacts on ground surface like construction materials and European ceramics.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value because of the construction materials, other artefacts and remnants of buildings as witnesses of military and commercial activities in the 18th and 19th century on Klein Curaçao. Cultural historical value as oldest lighthouse location pre

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Knip
properties.characteristics: Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of archaeological artefacts and soil structures dating back 1500 to 325 years. Site of approximately two hectares located on steep rocks north of Knipbaai and the beach. Deposits include archaeological materials of pottery, shells, stone, charcoal, crabs, remnants of animal bones as well as tools made of shells, stone and bone, cut ornaments and human graves.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value because of the large amount of artefacts and soil structures, and human graves from the Ceramic Age.

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Midden Seinpost
properties.characteristics: Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of archaeological artefacts and soil structures in various concentrations. Site area approximately 1000 square meters, located on the north slope of hilltop Midden Seinpost. Site includes ruins of military barracks and a foundation for an optical telegraph device dating back to the early 19th century.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value because of the amount and soundness of the artefacts, the soil and the construction elements. Cultural historical value because it refers to military and commercial activities in the 19th century and because it is an example of early long

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Rock paintings Ronde Klip
properties.characteristics: Scattered artefacts on ground surface and rock paintings from the Ceramic Age dating back 1500 to 325 years. Site of approximately 1000 square meters located on the second terrace facing the sea at Ronde Klip. Deposits include archaeological materials of shells, stone and a little pottery debris as well as tools of shells and stone. Large number of prehistoric rock paintings in the system of caves and passages.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value because of the well preserved, undamaged artefacts and rock paintings from the Ceramic Age. Cultural historical value as the location with the largest concentration of rock paintings from the Ceramic Age found on the island so far.

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Rock paintings Ronde Klip
properties.characteristics: Scattered artefacts on ground surface and rock paintings from the Ceramic Age dating back 1500 to 325 years. Site of approximately 1000 square meters located on the second terrace facing the sea at Ronde Klip. Deposits include archaeological materials of shells, stone and a little pottery debris as well as tools of shells and stone. Large number of prehistoric rock paintings in the system of caves and passages.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value because of the undamaged preserved artefacts and rock paintings from the Ceramic Age. Cultural historical value as the location with the largest concentration of rock paintings from the Ceramic Age found on the island so far.

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Roi Rincon alias Bon Pais
properties.characteristics: Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of archaeological artefacts and soil structures dating back 4500 to 1500 years. Site is approximately 1500 square meters and is part of a valley system adjacent to a limestone rock formation north of Souax which includes a settlement, a water catchment area and rock painting sites of the first human beings on the island. Oldest archaeological site on the island.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value because of the soundness of the artefacts and the subsoil structure and as the oldest archaeological location on the island. Cultural historical value as one of the ten preserved large sites identified on Curaçao dating from the Archaic A

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Santa Barbara
properties.characteristics: Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of archaeological artefacts and soil structures in various concentrations dating back 1500 to 325 years. Site area approximately three hectares located on the plains northeast of country estate Santa Barbara. Deposits include archaeological materials of pottery, shells, stone, charcoal, crabs, remnants of animal bones as well as tools made of shells, stone and bone, cut ornaments and a human grave.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value because of the large amount of artefacts and soil structures, and of human graves from the Ceramic Age. Cultural historical value as one of the largest settlements of the seven villages identified on Curaçao dating from the Ceramic Age. S

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Ser'i Kloof
properties.characteristics: Scattered archaeological artefacts on ground surface and ruins of fortifications which include a.o. a set of three battery walls and a powder house dating from early 19th century. Site area approximately 1800 square meters with inland location on the road to Westpunt where the plantations Fontein and Ascension meet. . Deposits include construction and archaeological materials and European pottery.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value as an important source for research of military activities on the island as well as an example of the relation between the defence system and the geography of the island. Cultural historical value as the only known inland battery so far.

properties.name: Archaeological Monument Sint Michielsberg
properties.characteristics: Scattered artefacts on ground surface and subsoil deposits of archaeological artefacts and soil structures dating back 4500 to 1500 years. Site area approximately one hectare stretched from the top to the western slope of Sint Michielsberg. Limestone refuges in the rocks. . Deposits include archaeological materials of shells, stone, charcoal, crabs and remnants of animal bones as well as tools made of shells and stone, and human graves.
properties.monument_value: Scientific value because of the large amount of artefacts, subsoil structure and human graves from the Archaic Age in undisturbed subsoil and as the second oldest archaeological location on the island. Cultural historical value as the largest of the ten p

properties.name: Bajonetstaat 16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey block-shaped corner structure with rectangular floor plan. Hipped roof with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with four windows on first floor and alternating doors and windows on ground floor. Weather mouldings above openings.
properties.monument_value: Value as part of an urban townscape and esthetical value because of the prominent corner situation. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 18-20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Prominent building with out- buildings and walled-in yard. Hipped roof with finials over main structure and lean-to roof over one-storey rear gallery. Heavy cornice and horizontal moulded band over façades. Front façade: door and windows with weather mouldings laid out in five vertical axes, quoins on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical, cultural historical and esthetical value as a prominent monumental building with outbuildings and old trees in large, walled-in yard. Specific value part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 19-23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with workers' dwellings. One continuous lean-to roof. Front façade ranging with the street. Three doors and small windows. Two kitchen sites with chimney at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of modest urban housing with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey urban structure. Gable roof with triangular dormers on both sides of roof. Plain gables with tall window and oculus in moulded star. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front façade: three doors flanked by tall windows. Front balcony. Walled fence with front entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical triangular dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 3-7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure. Low hipped roof. Profiled cornice over all façades. Full frontage horizontal profiled moulding and band between openings of ground and first floor. Typical corner details: curved corner on ground floor changing into rectangular corner on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of typical corner details. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bajonetstraat 9-15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached block of four one-storey structures. One continuous hipped roof. Cornice and full frontage horizontal band above openings. Front façade ranging with the street. Regular lay-out of alternating doors and windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Registers of Monuments

properties.name: Balisteeg 1-3, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small block containing two modest one-storey row-houses, part of a larger housing complex. Gable roof with hipped end on one side. Dwellings are equipped with traditional fogons, ovens, on rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as typical examples of modest low-income traditional 19th century housing equipped with fogons. Cultural historical value as part of the old built-up area of the Penstraat containing a mix of luxuriou
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Balisteeg 13-15-17, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small block containing three modest one-storey row-houses, part of a larger housing complex. One continuous gable roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as typical examples of modest low-income traditional 19th century housing. Cultural historical value as part of the old built-up area of the Penstraat containing a mix of luxurious and modest housing.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments.

properties.name: Balisteeg 5-7-11, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small block containing three modest one-storey row-houses, part of a larger housing complex. One continuous gable roof. Dwellings are equipped with traditional 'fogons', ovens, at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as examples of modest low-income traditional 19th century housing equipped with fogons. Cultural historical value as part of the old built-up area of the Penstraat containing a mix of luxurious and mo
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bargestraat 15 A -17, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Block containing two modest one-storey row-houses. Gable roof with plain funnel-shaped gables. Front façade with plain cornice and two doors and windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as examples of 19th century low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bargestraat 21-27, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Elongated block accommodating four modest one-storey row- houses. One continuous gable roof over main rooms and slant roof over back rooms. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Plain cornice over front and side façades. Shutter door and ditto flanking windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as examples of 19th century low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bargestraat 24-26, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Main block covered with three parallel hipped roofs over sala and front and rear gallery. Rear patio enclosed by two one-storey wings covered by gable roofs. Cornice with dentils and dentate quoins on corners. Front façade with doors and windows laid out in five axes. Front balcony. Tall pillars flanking the entrance gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the balanced façade lay-out and the classicist details. Architectural historical and traditional customs value as a Scharloo- type mansion with a typical floor plan with a sala, front and rear gallery and patio. S

properties.name: Bargestraat 28, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached cube-shaped two-storey structure with rear patio enclosed by two one-storey wings. Hipped roof over main building with cement hips, ridges and finials. Gable roofs over wings. Cornice over facades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade with doors and windows laid out in three axes. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic classicist structure which is emphasized by the quoins at the corners of the building. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bargestraat 29-49, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Elongated block of eleven modest one-storey row-houses. One continuous gable roof over main front rooms and occasional gable roof over back rooms. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Plain cornice over front façade. Shutter door and ditto flanking windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value as examples of 19th century low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bargestraat 3-3A, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey corner building complex. Gable roof over main building Three dormers on both sides of roof. Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular top end and window. Windows on first floor positioned between two full frontage horizontal bands. Consolidated after collapse in 1999.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. typical 18th century inward and outward curved gables. Architectural historical value because of 18th and 19th century building components. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townsca
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bargestraat 34-36, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Gable roof with hipped end at rear side and adjoining slant roof. Front façade laid out in two axes with balcony and first floor terrace supported by fluted double Ionic columns. Side staircase to first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value because of the balanced façade lay-out and the characteristic balcony and the terrace on the first floor. Specific value as part of a row of buildings dating from the 1930's which, despite the diversity in detai

properties.name: Bargestraat 38-40, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Gable roof with hipped end at rear side. Front façade split up in two vertical sections: left section with balcony and terrace supported by fluted double Ionic columns, right section with two-tiered bay windows with three sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value because of the balanced façade lay-out, the characteristic balcony and terrace with double pillars and the bay windows. Specific value as part of a row of buildings dating from the 1930's which, despite the dive

properties.name: Bargestraat 48-50, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Typical barrel-shaped roof over east side and adjoining slant roof over west side of structure. Front façade split up in two vertical sections: left section laid out with windows in two axes, ornamented infill on barrel-shaped gable; right section with slant roof over balcony on first floor. Modelled stonework on ground floor façades. Structural design basically similar to Bargestraat 52-54.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the balanced façade lay-out, the characteristic barrel-shaped roof and the modelled stonework on the ground floor façades. Specific value as part of a row of buildings dating from the 1930's which despite the dive

properties.name: Bargestraat 52-54, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Gable roof over east side and adjoining slant roof over west side of structure. Front façade split up in two vertical sections: left section laid out with four-blade windows and ornamented infill on gable; right section with slant roof over balcony on first floor. Modelled stonework on ground floor façades. Detached cistern at front. Structural design similar to Bargestraat 48-50.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of balanced façade lay-out and gable roof with front overhangs, covered balcony and modelled stonework of different size. Specific value as part of a row of buildings dating from the 1930's which, despite the diversi

properties.name: Bargestraat 53, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Characteristic Scharloo-type mansion with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel hipped roofs over sala, front and rear galleries respectively. Rear addition and side wings enclosing a patio. Entrance with front stairs provided with curved stone openwork balustrades and portico supported by double pillars. Fence with tall pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the balanced façade lay-out with characteristic classicist elements and details. Architectural historical and traditional customs value as a prominent example of a Scharloo-type mansion. Specific value as part of

properties.name: Beau Séjour
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section form U-shaped floor plan around patio with corridors and columns. Rear gallery with gable roof. Patio closed with arched opening and infill with bars. Dormers on hipped ends of roofs on east and west side. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade with portico with fronton and decorated tympanum supported by double columns. Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to yard. Gate with text 'Beau' and 'Séjour' on gate pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and art historical value because of a.o. the typical portico with columns, fronton with decorated tympanum and stairs. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with main building with p

properties.name: Bellevue (Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound)
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Main building of a walled- in corral compound. Composite floor and roof plan with mainly hipped roofs with dormers. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front façade: first floor with symmetrical lay-out, centrally placed dormer with triangular fronton and cheeks, central balcony and door flanked by two, paired, tall windows with semicircular fanlights and mouldings, dentate quoins on corners. Ground floor, marble tablet with inscription 'Ao 1875 N51'. Typical wooden balconies on main and additional structures. Additional two-storey structure with pyramidal roof and former cistern on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and scientific value because of the neo-classicist architecture with characteristics typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical wooden balconies. Architectural historical and loca

properties.name: Belvédère
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey cube-shaped structure. Two hipped roofs with ridges parallel to square. Profiled, heavy cornice topped with low parapet on front and side façades. Front façade symmetrically laid out. Central balcony supported by two double columns forming a portico. Full-frontage terrace and U-shaped block of stairs. Dentate quoins on corners. First floor: door to balcony with two windows on both sides. Ground floor: door with two pairs of coupled windows on both sides, topped with triangular fronton and flanked with columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value as an example of a cube-shaped building with a portico and characteristic classical details. Cultural historical value as the former residence of Governor de Rouville who commissioned the construction in 1864-

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roofs over core area and front gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on front corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows provided with weather mouldings. Short front terrace, fence with pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 34-36, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey U-shaped structure containing two dwellings. Main building and two rear wings covered with hipped roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over façades, plastered dentate quoins on front corners. Front façade with doors and flanking windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional double- family dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 44, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling in side alley. Gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional dwelling with gable roof enclosed by typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 45, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached structure, main building of a corral. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end, oculus and text 'A 1885'. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Front addition and short front terrace. Kitchen and cistern next to rear gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables, dormers, cornices and windows with weather mouldings. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as part of the old corral-structure of this area of Otrobanda and becaus

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 46, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling. Gable roof. Plain19th century funnel-shaped gables with oculus. Front façade with (probably former) central door and flanking windows. Kitchen section with oven chimney at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional dwelling with gable roof enclosed by typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 48, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey corner dwelling with a rectangular and L- shaped block. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with central door and windows, profiled cornice and pilasters on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Three parallel hipped roofs, small hipped roof over kitchen. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Kitchen with chimney. Detached covered cistern in backyard. Fence with square stone pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional medium-sized dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because of cistern in backyard. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Building is part of corral Frederikstraat 102. Front façade with cornice and corner pilasters. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as a building which is part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral- structure typical of this area of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 52-54, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large cube-shaped two-storey corner structure with almost square floor plan. Two parallel hipped roofs of different width. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front and rear façades laid out with openings in one and three vertical axes for the small and large hipped roof sections respectively. Walled-in backyard with pedestrian gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value as a typical example of a large two-storey urban structure containing a number of dwellings. Ditto because of walled-in yard with pedestrian gate. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 6, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-and-a-half storey dwelling covered with a gable roof, gallery covered with a slant roof. Front façade with central panelled shutter door and flanking shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional dwelling with gable roof enclosed by typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Belvédèrestraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roofs over core area and front gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all facades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with central panelled shutter door and flanking shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of such elements as the cornice and the wooden shutter door and shutter windows with weather mouldings. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and gallery typi
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 10, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey dwelling covered with a gable roof. Part of a set of row-houses along sloping Berg Altena. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as part of row-houses in a stepped configuration of dwellings. Ditto as an example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 12-28, Berg Altena.
properties.characteristics: Set of small one-storey row-houses along sloping Berg Altena. Gables of dwellings in a stepped configuration. Front façades with cornice and central door with flanking windows for each unit. Doorsteps to street level.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and town planning value because of the stepped configuration of the dwellings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments.

properties.name: Berg Altena 30-34, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: One-storey corner structure accommodating three small row- houses. Gable roofs enclosed by plain gables. Cornice over facades. Front facades: nr.30, central door with flanking windows, nrs. 32 and 34, two tall windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as part of a complex of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 36, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey dwelling covered with a gable roof and enclosed by a plain funnel-shaped gable. Part of a set of row-houses. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as part of a complex of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 38-40, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Two adjoining small one-storey dwellings covered with one continuous gable roof. Part of a set of row-houses. Front façades with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Small pilaster between units.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 4-6, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Core area and rear gallery, and adjoining one-storey structure both covered with gable roofs enclosed by plain gables.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and rear gallery typical of Curaçao (Berg Altena 4) and as typical examples of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 42, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey corner dwelling covered with a gable roof. Part of a set of row-houses. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Small pilaster on separation with adjoining units.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 44, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached small one-storey dwelling as part of a small block of three dwellings under one gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Steps at door front.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in the Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 46, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey dwelling. Middle of a small block of three dwellings. One continuous gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 48, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey dwelling as part of a small block of three dwellings. One continuous gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Four steps at door front.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 50-52, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Two small adjoining one-storey structures. Gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables in a stepped configuration. Floor plan with core area and rear gallery. Front façades with two doors and window for each unit. No cornices.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and traditional customs value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Town planning and architectural historical value because of its prominent position on the corner of Berg Altena. Specific value as part of a protected mon
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 54, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Detached 19th century dwelling. Typical Scharloo-type floor plan with core area, galleries and side wings enclosing a patio. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Full frontage front terrace with stone benches.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto because of specific details such as the access to the patio through a gate and the stone benches on the front terrace. Specific value as part of a p

properties.name: Berg Altena 58, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey dwelling. Part of a block of three dwellings under one continuous roof. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows. Full frontage horizontal band over façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and front and rear galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 60, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: One-storey middle dwelling of a block of three dwellings under one continuous roof. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and front and rear galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 61, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Large Scharloo-type urban dwelling with fully enclosed rear patio and adjoining structures. Composite roof which consists of a system of hipped roofs. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with central door and flanking windows, pilasters on corners. Full frontage front terrace with low stone walls and stone benches on short ends.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the characteristic floor plan with core area, front and rear gallery, and patio typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the balanced lay- out of façades, terraces with

properties.name: Berg Altena 62, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey dwelling as part of a block of three dwellings under one continuous roof. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Front façade completely altered.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value because of a floor plan with core area and front and rear galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Berg Altena 8, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey corner dwelling. Two gable roofs positioned in line and enclosed by plain funnel-shaped gables. Front façade with cornice and central door with flanking windows for each section.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as part of row-houses in a stepped configuration of dwellings along sloping Berg Altena. Ditto as a typical example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bergstraat 8-14, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Detached structure accommodating four small one-storey row- houses. Two continuous gable roofs in a stepped configuration along sloping Berg Altena. Plain funnel- shaped gables. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Short walled front terrace with entrance opposite front door.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the characteristic floor plan of dwelling nr.14 with core area and rear gallery. Architectural historical value because of the staggered configuration of dwellings and such elements as the
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bitterstraat 30, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three oblong blocks on narrow deep lot positioned almost in line. Hipped roofs connected at short ends. Front block with two-storeys, other blocks one storey. Front and rear roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with shutter window on first floor and door on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical oblong blocks connected at short ends, and the adjoining patio. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bloksteeg 1, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey corner structure covered with a hipped roof. Cornice over façades. Two façades with tall windows laid out in four and five vertical axes respectively. Full-frontage horizontal bands over façades.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the orderly lay- out of façades with the windows positioned in vertical axes, and the full-frontage horizontal bands. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bloksteeg 6, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey 17th/18th-century corner building. Gable roof and two dormers. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end formed by a small triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Two façades with tall windows laid out in two and five vertical axes respectively.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of late-17th / early-18th century funnel-shaped gable and in 18th century characteristic later on added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Boldinghstraat 10, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling built against a block of row-houses Boldinghstraat 12-16. Gable roof with plain gable. Front façade with plain cornice, central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Boldinghstraat 12-16, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached block of three small one-storey row-houses under one continuous gable roof. Front façade with plain cornice and central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as typical examples of modest urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Bonairestraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling with ridge of gable roof parallel to the street Front façade with flat cornice, central door and flanking windows. Short front terrace with concrete fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest dwelling covered with a gable roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Ridge of hipped roof parallel to the street. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over facades. Front façade ranging with street, central shutter door and flanking shutter windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional dwelling covered with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Gable roof with ridge parallel to the street. Gables with shoulders and finials as top decoration. Front façade with profiled cornice, central door and flanking windows. Short front terrace with concrete fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest dwelling covered with a gable roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey dwelling with elevated ground floor. Three parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with door and flanking windows, pilasters on corners. Covered front verandah with double stairs in a symmetrical setting.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because of additional rear building, presumably the former cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental tow

properties.name: Bonairestraat 24-26, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached block containing two small dwellings, each dwelling covered by a hipped roof perpendicular to the street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with door and window for each unit. Fence with pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest double dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 27-33, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached block of four small row-houses positioned perpendicular to the street. One continuous gable roof. Street façade: plain funnel-shaped gable ranging with the street, clamped central door and ditto flanking windows. East façade with three small doors and three windows. Two roof chimneys.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical set of low-income row-houses built under one roof. Ditto because of typical fence columns against the façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Bonairestraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling. Hipped roof parallel to the street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice on front façade only. Front façade with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a small traditional dwelling covered with a hipped roof. Ditto because of the typical additional building. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey dwelling. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Plain, flat cornice over all façades. Front façade ranging with street. Central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a small traditional dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 36, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner building covered with two parallel hipped roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Slant roof over rear gallery. Cornice over façades. Front façade ranging with street. Central door and flanking windows. Roof chimney at rear gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a small traditional dwelling with hipped roof and rear gallery. Ditto because of the oven and the chimney, and the additional building. Specific value as part of a protected mo

properties.name: Bonairestraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling covered with a hipped roof perpendicular to the street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade ranging with street. Central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest dwelling equipped with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Bonairestraat 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached block containing two small dwellings, each dwelling covered with a plain gable roof with ridges perpendicular to the street. Front façade ranging with the street. Door with steps to street for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a modest double dwelling structure covered with gable roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: Bonairestraat 9-11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached block of two small one-storey twin dwellings. Each dwelling covered with a separate hipped roof with cement hips and ridges. Slant roof over rear gallery. Cornice on front façade only. Front façade ranging with the street, central door and flanking windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as two simultaneously built traditional dwellings with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 104, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and finials over rectangular floor plan. Cornice over all façades. Front and side façade laid out in three axes. Windows and doors provided with arched fanlights and mouldings. Full-frontage balcony and horizontal band over front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a characteristic three-storey urban dwelling with typical windows and balcony doors. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 109-111, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof and adjoining slant roof with high end directed to the street. Front façade with central medallion placed between cornice and horizontal band. Central door and flanking windows topped with horizontal band and blind arches. Balcony over full frontage of façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the decorative elements on the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 111A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over two-storey core and lean-to roof over one-storey front gallery. Plain funnel- shaped gables. Front façade: cornice on core and gallery façade, two shutter windows on core façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 115-117, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two parallel gable roofs and transverse ditto roofs. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Oculus in decorated star. Front façade: cornice, three doors flanked with two windows. Full-frontage balcony over façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 19th century funnel-shaped gables with 1862 mark. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 120, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roofs over T- shaped floor plan. Main gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Two front dormers with windows topped by a triangular fronton and moulded rims.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto because of age of building and the typical dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 125-127, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large two-storey detached structure with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan. Heavy cornice over all façades. Front façade with centrally positioned triangular dormer with oculus in star decoration. Central door flanked with two pairs of two sash windows with glass bars. Full-frontage balcony over façade. .
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. characteristic cornice topped with the typical central triangular dormer. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 137-141, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top end. Front façade: cornice, three central doors flanked by two windows. Full- frontage balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 15-17A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Gable roof parallel to street. Front façade with open two- storey arcades topped with a richly ornamented central attic structure with gable roof. Decorated frieze parapets for arcades. Ditto for attic structure flanked with stone openwork parapet.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the 18th century funnel-shaped gables, the later on added two-storey arcades typical of Punda, and the ornate top of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 151-153, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street . Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Heavy cornice continuing round the façades. Pointed gables. Front façade: central door flanked by two windows. Full frontage balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical triangular gable and the heavy cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 155-157, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure made up of a main section and flanking one-and two-storey sections. Main section with gable roof with gable and hipped end perpendicular to street. Gable with full-frontage moulding topped with a semicircular fronton. Balcony and arched leaded fanlights above balcony doors and windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the characteristic and unique architecture supported by a typical ornamentation with contrasting colours. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 163-165, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached block of two adjoining one-storey buildings with two identical street façades. Gable roofs perpendicular to street. Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular gable tops.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because the characteristic inward and outward curved gables. Uniqueness value as the sole known example of rich 18th century gable architecture used for modest structures. Specific value as part of a protected

properties.name: Breedestraat 167-169, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two parallel hipped roofs. Heavy cornice over front and side façades. Pilasters on corners of first floor. Front façade with central panelled shutter door flanked with two tall shutter windows. Central front balcony and wooden side terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. the characteristic wooden side terrace. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 17, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey detached structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over main section and slant roofs over adjoining front and rear galleries. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 17A. Front façade with profiled cornice and dentate quoin on corner, openings with weather mouldings. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of 18th century funnel-shaped gable and dormer with inward and outward curved top. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and front and rear gal

properties.name: Breedestraat 170-172, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel gable roofs over core area and galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century gable ends. Heavy cornice over front and side façade. Typical 19th century architectural details.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the 19th century funnel-shaped gables, the heavy cornice over façades, the weather mouldings of windows and the quoins. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because the floor plan typical of Cura

properties.name: Breedestraat 171-173, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Heavy cornice across front and side façades. Front façade laid out in three axes: shutter windows on second floor and shutter doors on first floor. Full frontage wooden balcony and profiled pilasters on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. of the characteristic balcony typical of Breedestraat, Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 174
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey structure, part of a semi-detached block of two identical structures. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormer with triangular fronton and window on both sides of roof. Plain cornice over front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical dormer. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 176, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small one-storey structure, part of a semi-detached block of two identical structures. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormer with triangular fronton and window on both sides of roof. Plain cornice over front façade. Side entrance gate with pointed gable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical dormer. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 17A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey detached structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over main section and slant roofs over adjoining front and rear galleries. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 17. Front façade with profiled cornice and dentate quoin on corner, openings with weather mouldings. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of 18th century funnel-shaped gable and dormer with inward and outward curved top. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan with core area and front and rear galleri

properties.name: Breedestraat 180-182, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey building as the eastern part of a large detached structure. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward curved gable with arched top. Front façade with five tall shutter windows and wooden front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical 18th century gable, and the wooden balcony. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 183-185, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Gable roof parallel to Breedestraat. Front façade with heavy cornice and three doors with weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Typical one-storey structure of modest architecture with an elongated roof facing the street. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 184-186, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey building as the western part of a large detached structure. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward curved gable with arched top. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical 18th century gable and dormer, and the wooden balcony. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental

properties.name: Breedestraat 187, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roofs at the front side and hipped roofs at the rear side. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century gable tops and half oculus. Front façade: cornice and three tall windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 19th century gables and the composite system of roofs typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 188, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Typical small semi-detached one-storey structure built on narrow and deep lot. Oblong gable roof. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Wide opening with weather moulding on ground floor closed with panelled doors with side lights. Side gate with access to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the typical 19th century gable. Cultural historical value as a building which is part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure typical of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected mon

properties.name: Breedestraat 192 A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure situated on off-street premises. Major building of a corral. Core area with galleries on three sides. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Elevated front terrace. Access from Breedestraat through typical arched alleyway.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan with core area and galleries typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. panelled doors and shutter-windows, front terrace with 'Ysselsteen' pavement and a
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 2, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey corner structure alongside Bloksteeg dating from the18th century. Front gallery added in 19th century. Gable roof with dormers. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Façade lay- out with windows in two vertical axes, full-frontage horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of original 18th century gable with inward and outward curved gable end, and the added 19th century front gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 22, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached 18th century three-storey structure. Gable roof parallel to street. Front façade with two-storey arcades topped with a richly ornamented central attic structure with gable roof. Six-bay arcades supported by belly-shaped columns and closed with shutter windows equipped with fanlights. Decorated frieze parapets for arcades and attic structure.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the later on added front arcades characteristic of Punda, and the ornate top of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 25, Punda
properties.characteristics: Small two-storey structure built against larger adjoining properties. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with semicircular top end . Added front gallery covered with lean-to roof. Two shutter windows in gallery façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the 18th century funnel-shaped gable and the later on added gallery characteristic of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 27, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 29. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade topped with plain gable, windows laid out in two axes. Full-frontage profiled horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the balanced façade lay-out with the windows positioned in vertical axes, and the 18th century mouldings in front and side façades. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 29, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey double structure built against adjoining properties. Forms one structure with Breedestraat 27. Two parallel gable roofs perpendicular to street. Front façade topped with two plain gables, windows laid out in four axes. Profiled horizontal bands over full frontage of façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical façade lay-out and the windows positioned in vertical axes. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 3, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties and forming one structure with Breedestraat 5-7. Gable roof parallel to street. Four dormers on front side of roof. Front façade with two-storey open arcades topped by two frontons with moulded rim and ornamented infill with medallion. Eight-bay arcades supported by belly-shaped columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. in later period added front gallery characteristic of Punda, and the typical arcade topped with triangular frontons. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 33, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey semi-detached structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with plain 19th century top end. Façade with windows laid out in two axes. Windows with moulded frame. Full- frontage horizontal bands over façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical façade lay-out with the windows positioned in vertical axes, and the horizontal bands over the full frontage of the facades. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 34-38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof and dormers over main section and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade with heavy cornice and windows placed in five axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the gables and dormers with 19th century top ends, the profiled cornice and the shutter windows. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the typical floor plan with core area and front an
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 37, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Hipped roof with ridge perpendicular to street. Front façade: typical fronton at top with inward and outward curved, moulded rim and medallion with mark '1900'. Three windows flanked with pilasters and set between two horizontal full-frontage bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical fronton with inward and outward curved moulding and oval medallion, and the windows flanked by pilasters. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 42, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof with funnel-shaped gable topped with triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Year mark on gable: '1742'. Front façade: added front gallery. Top of gallery features moulding and horizontal bands over full frontage of façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the typical 18th century funnel-shaped gable and the later on added front gallery characteristic of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 44, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormer with slant roof and square window.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of typical floor plan with core area and front gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 44, Punda
properties.characteristics: Large two-storey cube-shaped structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Profiled projecting cornice with dentils over façades. Front façade with triangular fronton. Three windows laid out between fluted Corinthian pilasters. Façade richly ornamented with elements referring to the classicist period.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the orderly façade lay-out and the neo-classicist ornamentation, such as the cornice continuing round the façades, and the pilasters and fronton of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumenta

properties.name: Breedestraat 48, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Full frontage horizontal band over front façade. Forms one large structure with Breedestraat 46.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the typical floor plan with core area and front gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 5-7, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure forming one structure with Breedestraat 3. Gable roof parallel to street. Two dormers on front side of roof. Front façade with two-storey arcades topped by a fronton with moulded rims and ornamented infill with medallion. Four-bay arcades supported by belly-shaped columns and closed with shutter windows with fanlights.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. in later period added front gallery characteristic of Punda, and the 18th century funnel-shaped gables at the backside. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 56-58, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure with patio enclosed by side wings. Main roof with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roofs over main building and wings. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice and pilasters on corners. Front façade with a central pair of doors with balcony and two flanking pairs of windows. Doors and windows with arched fanlights and ditto mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic doors and windows on the first floor. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 72, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Gable roof with ridge parallel to street. Front façade with cornice and two windows.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 74, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Two in line positioned hipped roofs. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with two square windows.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 75, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof with two dormers on both sides of roof, slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade with a typical central addition flanked with balconies above one-storey front gallery. Addition topped with triangular fronton, dentate quoins on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the typical addition featuring characteristic details from the late-19th century. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan with core and front gallery typical of
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 77-79, Otrobanda
