properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Roof with hipped and gable end over rectangular floor plan. One central and three side dormers. Front façade: profiled cornice, central doors with balcony flanked with tall windows. Side façade with four windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 8, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: funnel- shaped gable with 19th century top end. Façade lay-out with windows in three vertical axes, full-frontage horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the balanced façade lay-out with the windows positioned in vertical axes, and the horizontal bands over the full frontage of the façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 80-82, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. T-shaped gable roof with dormers over rectangular floor plan. Adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Truncated gables. Heavy profiled cornice, dentate coins on corners. Front façade: first floor with sash windows with glass bars laid out in five axes, two dormers with truncated triangular field.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables, the arcade on the west façade and the characteristic addition on the north side. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 81, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over front gallery. Two front dormers with triangular fronton. Inward and outward curved gables with arched top.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of 18th century gable and the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Breedestraat 83-85, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof and dormers over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Front façade: cornice with drapery ornamentation, three shutter windows with fanlights on first floor, full-frontage horizontal bands over façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of typical drapery ornamentation and horizontal bands across full frontage of façade. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao, and the remnan
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 87, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof over elongated floor plan. Front façade: cornice and horizontal bands across full frontage of façade. Façade laid out in three axes with shutter windows on first and second floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical cornice and horizontal bands on façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 9-11, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three storey semi-detached structure with gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade with triangular fronton above heavy cornice. Façade with sash windows with glass bars laid-out in two axes. Full-frontage horizontal bands, corner pilasters.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the orderly façade lay-out and the arrangement of windows, full- frontage bands and corner pilasters. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Breedestraat 95-97, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Richly ornamented structure. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Front façade with profiled cornice and triangular fronton with dentils. Oculus in fronton. Façade laid out in three axes: second floor with tall shutter windows, first floor with doors with semicircular fanlights and weather mouldings opening to full-frontage balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the typical late- 19th century architecture and ornamentation. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Brionplein 9 / Consciëntiesteeg 1
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in two axes: windows on second floor and doors with full-frontage balcony on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as one of the few remaining structures of the old buildings of Brionplein. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Altered in last quarter of 19th century

properties.name: Brionweg 120
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure covered with two parallel hipped roffs and a slant roof over rear gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front facade\\\" cornice and pilasters on corners, central panelled shutter door flanked with two windows. Weather mouldings above door and windows. Small elevated terrace at front, gate at side entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a sound and well preserved traditional stone built dwelling with hiped roofs and a rear gallery. Ditto because of the gate. Specific value as part of a protected monumental tow
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th/first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Brionweg 129, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with L-shaped floor plan and ditto hipped roof with narrow rear gallery under a slant roof. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Façades with cornice and weather mouldings above door and windows. Front façade with central panelled shutter door and shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional stone corner dwelling with a deviating floor plan and roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Brionweg 20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to alley. Hipped roof and adjoining slant roof at rear side. Front façade with cornice and central door flanked by two windows. Short front terrace and stone wall fence.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Brionweg 21-23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey dwelling with ridge parallel to street. Originally covered with two parallel hipped roofs. Façade with cornice and corner pilasters on a base, and weather mouldings above door and windows. Small detached addition with hipped roof at rear side (nr. 21).
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional stone dwelling and outhouse with hipped roofs. Ditto because of mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: Brionweg 50-58, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey assembly of building blocks with a composite floor and roof plan: two- and three-storey structures covered with hipped roofs. Detached one-storey addition and a patio. Front façade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and door with flanking windows on ground floor. Cistern and external chimney on premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a stone-built urban dwelling with a composite building and roof structure. Ditto because of mouldings and external chimney structures. Ditto because of the outhouse. Specific v

properties.name: Brionweg 89-103, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached block containing eight small one-storey row- houses situated off Brionweg. One continuous gable roof. Block accommodates four pairs of dwellings enclosed by staggered gables due to sloping terrain.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of low-cost housing with gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Carhagenastraat 2-12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached block accommodating six small one-storey row- houses. One continuous roof with hipped ends. Tiny flat cornice, regularly spaced roof tiles as rain gutters. Central door and flanking windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as a typical example of low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Casa Cesar
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof and dormers over main section and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Front façade: plain cornice and two windows set between two full- frontage horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the typical floor plan with core area and front and rear galleries. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Casa Cuna
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, lean-to roof over front gallery and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end, oculus and window. Front façade with central panelled shutter door and four flanking shutter windows placed between plain columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and traditional customs value because of typical floor plan with core area and front and rear gallery, and such details as funnel-shaped gables, the typical front gallery columns and the central stairs. Landmark situation and spec
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Casa Nena
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof and adjoining slant roof on east side. Front façade: profiled cornice and three doors with balcony flanked with two tall windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the typical floor plan with core area and gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Casablanca
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey monumental structure set back from street. Main building of corral originally fully surrounded by additional buildings at edges of corral. U- shaped floor plan enclosing a patio. Two parallel hipped roofs over front section, gable roofs over rear wings. Heavy profiled and fully decorated projecting cornice on consoles over façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in seven axes. Central section with triangular fronton above cornice; front balcony above portico with double columns on front platform with steps. Front fence with footing wall and bars set between pillars. Central front gate between fluted pillars, two additional gates on both sides. Fully restored as Civil Registry (restoration awarded with Carfibbean prize for best restoration architecture).
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical set-up of the front façade with central section in particular and the monumental character of structure and fence. Cultural historical value as the main building of one of the few existing exa
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Cerro Bonito
properties.characteristics: Large two-storey mansion in setback position and ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with finials. Dormers on all hipped ends. Cornice / entablature and heavy horizontal band halfway façade height continuing over all façades. Front façade laid out in seven axes with windows on first floor and central door and windows on ground floor. Front terrace with balustrade and central stairs to front yard. Rear additions: two cisterns laid out as side wings connected with aqueducts to main structure.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a large two-storey urban mansion. Cultural historical value as mansion commissioned by S.E.L. Maduro, founder of the Maduro enterprise. Architectural historical value because of the n

properties.name: Charlottestraat 1-5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-and-a-half storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over adjoining two-storey east gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables marked with year of construction. External oven and chimney. Front façade ranging with the street, six tall windows on first floor and three alternating doors and windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a large two-storey urban dwelling. Ditto because of funnel-shaped gables marked with the year of construction and the typical external oven. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townsca

properties.name: Charlottestraat 6, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Main section covered with hipped roof, central front addition under gable roof. Plain cornice over façades. Front fence with stone footing and wooden bars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an urban dwelling with hipped roof and typical front addition. Ditto because of doors and windows open to inside space. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Charlottestraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. Original roof replaced by flat roof. Façades with plain profiled cornice. Moulded rectangle with diamond shape above doors in front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a small urban dwelling. Ditto because of typical decoration above doors. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape

properties.name: Columbusstraat 15, Punda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure with ridges perpendicular to street. Two gable roofs and dormers with truncated funnel-shaped gable. Heavy profiled cornice along three façades. Corner pilasters of piled blocks. Regularly spaced windows with weather mouldings on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because a.o. the truncated funnel-shaped gable, the heavy profiled cornice and the typical pilasters. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape

properties.name: Concordiastraat 5, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey dwelling. Composite floor plan. Cantilevered hipped roofs of different height. Concrete flat roof over front terrace. Shutter windows with top and bottom mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the location in a quarter established in one period showing a typical harmony in its architecture. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a carefully designed sound concrete dwelli

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 24-26, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Gable roofs over core area and rear gallery, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with triangular fronton and plain 19th century top ends. Front façade with doors and windows placed in three vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 28-32, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade with cornice, four shutter windows on firs floor and full- frontage horizontal band.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 33-35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof over main building. Gable roof over additional building made up of a loggia above a former cistern. Stone staircase connects loggia with garden. Façades with regularly spaced tall windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the loggia with open arches. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 35A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with dormers over rectangular floor plan. Heavy profiled cornice with rounded corners. Dormers and windows equipped with a triangular fronton supported by two pilasters. Windows on first floor with moulded frames and triangular moulded frontons. Horizontal band over façades.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the combination of characteristic ornamental elements not found anywhere on Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge parallel to alley. One-and-a-half storey core area covered with a gable roof and front gallery with slant roof. Front dormer. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 40-42A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof over core area and slant roofs over two-storey front and rear gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Inward and outward curved gables with classical moulding and arched top end. Front façade has six tall shutter windows and full-frontage mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the fine 18th century gables and full-frontage mouldings. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected m

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 44, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey cube-shaped structure with flat roof set back from building line. Around façades continuing cornice above short pilasters which rest on moulding. Above cornice slightly set back parapet.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 44A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Gables enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Oculus within star-shaped plasterwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the prominent corner position. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 46, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end at east side. Front façade with heavy profiled cornice.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the prominent corner position. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 61, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi detached corner structure with ridge parallel to alley. Two adjoining main buildings. Front building: two parallel gable roofs and adjoining slant roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with triangular frontons as top ends. Rear building: three hipped roofs. Continuing cornice around façades and tablet on front façade carrying year 1849.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of prominent corner position. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 63, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to alley. Hipped roof. Front façade with plain cornice, panelled shutter door and shutter window.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 65-67, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Three gable roofs parallel to the alleyway. Gables with a truncated top end and knob ornament. Front façade with full frontage cornice and horizontal bands. Side entrance gate with similar gable as main building.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 69, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey corner structure. Two parallel gable roofs with dormers and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Gable roofs on side of alleyway enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Front façade with central door and flanking shutter windows with tunnel-shaped weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical 19th century Curaçao funnel-shaped gables. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental tow
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 71-73, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with plain 19th century top end. Front façade laid out in three axes: three tall windows on first floor and a central door with flanking windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables and the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 72, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure covered with hipped roof. Ridge perpendicular to alley. Cornice and full frontage horizontal bands on front and side façade. Front façade laid out in two axes: two tall windows on first floor and a door and window on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 74, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. Gable roof enclosed by plain gables with truncated top end. Entrance door and windows provided with plain weather mouldings. Tablet in front façade with year 1854.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 76-78, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Two parallel gable roofs enclosed by plain funnel-shaped gables. Heavy cornice. Front façade laid out in three axes: three tall windows on first floor and a central door with flanking windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 77-81, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Corner structure with composite façade lay-out. Two-storey main building covered with gable roof with four dormers and double inward and outward curved gable with year of construction Ao 1788. Two-storey addition with slightly set back wooden structure on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic18th century gable with date of construction and the typical 18th century dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Consciëntiesteeg 80-82, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof and dormers over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Front façade laid out in four axes: four shutter windows on first floor and two pairs of an entrance door and window on the ground floor suggesting a double dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic gables and the dormers dating from the first half of the 19th century. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Cornelis Dirksweg 2, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two adjoining small buildings. Front structure: hipped roof, cornice and pilasters on corners . Rear structure: gable roof over core area and slant roof over rear gallery enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic mixture of building blocks and the 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan typical of Curaçao
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Curaçaostraat 12-20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure accommodating five small dwellings. Oblong hipped roof with ridge perpendicular to the street. Front part is structurally similar to Curacaostraat 22, and apparently built simultaneously. Front façade: small cornice, central door and flanking windows. Doorstep platform with steps to street. Gate in wall with low gable top between the two dwellings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a complex of two adjoining basically similar structures with typical central gate access to the premises. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Curaçaostraat 22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof with ridge perpendicular to the street. Structurally similar to Curacaostraat 20, and apparently built simultaneously. Front façade: small cornice, central door and flanking windows. Doorstep platform with steps to street. Gate in wall with low gable top between the two dwellings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic historic urban dwelling as part of an adjoining twin structure. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Curaçaostraat 23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Building blocks of different size covered with a composite set of hipped roofs and a tent roof. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade: windows of first floor laid out in four axes. Wooden balcony on stone columns facing Arubastraat.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the prominent situation on a corner. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic assembly of large and small building blocks.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Curaçaostraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Main block covered with a gable roof. Adjoining rear additions with a gable and a slant roof. Front block enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with flat moulding and 19th century top and star oculus. Front façade: central door with flanking windows, weather mouldings above openings. Doorstep platform with steps to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic assembly of large and small building blocks and the gables with 19th century top end. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Curaçaostraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery enclosed by plain gables. Front façade: plain cornice, central shutter door and flanking shutter windows. Doorstep to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Curaçaostraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Truncated gables with heavy profiled moulding and topped with a knob ornament. Front façade: cornice, central door and flanking windows. Doorstep platform with steps to street on both sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Curaçaostraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Two parallel gable roofs. Gables of front section covered with a flat moulding and topped with remnants of an ornament. Front façade: cornice and pilasters on corners, central door and flanking windows, profiled weather mouldings above openings. Wall with door entrance to backyard on west side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical parallel gable roofs and the gables, and the existing wall.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Da Costa Gomezplein 3, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure covered with three hipped roofs with finials. Façades with continuing cornice and full frontage double horizontal bands. Windows positioned in axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the balanced façade lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: De Rouvilleweg 23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached three-storey structure. Gable roof enclosed by two funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends and oculus. Façades with tall shutter windows and full-frontage horizontal bands. Wing with arcade gallery perpendicular to the building not original, rebuilt after collapse during restoration in 1989.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic funnel-shaped gables, the wooden shutter windows and the horizontal bands over the frontage of the façades. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape and because of the pro
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: De Rouvilleweg 39-41, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward curved gables and profiled mouldings. Ditto for dormers. Covered two-storey balcony structure over full frontage of front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the inward and outward curved gables with profiled mouldings and ditto dormers. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific val

properties.name: De Ruyterkade 21-23, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure accommodating two similar buildings in one block. Hipped roof with two dormers with broken arched fronton and ball ornament. Front façade with ornamented cornice and six tall windows with profiled weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical ornamented cornice and dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: De Tempel (former synagogue Tempel Emanu-El)
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure with three-storey square tower in front. Gable roof, heavy cornice and corner pilasters. Tower topped with an octagonal lantern and ditto cone. Tower base surrounded by stairs leading to entrance portico of tower and church hall. Interior with large main hall and balcony, upper storey and basement. Façades laid out in axes featuring a rosette at upper storey, arched windows at main hall and doors at basement.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the balanced symmetrical lay-out of the façades and the tower. Cultural historical value because Tempel Emanu-El was built by the Dutch Reformed Jewish Congregation. Specific value as part of a protected monumen

properties.name: Draaiweg 10, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over front gallery. Two dormers with triangular fronton on each side of roof. Kitchen with chimney at gallery-end. Front façade with high plain cornice, clamped door flanked with one opening on one side and two clamped shutters on the other.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with kitchen addition typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Dwergsteeg 5-11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Gable roofs with dormers over core area and rear gallery and slant roof over adjoining front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with triangular fronton at top end and ellipse-shaped oculus. Front façade ranging with the street, three doors on ground floor and four windows on first floor. Full-frontage horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core area and galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Eenhoornstraat 1-5, Domi
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey block accommodating three small row-houses. One continuous gable roof with flat concrete tile roofing over core area and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 20th century top end. Front façade: central door and flanking windows for each unit. Door with steps to street. Rear additions with slant roofs over kitchen units. Walled backyard with gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a sound example of low-cost row-houses with rear gallery. Ditto because of kitchen and typical additions. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Eenhoornstraat 7, Domi
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure as part of a set of small row-houses. Roof is part of one continuous gable roof with flat concrete tile roofing over core area and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with 20th century top end. Front façade: central door and flanking windows. Door with steps to street. Rear addition with slant roof over kitchen unit. Walled backyard with gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a sound example of low-cost row-house with rear gallery. Ditto because of kitchen and typical addition. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: El Diamante
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end and oculus. Full-frontage horizontal band over front façade. Forms one large structure with Breedestraat 48.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the typical floor plan with core area and gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Elleboogstraat 2, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Cornice and horizontal band over façades. Front façade with two tall windows on first floor and door on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Typical structure with a characteristic sober architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Emmastraat 10-14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade laid out in five axes with central door flanked by two windows on both sides, on ground and first floor. Wooden front balcony in centre. Short front terrace with pillared fence. Stone staircase to first floor on side façade. Adjacent to main structure: detached two-storey structure with high end of slant roof on streetside.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical façade lay-out, windows with moulded frames, wooden balcony and heavy cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Emmastraat 16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Long gable roof with a gable in the middle and at the roof's ends. No cornice. Heavy rainstorms destroyed the corner section in 1999.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a typical example of urban low-cost housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Emmastraat 25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof enclosed by gables with shoulders, 19th century top end with oculus in star-shaped plasterwork. Roof with two dormers on each side. Front façade: tall window in gable, door and window on ground floor. Small walled fence on both sides of façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical shoulder gables, moulding and oculus. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Emmastraat 5-7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof enclosed by funnel- shaped gables with ellipse-shaped oculus. Formerly equipped with lower gables. In backyard almost similar structure with ditto gables and 19th century top end with semicircular oculus. Door in front façade. Front wall with pointed gable over gate.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Emmastraat 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade: five tall windows on first floor, central door and flanking windows in two pairs. On side of street a cistern with flat roof accessible by a stone staircase with balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 10-12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cornice continuing round façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in three axes with central door and flanking windows, central wooden balcony with balusters of fretwork. Façade flanked with two gates with triangular frontons. Walled-in garden and extra gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value a.o. because of such elements as the balcony with typical details, the dentate quoins and the gates. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with plain 19th century top end and oculus, shutter door and window. Building is part of a group of two similar structures (nr.9) separated by a gate giving access to the premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as part of two similar low- cost row-houses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 14-16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof parallel to street and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Two dormers on each side of roof. Pointed gable with shoulders, rhombic oculus and truncated top with knob ornament. Front façade with cornice, central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Side entrance with gate with triangular fronton.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical gable with shoulders and 19th century top end. Cultural historical and architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a prote

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 15-17, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof with ridge perpendicular to street. Heavy cornice over all façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade with two doors and window on ground floor. Structure is flanked by two gates with triangular frontons.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the cornice and the dentate quoins. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 26, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Façade with heavy cornice, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and windows with weather mouldings and typical ornaments. Front fence with stone pillars and bars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the hipped roof with cement hips and ridge, the fine decorations on the cornice, the profiled pilasters and the fence with pillars. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 3, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Dormers with inward and outward curved fronton on both sides of roof. Profiled cornice and horizontal band over façades. Front façade with pointed shoulder gable and truncated top with knob ornament and rhombic oculus. Central door with flanking windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical gable and characteristic dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 30, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over side gallery. Front façade: door in core and window in gallery façade. Side façade: plain cornice, central door and two flanking windows on each side.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical and architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 33-39, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure containing four row-houses. One continuous gable roof with side overhangs, ridge perpendicular to street. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Building is part of a group of two similar structures (nr. 43-47)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the sporadically found side overhangs, and as part of complex with adjacent similar low-cost row-houses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 43-47, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure containing three row-houses. One continuous gable roof with side overhangs, ridge perpendicular to street. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Building is part of a group of two similar structures (nr. 33-39)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the sporadically found side overhangs, and as part of complex with adjacent similar low-cost row-houses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with flat moulding and plain 19th century top end. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with plain weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of prominent corner position. Cultural historical and architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one story structure with side entrance to premises. Gable roof parallel to street. Roof on one side closed by funnel-shaped gable with flat moulding and 19th century top end. Front façade with door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical gable with 19th century top end. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 6A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof parallel to street. Dormers with triangular fronton on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with shoulders, oculus and truncated top and knob ornament. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical gable with shoulders and 19th century top end. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure. Low gable roof parallel to street on one side closed by truncated funnel- shaped gable with semicircular top end. Front façade with shutter door and window. Gate as a side entrance to premises.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical and architectural historical value as a typical example of a low-cost urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Ferdinandstraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with plain 19th century top end and oculus, shutter door and window. Building is part of a group of two similar structures (nr.11) separated by a gate giving access to the premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as part of adjacent similar low-cost row-houses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block made up of two dwelling structures. Two parallel hipped roofs. Profiled cornice and horizontal belt over façades, plain pilasters on corners. Façade surface with appearance of rustic work of piled blocks. Staircase and balcony newly added elements.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of two-storey urban housing with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with slate roofing and eaves gutter on brackets. Wooden balcony on front façade. Façades: rustic work of piled concrete blocks and three plain horizontal belts, two above openings on ground and first floor and one at balcony level.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey concrete-built urban house with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built corner structure. Hipped roof. Plain rectangular floor plan with kitchen addition. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Shutter doors with side lights and shutter windows. Openings with plastered frame.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built urban house with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Fergusonstraat 9-11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof parallel to street. Cornice and horizontal band over façades. Weather mouldings on pseudo consoles above all openings. Panelled shutter doors and shutter windows. Front façade: lay-out with five axes and divided in three sections by pilasters. Central section with concrete balcony and consoles. West façade: staircase to first floor and concrete openwork balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the classical façade lay-out with axes, the cornice, pilasters and weather mouldings and the balcony, all concrete elements. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Florencestraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two hipped roofs with overhangs. Cement hips and finials. Front section is a wooden structure, rear section is stone-built. Front façade with central door and flanking shutter windows, balcony with stone openwork balustrade and two stairs to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the rarely found roof overhangs and the wooden façades. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Former 'Club Curaçao
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Main section with sala, front and rear gallery and two rear wings on both sides of a patio. Three parallel hipped roofs over main section and two transverse hipped roofs placed in line over each wing. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with triangular decorated fronton above cornice and pilasters on corners. Central door and flanking windows with fanlights. Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with a sala, front and rear gallery and a patio flanked by two wings, a lay-out typical of Curaçao and of Scharloo in particular. Specific value because it was built as the o

properties.name: Fort Amsterdam / Council of Ministers
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey cube-shaped structure in inner court of the fort. Three parallel hipped roofs replaced (in the 1950's) by one hipped roof with a flat section in the middle. All façades equipped with a heavy cornice with dentils. Front façade laid out in five axes with sash windows. Small balcony on first floor. Pilasters on both sides of central door section and on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as part of Fort Amsterdam, one of the oldest structures on the island. Ditto, as the seat of government from way back. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Fort Amsterdam and Governor's Palace
properties.characteristics: Trapezium-shaped fortification dating back from 1635. Four bastions (Vlaggestok, Nieuwe Batterij, De Klok, De Kat) connected by curtain walls. The fort houses the Governor's palace, the Fort Church (1766) and the former General Secretary (1857). The Governor's Palace is built between the western bastions as a two storey structure made up of two adjoining elongated pavilions covered with hipped roofs. Ground floor of palace provides entrance gateway to fort.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as one of the oldest structures on the island and the oldest fort built by the Dutch West India Company (WIC), and as seat of government way back from the WIC until nowadays. Specific value as part of

properties.name: Fort Beekenburg Compound
properties.characteristics: Fort compound laid out on the Caracasbaai peninsula with components: Fort Beekenburg (early 18th century): tower, shaped as a truncated cone, as the main battery and an adjoining lower battery facing Caracasbaai. A quarantine station (1883): oblong two-storey structure covered with a hipped roof. Arched openings on first floor and arched windows on second floor of long façades, additions on side façades. A warehouse with cistern (late 19th century): rectangular structure covered with a hipped roof, used to smoke the contaminated goods of ships.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and rarity value of Fort Beekenburg as a unique piece of fortress design. Ditto because of the 19th century classicist quarantine station which has been preserved almost in its authentic state. Historical value for the military hi
properties.construction_period: 18th and second half of the 19th century

properties.name: Fort Nassau
properties.characteristics: Fortification located 60 meters above Schottegat controlling the town and port within its field of fire. Consists of a rectangular main battery with powder storehouse and cistern, a small battery, barracks and kitchen and a latrine, within a ring wall. Close to the fort is a typical well with staircase access.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a rare piece of fortress design. Historical value for the military history of Curaçao. Specific value as an ensemble of a complex of historic buildings with a prominent situation above the Historic

properties.name: Fort Nassauweg 2-8, Parera
properties.characteristics: Detached structure accommodating four one-storey row- houses under one continuous gable roof. Plain cornice and funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Fort on Piscaderabaai
properties.characteristics: Battery facing the entrance of Piscaderabaai. Plain arrow- shaped design open at rear side. Platform with shooting gallery and a powder house. Barracks at unprotected rear flank. Plastered stone walls with sloping top end.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a rare piece of fortress design. Historical value for the military history of Curaçao and because of its prominent location on Piscaderabaai where the French landed in 1713. Specific value as part

properties.name: Fort on Sint Michielsbaai
properties.characteristics: Fortifications facing the entrance of Sint Michielsbaai. Arrow-shaped design with a platform with shooting gallery closed at rear side. Square tower in the middle with a powder room and food storage space and staircase to upper platform. Only lower battery and part of tower completed. Opposite the main battery is a small battery composed of a plain shooting gallery behind arrow-shaped curtain walls.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a rare piece of fortress design. Historical value for the military history of Curaçao, because of its prominent position on Sint Michielsbaai and the use as a signal tower during the second English

properties.name: Four Alley complex
properties.characteristics: Compact complex of five small dwellings enclosed by four alleys: Van Dijksteeg, Zaantjessteeg, Martinsteeg and Schrijnwerkerstraat. One and two-storey structures with inner yards. Complex dominated by central two-storey core structure with hipped roof and one-storey side galleries with lean-to roofs. Other structures include a.o. dwellings with core area and galleries covered with gable roofs and slant roofs enclosed with funnel-shaped gables with classical top end. Complex enclosed with high stone wall with gates to small inner yards.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic assembly of larger and smaller blocks. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and galleries typical of Curaçao (Van Dijkst
properties.construction_period: Not listed inn Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 101-103, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey corner structure accommodating two row-houses. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped separation walls and gable with shoulders and 19th century top. Oven and chimney in backyard of dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao which is scarce in this part of the town. Ditto because of the typical oven. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 102, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Main structure of corral. Detached structure with gable roof and adjoining slant roof over two-storey core area and front gallery. One-storey rear gallery covered with slant roof. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus and 19th century top end. Front façade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Front terrace flanked with stone benches.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the 19th century funnel-shaped gables, cornice and wooden shutter doors and windows. Ditto because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as a building which is part of one of the few
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 108-112, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure. Three-storey core area with gable roof. Rear gallery roof separated by a two-storey balcony section. Two-storey front gallery with slant roof. Front gallery façade laid out in five vertical axes with three doors opening to a front balcony on columns. Loggia with staircase access on side façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the dormers, the façade lay-out with doors and windows positioned in five axes, the cornice and mouldings, the wooden shutter doors and windows and the fence of the premises. Architectural hist

properties.name: Frederikstraat 109-111, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof parallel to street. Front façade with doors and windows positioned in three axes and topped with a triangular fronton. Profiled cornice along façades.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical two-storey urban structure with a gable roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 109A -109B, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey behind Frederikstraat 109. Gable roof enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Roof with overhangs. Balcony removed.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical two-storey urban structure with gable roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 117-119, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Front façade originally laid out with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Concrete balcony probably replacement of wooden one.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spacious two-storey urban dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because structure is situated between two alleys. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 123, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs with ridges parallel to street. Cornice over façades. Front façade with shutter windows and doors positioned in four axes. Front concrete balcony probably replacement of wooden one.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spacious two-storey urban dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because structure is situated along an alleyway and on a square. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 127-133, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Typical oblong floor plan parallel to street. Gable roof over core area. Slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Inward and outward curved gables with profiled mouldings. Five dormers with inward and outward curved gables on each side of gable roof. Front façade laid out in nine vertical axes. Openings topped with arches in block pattern connected with moulded bands. Seriously damaged by fire in 1999.
properties.monument_value: Nr. 127-131: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto because of its age, as a rare 18th century house and the characteristic gable roofs, mouldings and terrace stairs. Specific value as pa

properties.name: Frederikstraat 128-132, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over gallery enclosed by gables with oculus. Roof chimney on east side. Entrance gate at Frederikstraat with stone pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the typical gables, dormer, chimney and the fence of the premises with pillars and profiled top. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific valu
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 146-148, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Main building of a corral which also includes the structures Naniesteeg 6-22. Detached corner structure. One-and-a-half storey core area. Gable roof with three dormers on both sides and adjoining slant roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with flat moulding and small triangular fronton. Front façade with central door flanked with two and three windows on sides. Central balcony with stairs to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic funnel-shaped gables. Architectural historical value and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto as a building which is part of one of the few existing

properties.name: Frederikstraat 16-18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade with three axes: three tall shutter doors on first floor and central door with flanking shutter windows on ground floor. Almost full-frontage balcony supported by two by two columns which form part of the fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the profiled cornice and mouldings and the wooden front balcony supported by columns. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 20-24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade with three axes: three tall shutter doors on first floor and central door with flanking shutter windows on ground floor. Gate next to façade with inward and outward curved wall and access to staircase to first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of i.a the funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end and the typical gate. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Sp
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 30, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Hipped roofs parallel to street. Profiled cornice over façades, dentate coins on corners. Front façade laid out in five vertical axes. Triangular frontons above windows and doors. Almost full- frontage balcony supported by columns which form part of the fence.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the prominent situation. Architectural historical value because of i.a the assembly of blocks of different size, the balanced façade lay-out with axes and the profiled cornices and triangular fro
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure set back from the street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery enclosed by two funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the corner situation. Architectural historical value because of i.a the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 36-38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs with ridges parallel to the street. Cornice along all façades. Front façade: four tall windows on first floor, two doors and three windows in alternating sequence. Gate with triangular fronton on west side.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the corner situation. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade: central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 75A/B/C, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure with composite roof plan. One- storey front section: two parallel hipped roofs with ridges perpendicular to street. Two-storey rear section: hipped roof with ridge parallel to street. Cornice and fluted pilasters. Front terrace .
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the assembly of building blocks of different size . Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 86, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Hipped roof with ridge perpendicular to street. Profiled cantilevered cornice supported by brackets. Symmetrical façade with central section with entrance door and two flanking bay windows forming two balconies on top.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a typical concrete-built two-storey urban dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape

properties.name: Frederikstraat 89, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure with composite roof plan. One- storey front section: two parallel hipped roofs with ridges perpendicular to street. Two-storey rear section: hipped roof with ridge parallel to street. Cornice over façades, fluted pilasters. Symmetrical front façade with two central doors and one window on each side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the assembly of building blocks of different size, the symmetrical façade and the profiled cornice, mouldings and pilasters. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 91-93, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached corner structure with composite roof plan. Two-storey front section: two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. One-storey rear section: side wings with gable roofs enclosing a patio. Wings connected by an aqueduct. Front façade laid out in three axes: central door with wooden balcony and flanking windows, three doors on ground floor, profiled cornice and dentate quoins.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the corner situation. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical assembly of building blocks of different size, the symmetrical façade, the shutter windows and the
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Frederikstraat 94, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure with composite roof plan of hipped roofs. Front section: three hipped roofs parallel to street. Rear section: side wing structure with parallel hipped roofs perpendicular to street. Front façade laid out in three axes, front terrace. (Façade presently not revealed because of covered and enclosed terrace)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional structure with a composite roof plan of hipped roofs. Ditto because of the ridge ornaments and the mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 96, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey corner structure. Steep hipped roof. Dormers with triangular fronton right above cornice on both sides of roof, one marked with star, the other with year 1857. Additional one-storey structures on premises with 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Front façade laid out in five axes with central doors and two flanking windows on each side, front balcony. Typical compound wall with gates.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a large urban mansion from the second half of the 19th century. Ditto because of the additional buildings and the compound wall. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Frederikstraat 98-100, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey main structure and ditto addition. Main structure: three parallel hipped roofs over core area, front and rear gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Façades with cornice. Front façade with central shutter door and shutter windows with weather mouldings. Additional structure: one continuous lean-to roof leaning against street wall. Typical garden wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the stone ridges and hips, cornice and mouldings, panelled shutter doors, shutter windows and the typical garden wall. Architectural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific val
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Freemasons' Lodge Igualdad
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey and symmetrically set up structure. Parallel gable roofs with dormers over core area and front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. South façade with full-frontage terrace and stairs. Detached additional structure and cistern in yard. Two new side wings not included in Monuments Register.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as seat of the Lodge Igualdad. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Momuments

properties.name: Fuikstraat 1-3, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two small one-storey concrete-built structures separated by a structure in the middle. Rectangular floor plans parallel to alleyway. Gable roofs with dormers on both sides. Façades with cornice and shutter windows with profiled (nr.1) and flat (nr.3) weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value and cultural historical value as examples of low-cost urban dwellings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached, oblong one-storey structure. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Front façade: low gable with profiled moulding of gable rims, central panelled shutter doors and shutter windows with flat weather mouldings in block pattern
properties.monument_value: Specific value as a structure built in a sober and characteristic architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 14-16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large three-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Front façade laid out in three axes with windows on second floor and central door flanked with windows on first and ground floor. Wooden balcony on first floor.
