Neo-classicist rear façade with centrally positioned three- tiered portico with balconies on first and second floor and triangular fronton supported by Tuscan columns. Adjoining two-storey rear structure with roof chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the portico with Tuscan columns and the triangular fronton. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 18-20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-and-a-half storey corner structure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and adjoining slant roof over side gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus in star-shaped plasterwork. Front façade laid out with window in gable top, two windows on first floor and two doors on ground floor. Marble tablet above left door with inscription '1857'and '361'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the 19th century gables and the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 23-25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top-end. Front façade laid out with three shutter windows on first floor and alternating shutter windows and shutter doors on ground floor, all with weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as an example of a structure with a bentana, a selling window. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof with slightly lifted overhangs. Front façade with funnel-shaped gable, panelled door flanked by two windows, fluted pilasters on corners. West façade constructed in wood.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because it is one of the few preserved examples of a combination of a stonework front façade and a wooden side façade in the Alley Area in Otrobanda. Architectural historical and esthetical value beca
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi detached one-storey row-houses covered with one continuous broken slant roof. Row structure perpendicular to the street. Front façade with clamped door and window.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as an example of low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure as part of a building block which includes nr. 39. One continuous gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable with flat 19th century top end. Profiled mouldings in front façade broken at separation line, is indication that the structure originally consisted of two parts.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as a structure built in a sober and characteristic architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 39, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure as part of a building block which includes nr. 37. One continuous gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable with flat 19th century top end and oculus as centre of moulded star. Profiled mouldings in front façade is indication that the structure originally consisted of two parts.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as a structure built in a sober and characteristic architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 52-54, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables placed on cornice. Oculus in star-and-circle plasterwork in gable top ends. Front façade with doors and windows positioned in five axes. Marble tablet with inscription '1836 308A'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscap

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 7-15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small corral compound. Two-storey main building covered with two parallel gable roofs. Plain gables and funnel- shaped gables at rear and front side respectively. Front façade: two doors with front balcony and flanking windows, all with fanlights and weather mouldings. Compound includes two service quarters (nr. 11-13) covered with a lean-to roof leaning to western wall of corral. Seriously damaged by fire in 2000.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the clear indication of different phases in the construction of the main building. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a corral compound with a main building, yard and surrounding second
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gasthuisstraat 8-10, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey composite structure. Main building and additional structures covered with gable roofs: main building with front gallery and ridge parallel to street, additions at the rear side positioned perpendicular to main building. Pointed gables with oculus. Front façade laid out with four windows on first floor and two doors and window on ground floor. Separate gate with access to premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of i.a the characteristic additions at the rear side. Architectural historical value and cultural historical value because of the floor plan of main block typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gravenstraat 10, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular to street. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with shutter door and window with profiled weather mouldings. Front wall of premises with four square pillars covered with pyramidal top.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gravenstraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Three parallel gable roofs over main structure. Cornice along all façades. Stone wall around premises, entrance gate with two square pillars covered with pyramidal top.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Gravenstraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey kas di porchi, porch-house. Two hipped roofs perpendicular to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Small built-in corner porch. Cornice along façades and wooden shutter windows with weather mouldings. Profiled pilasters on façade corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value as a unique housing type within the Inner City. Kas di porchi was almost exclusively built outside the city in the 1930's. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Habaaiweg 6, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Three hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridge with finials. Additions at rear side, a.o. cistern covered with hipped roof. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with central shutter door and flanking windows, dentate quoins on corners. Short front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a house with hipped roofs with a traditional design Ditto because of the soundness of the complex and the building details. Ditto because of typical cistern and additions. Specific va
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: Habaaiweg 8-10, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure containing two dwellings with rear kitchen additions and oven chimneys. One continuous gable roof parallel to street with concrete tile roofing. Funnel-shaped 20th-century gables with shoulders and flat moulding. Front façade laid out with one central door and flanking windows per dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block of two low-cost houses covered by a gable roof. Ditto because of the 20th century funnel-shaped gables, and the ovens of the kitchen additions. Specific value as part of a pro

properties.name: Halman House
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure, main building of a corral with secondary structures. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Four dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus in moulded star. Front façade with central door and three windows on both sides. Rear additions include kitchen with adjoining double cistern, and east wing. Former servants' quarters covered with one continuous slant roof along Zaantjessteeg. Surrounding walls with several gates in west and south wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as one of the few examples of the corral structure in the alley area of Otrobanda consisting of a main building and yard with secondary structures on the edges, and because of the floor plan with core
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hamelbergweg 1A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof parallel to street. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with built-in loggia on first floor and external staircase access. Loggia corner supported by double octagonal columns and ditto cantilevered capitals.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of an urban dwelling with loggia. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hanchi di Snoa 1-5, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure built against adjacent properties. Gable roof parallel to street. Funnel-shaped gables, top end with small triangular fronton on top of rectangular moulding. Later on added two-storey front gallery. Original wooden gallery replaced by a concrete one, dormers altered.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables and the added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 17th / first half of 18th century

properties.name: Hanchi di Snoa 17, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Gable of front façade with sloping lower part and inward and outward curved upper part with arched top end. Later on added two- storey front gallery with four arched openings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the 18th century inward and outward curved gables and the later on added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Hanchi di Snoa 9, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey corner building. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Funnel-shaped gables, top end with small triangular fronton on top of rectangular moulding.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the late 17th / early 18th century funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 17th / first half of 18th century

properties.name: Heerenstraat 18, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure stretched between Heerenstraat and Keukenstraat. Heerenstraat façade: hipped roof, dormer with truncated triangular fronton and outward curved cheeks. Heavily profiled cornice, pilasters on corners. On first floor: three sash windows with glass bars, framed by mouldings and pilasters. Keukenstraat façade: two parallel hipped roofs with dormers identical to dormer on Heerenstraat. Five sash windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the decoration of the dormers, the cornice and the windows. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 20-22, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey corner structure. Gable roof with ridge parallel to Heerenstraat, three dormers. Front façade: sash windows with glass bars, windows placed in seven vertical axes. Side façade: funnel-shaped gable with classical top end featuring a double arched fronton on a rectangular moulding. Tall windows placed in two vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the 18th century funnel-shaped gables and the orderly façade lay-out with the windows placed in axes. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 23, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure stretched between Heerenstraat and Handelskade. One continuous hipped roof with dormers. Dormers on front and rear façade: triangular fronton with profiled moulding, 19th century top end and curved cheeks. Four dormers on side façade with plain gables.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the fine dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Heerenstraat 24-26, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure stretched between Heerenstraat and Keukenstraat covered with two parallel hipped roofs with dormers. Façade on Keukenstraat: left and right dormer marked with 'Agosto' and '1917' respectively. Façade with diagonal cross-band decorations. Side façade: ditto decorations, divided by pilasters and horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the façade decorations. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape

properties.name: Heerenstraat 25-27, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure. Two parallel gable roofs with dormers on side façade. Front façade: two identical funnel- shaped gables with mouldings and classical top end featuring a small triangular fronton on a rectangular moulding with the marks of year of construction. Later on added front gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the early 18th century funnel-shaped gables and the later on added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 1706 and 5466 (Jewish era) marked in top of gables

properties.name: Heerenstraat 29-31, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure. Two parallel gable roofs perpendicular to Heerenstraat. Front façade: two identical inward and outward curved gables with mouldings and arched top end of an usual design. Marks of year of construction on gable tops. Later on added front gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the early 18th century gables and the later on added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: 1706 and 5466 (Jewish era) marked in top of gables

properties.name: Heerenstraat 35, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey corner structure. Gable roof closed by a small funnel-shaped gable with mouldings and classical top end featuring an oval-shaped fronton on a rectangular moulding. Three-tiered later on added gallery with arcades on first and second floor, four arches supported by belly- shaped columns in front façade and one arch around the corner. Gallery topped with a parapet of stone openwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the splendid added gallery typical of Punda and the richly ornamented funnel-shaped gable. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 5, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey double structure stretched between Heerenstraat and Handelskade and covered with one continuous gable roof. Heerenstraat façade: funnel-shaped gable with horizontal band. Sash windows with glass bars placed in three vertical axes, and between full- frontage horizontal bands. Handelskade façade: plain funnel-shaped gable with square window. Shutter windows in two vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the balanced lay-out of the façades with windows positioned in vertical axes. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Heerenstraat 7, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey double structure stretched between Heerenstraat and Handelskade. One continuous roof with gable and hipped end. Heerenstraat façade: main funnel-shaped gable with small shoulders and horizontal band above window, and ditto smaller gable. Sash windows placed between full-frontage horizontal bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the two dissimilar funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Heerenstraat 9, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with gable roof perpendicular to Heerenstraat. Gable of front façade with heavily profiled moulding, fantasy top and bottom decorations and infill. Gable sits on projecting moulding which is part of the cornice. Pilasters on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the richly decorated gable. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 11-13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. Hipped roof with stone ridge and hips, and slightly lifted overhangs on its four sides. Stone wall with gate to premises and staircase access to first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical two-storey urban dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 19-23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with a composite floor and roof plan. Front building equipped with central balcony with balustrade of fretwork bars. Second balcony at rear side with ditto balustrade supported by Tuscan columns. Arched aqueduct. Stone wall with gate to premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spacious two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto because of the coherence of the building masses, the balconies and the aqueduct. Specific value as part of a protected monumental towns

properties.name: Hendriksteeg 7-9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached structure with ridge parallel to alley. Gable roof with stone ridge enclosed by plain gables. Dormers at both sides of roof. Flat plain cornice bending up at ends. Horizontal band above door and window over full-frontage of front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the plain gables, dormers, lay-out of door and window and the full frontage horizontal band. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hogar Santa Luisa
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with front and rear section with patio. Two-storey front section with sala, front and rear galleries. One-storey rear section with side wings enclosing a patio. Flat roofs surrounded by a parapet with stone openwork between pillars. Profiled cornice over façades and double pilasters on corners. Patio with columns and closing wall with arched opening. Front façade laid out with central door and flanking paired windows on first floor and three doors on ground floor, all with arched weather mouldings. Full-frontage front terrace with steps. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic cube shape. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery in main building and rear wings on both sides of a patio,

properties.name: Hoogstraat 10A -12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached corner structure with main hipped roofs perpendicular to the street. One-and-a-half storey structure with basement. Front façade: three panelled shutter doors with moulded arched frames. Front terrace with balustrade and entrance stairs. Entrance gate flanked by square pillars topped with ornaments.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of its corner situation. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the assembly of building blocks, the plastered finishing and ornamentation of the windows, the front t
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 13-15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-and-a-half storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjacent slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus, profiled moulding and 19th century top end. Front façade with doors and windows positioned in four axes. Rear balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with T-shaped floor plan covered with hipped roofs. Cistern as a typical front addition. Front façade: shutter door and window with arched fanlights on first floor which open to a terrace formed by the cistern's roof. Profiled cornice over all façades. Stone garden wall with plain entrance flanked by square pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the cornice, the shutter doors and windows and the arched fanlights and mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-and-a-half storey oblong structure. Three parallel gable roofs with dormers over three adjacent blocks. Cornice and lower horizontal band over front and side façades. Dentate quoins on corners. Front façade: three adjoining funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and knob ornament. Central door and balcony. Front terrace with stairs.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. the typical composition of the three parallel gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 19, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade: door and windows placed in four axes. Front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an example of early 20th century architecture barely found in Hoogstraat. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with two-storey core area and one- storey front gallery. Hipped roof with cement hips, ridges and finials over core area and lean-to roof over front gallery. Cornice over façades, pilasters on corners of front façade. Front façade: three tall shutter windows on core façade; central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on gallery façade, all with profiled mouldings. Cistern placed against rear façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two dormers with triangular fronton, tall window and cheeks. Truncated gables with horizontal band below window ending in shoulders. Front façade: central door and flanking windows. Garden wall with stone openwork infill and entrance flanked by square pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 26, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cornice over all façades, mouldings above all windows. Front façade: dentate quoins on corners, panelled shutter doors and windows placed in three axes. Almost full- frontage front balcony supported by columns ranging with the street. Staircase to first floor on side façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design, the doors and windows, the cornice and mouldings and the dentate quoins. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 27-31, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey main structure (nr.27-29) and secondary one-storey structure (nr.31). Main structure: three hipped roofs parallel to street. Cornice with drapery ornamentation, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in five axes with central balcony supported by columns. Triangular ornaments below window sills. Secondary structure: roof terrace enclosed by a closed stone parapet marked with a profiled moulding and a horizontal band connected with pilasters.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the cornice with drapery ornamentation (nr.27-29) and the typical parapet with mouldings and pilasters (nr.31). Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 28-30, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Truncated gables with finials on top and horizontal band ending in shoulders. Front façade: full- frontage triangular fronton framed with decorated mouldings, medallion in centre. Central arched door with ditto flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the truncated gables and the typical decorated triangular fronton. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. S
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 32-34, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure covered with three hipped roofs parallel to street. Profiled cornice over all façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade: shutter doors and tall shutter windows placed in three axes. Wooden balcony supported by four columns ranging with the street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design with panelled doors and tall windows and the typical dentate quoins. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 33, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular to the street. Cement hips and ridge. Cornice over all façades. Moulding with bent ends above all openings. Deep- set door and windows. Similar design as adjacent structure Hoogstraat 37, except from direction of hipped roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Hipped roof parallel to Hoogstraat. Cement hips and ridge. Cornice over all façades. Moulding with bent ends above all openings. Deep- set door and windows. Similar design as adjacent structure Hoogstraat 33, except from direction of hipped roof.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of its prominent corner situation. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure in backyard of Hoogstraat 40. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front façade: centrally positioned door flanked by tall windows with heavy profiled moulding.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 39-41, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-store corner structure. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front façade: decorated triangular fronton, balcony supported by four profiled columns with spaced bands. Terrace with Curaçao tiles. Side façade with stone staircase leading to balcony and door on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of its prominent corner situation. Architectural historical value because of typical elements a.o. the heavy cornice, the decorated triangular fronton, the profiled columns and the tiled terrace. Sp
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 40, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof with flat moulding. Front façade: profiled cornice running straight above doors and windows on first floor. Panelled shutter doors and shutter windows placed in three axes. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 42, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Pyramidal roof with top ornament. Front façade ranging with the street. Centrally placed shutter door flanked with tall shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical design of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 43, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Flat roof with a balustrade / parapet with stone openwork sections set between double marble pillars. Front façade: front terrace covered with projecting flat roof supported by four double columns with ball-shaped capitals. Cantilevered overhangs supported by consoles. Intricate detailed marble work.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. the typical use of materials such as: marble in different colours, Curaçao cement tiles, and ornaments such as: columns with ball-shaped capitals and the roof balustrade with pillars and ball-shap
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 44, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure. Gable roof with two dormers with triangular fronton over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Plain gables with oculus and tall window with moulding. Entrance on both ends of garden wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 49, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with front and rear additions. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over main structure. Front façade: heavy profiled cornice, pilasters on corners. One-storey front addition with cornice and pilasters on corners. Flat roof forming a spacious balcony for the first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of typical elements such as a.o. the heavy cornice and the pilasters on the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 51, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs over core area and front gallery. Adjoining U- shaped hipped roof over rear gallery and flanking wings. Enclosed patio. All shutter windows on first floor equipped with arched fanlights. Heavy cornice over all façades, dentate quoins on front and side corners. Front façade: triangular fronton above cornice, decoration of medallion and flat triangles. Front terrace with stairs.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the prominent situation on a corner. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic composition of blocks and the typical ornaments such as the cornice, the tria
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hoogstraat 52, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs of different size with cement hips and ridges. Cornice over all façades. Front façade: central door and flanking windows with mouldings, profiled pilasters on corners. Front terrace with side stairs. External oven and chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with hipped roofs with a traditional design, and because of the presence of a traditional oven and chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Hoogstraat 54, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs of different size with cement hips, ridges and finials. Cornice over all façades, profiled pilasters on corners. Front façade: central door and flanking windows with mouldings. Front terrace with stairs at sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with hipped roofs with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Hotel Buona-Sera Inn
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure on narrow deep lot. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof enclosed with pointed gables with transverse band and semicircular oculus. Cornice and horizontal bands over exposed façades. Three windows on first floor, central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Front terrace with pillared fence and gate with semicircular steps to street level.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Hotel Estoril
properties.characteristics: Two adjoined two-storey structures covered with gable and hipped roofs respectively. Heavy cornice. Front façade with two doors and balcony in asymmetrical position. One and three windows on sides of balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 19th century gables and the composite system of roofs typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Hotel Pelikaan
properties.characteristics: Large detached complex. Two adjoining two-storey structures. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges. Cornice over all façades. Two plain horizontal bands running above openings on ground and first floor. All façades laid out with doors and windows in vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a double two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: IJzerstraat 49-51, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof and plain gables with oculus. Adjoining structure at rear side and cistern. Plain cornices. Front façade: four windows with weather mouldings on first floor, alternating doors and windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 55, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to the street. Plain cornice over all façades. Front façade: windows and central door on ground floor positioned in three axes. Gate with arched opening on west side giving access to staircase to balcony and entrance door on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic gate. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 57, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey corner structure which also includes Emmastraat 1-3. Hipped roofs parallel to Emmastraat with fluted chimney. Heavy profiled cornice over all façades and horizontal moulding. Quoins with block pattern on ground floor and dentate pattern on first floor. Façades laid out in axes, one axis in front façade and six axes in façade facing Emmastraat. Side access to first floor through gate and staircase.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic façade lay-out with doors and windows positioned in axes, and the typical fluted chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 59, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs and a gable roof perpendicular to street. Heavy profiled cornice. Façades laid out in axes, three in front façade and five in each side façade. Front façade: triangular fronton with oculus and windows above cornice. Fluted moulded frame around openings. Balcony on first floor. Walled-in premises with entrances on IJzerstraat and Emmastraat.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic symmetrical façade lay-out with doors and windows positioned in axes, the fronton and the typical fluted frames around the openings. Specific value as part of a protected mon
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 61, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof with finials. Cornice over façades and weather mouldings above all openings. Dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in three axes, side façades in four and five axes respectively. Small one-storey addition at rear side. Front garden wall with square pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic symmetrical façade lay-out and such elements as the profiled cornice, quoins and weather mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: IJzerstraat 71-73, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Composite roof structure of hipped roofs. Front and side façades with small cornice, two full-frontage moulded bands below cornice and between ground and first floor. Front façade: six windows on first floor and alternating windows and doors on ground floor. Dentate quoins on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the façade lay- out with quoins, mouldings and bands. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: J.B.Gorsiraweg 4, Parera
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure overlooking Scharloo. Composite symmetrical floor and roof plan. Core area, front and rear galleries covered by three parallel hipped roofs. Rear pavilions with wings and enclosed patio. Two symmetrically positioned cisterns built against the side walls of garden and connected by aqueducts to main building. Cornice over all façades. Front façade: triangular fronton with cornice and dentils, medallion and flat triangles. Façade lay-out in five axes. Large full- frontage balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the regular and symmetrical lay-out and the characteristic façade details. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, galleries, patio and wings typical of Scharloo
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Jewish Cultural Historical Museum
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Gable roof with funnel-shaped gables with classical top end, that is a small triangular fronton placed on a rectangular moulding. Front façade with windows and door laid out in two axes. Rear façade with addition covered with lean-to roof. Kitchen sites on ground and first floor, the latter with baking oven.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the late-19th century / early-18th century funnel-shaped gable and the symmetrical façade lay-out with windows in vertical axes. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Jewish Cultural Historical Museum
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Gable roof with funnel-shaped gables with classical top end, that is a small triangular fronton placed on a rectangular moulding. Front façade laid out in two axes. Open two tiered gallery added in 1728 with arcades featuring four arched front openings and one on each side of gallery. Short belly-shaped columns on first floor. Rear façade laid out in two axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the late-19th century / early-18th century funnel-shaped gable and the latter on added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 11, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey deep-set structure with rectangular floor plan. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front façade: doors and windows laid out in five axes. Concrete front balcony with stone openwork balustrade and supported by columns. Pilasters on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a large two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 12, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Three parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Smaller front section. Cornice over all façades. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a 20th century dwelling with a traditional concept and design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 18-19, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with a rectangular floor plan. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over front and side façades. Front façade: triangular fronton with profiled dentils, fronton infill with medallion and curved mouldings, front balcony with wooden fretwork balusters and supported by fluted columns. Corner pilasters.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the front façade design with fronton, columns and mouldings inspired by neo- classicism as was usual on Curaçao, and on Scharloo in particular, in the last quarter of the 19th century. Specific value as part of a

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 20, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and adjoining slant roof over front and rear galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and shoulders. Cornice over façades. Cistern covered with gable roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery and the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 24, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with oblong floor plan. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade: two doors on ground floor and two windows on first floor with full-frontage moulding. Profiled cornice and pilasters on corners. East façade with four tall windows on both ground and first floor and full-frontage horizontal band.
properties.monument_value: Architectural value as an example of a modest dwelling dating from the last phase of the neo-classicist period on Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 4, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on an elevated substructure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Typical cornice over all façades. Front and rear terraces with balustrade and stairs. Cistern and aqueduct.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao including terraces and cistern. Cultural historical value as the former dwelling of S.E.L.Maduro anno 1850, founder of the Maduro company. Specific value a

properties.name: Johan van Walbeeckplein 6B-13, Punda
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure with a floor plan designed as a tapered and symmetrical trapezoid. Originally built as a library and office space. Two-storey structure at trapezoid base (office) and one-storey structure at top (library) connected by open galleries enclosing a patio with covered stage. Two identical side facades. Typical air wells in roof of entrances and library. Typical other Modern Movement details for ventilation and for protection against the tropical sun.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a sound example of a public building designed in the architecture of the Modern Movement. Architectural historical value because of the use of elements of modern design for the protection against the Caribbean climate. Ar

properties.name: Julianaplein 14, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure built on backyard subdivision. Access through a gate below aqueduct between Julianaplein 12 and 16. Gable roof over core and slant roofs over front and rear galleries enclosed by funnel-shaped gables.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto as an example of a dwelling on a backyard subdivision. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Julianaplein 16, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular to street. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Plain flat cornice over exposed façades. Cornice on front façade continues into arched aqueduct to nr.12 and forms the top of a gate to nr.14 located in backyard of compound.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a typical compound structure. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Julianaplein 18, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure. Front section with flat roof, rear section with two parallel gable roofs with dormers and funnel-shaped gables. Richly ornamented portico supported by columns over open terrace. Four fluted ionic columns, decorated architrave, frieze with dentils and parapet topped with balustrade, and decorated semicircular fronton. Neo-classicist ornamentation.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of an urban dwelling with a traditional design and with a richly ornamented neo-classicist portico facing the square. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Julianaplein 2-4, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-storey corner structure and additional building. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over façades. Two wide double shutter doors with small shutter doors in between. Weather mouldings above deep-set door frames.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a shop structure which has retained its function. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Julianaplein 22, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with main block and rear additions forming a patio. Three parallel hipped roofs and gable roof over main block. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice with dentils over façades, corner pilasters. All windows are tall, arched shutter windows with mouldings around window frames. Front façade with decorated triangular fronton above cornice; doors and windows laid out in three axes. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of an extensive two-storey block-shaped urban dwelling with rear additions and equipped with classicist elements. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first half of 20th century

properties.name: Julianaplein 26, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with rear additions. Composite floor plan and roof structure with two sets of three transversely positioned parallel hipped roofs, and two air-wells. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over facades, pilasters on corners. Shutter door and windows of front façade laid out in three axes and framed with mouldings. Rear additions include cistern covered with hipped roof and typical small structure with square floor plan.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of an extensive two-storey block-shaped urban dwelling with rear additions. Architectural historical value because of the detailing of the windows. Specific value as part of a pro

properties.name: Julianaplein 34, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built structure with composite floor plan. Diverse roof types, large overhangs at all sides. Diagonal front entrance with front porch. Five-sided rear porch.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a rare example of a sound concrete-built dwelling in the architectural style characteristic of the second quarter of the 20th century. Architectural historical value because of its shape, overhangs

properties.name: Julianaplein 36, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Ground floor level below level of square. Hipped roof parallel to square, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Cornice with flat and profiled section, corner pilasters. Front façade: Central triangular fronton with window above cornice, doors and windows laid out in four axes. Two full- frontage horizontal bands over façade. Front fence of premises with typical round columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling with a rarely found fence of round columns. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Julianaplein 38, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Three hipped roofs parallel to square. Cement hips and ridge with finials. Cantilevered cornice over all façades. Front façade: arched openings with moulded framing. Three shutter doors on ground floor, shutter door and flanking windows with moulded draperies hanging from window sills on first floor. Central wooden balcony. Pseudo-rustic dentate quoins on façade corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a sound and richly ornamented late-19th century two-storey dwelling. Architectural historical value because of the typical window framing. Specific value as part of a protected monume

properties.name: Julianaplein 8-12, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two adjoining one-storey structures with similar design. Hipped roofs, nr.12 with adjoining slant roof. Cornice and pilasters on corners and on separation line of structures. Triangular frontons with horizontal bands and shutter windows in centre of each façade. Front façade with two times a door and window (nr. 8-10), and three clamped doors (nr.12), the centre one topped with a triangular moulding, the flanking doors with text 'Gran Agencia Funeraria' and 'Panaderia El Cojo feb 20 1884'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling and shop structure which has retained the original function. Architectural historical value because of the functional façade texts and mouldings, and the bread oven. Specif

properties.name: Kadaster (Land Registry)
properties.characteristics: Large detached complex on Berg Arrarat built in neo- classicist style. Two distinct building sections. Western section: T-shaped floor plan with hipped roof over core and gable roof over front addition with decorated triangular fronton. Eastern section: rectangular floor plan on platform with hipped roofs over two-storey core area and rear gallery and flat roof over one-storey front addition. Covered cistern on east façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the classicist style characteristics such as the fronton, dentate quoins and framed window openings on first floor. Monumental ensemble value because of the prominent site on Berg Arrarat.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kalksteeg 1-11, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey block of five adjoining structures. Part of a block of eight row-houses. One continuous gable roof with eight dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped end gables with 19th century top end. Each dwelling equipped with dormers with tall window and triangular fronton, front door and window, back door and external chimney / cooking place in walled-in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of modest row-houses constructed along an alley connecting main roads. Ditto because of the characteristic chimneys and the short walled-in backyard. Specific value as part of a protecte

properties.name: Kalksteeg 22-24, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey block of two structures. Part of a compound of two blocks of three row-houses enclosing a small walled-in inner yard. One continuous gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof. Plain end gable. Each dwelling equipped with two dormers with tall windows and triangular frontons.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because it is part of a rare example of a compound of modest row-houses with a walled-in backyard. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kas di Alma Blou
properties.characteristics: Detached two-story structure with ridge parallel to street. Two parallel gable roofs enclosed by 19th century funnel-shaped gables. Three dormers on sides of roof. Adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Front façade: windows and doors laid out in five axes. Central balcony supported by columns. Five rhombic ornaments below cornice.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical 19th century funnel-shaped gables and the typical rhombic ornaments on the front façade. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kas di Bolo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio. U-shaped front section with hipped roofs. Rear wings on both sides of patio closed by backroom. Open front gallery with seven arches on front side and three arches on short sides supported by columns with fantasy Corinthian capitals. Gallery roof built as pseudo terrace with parapet of balusters. U-shaped front section with pseudo façade behind terrace. Fan-shaped stairs to front yard. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and art historical value because of a.o. the characteristic ornamentation of the front façade and the painted ceilings. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with main section and re

properties.name: Kas di Hubentud
properties.characteristics: Large symmetrically set-up monumental complex with main structure and additional buildings. Two-storey cube-shaped main building with hipped roof and adjoining one-storey rear gallery with lean-to roof. Front façade laid out in five axes with central doors and flanking shutter windows. Central balcony on first floor. Additional buildings include two one-storey side wings, a cistern and six one- storey structures in backyard, a.o. a kitchen building and two structures in corner of backyard. Gate in backyard wall positioned in central axis of complex. Two vase ornaments on flanking gate pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the classical style characteristics such as the cube shape, the symmetrical set-up of the main building, the cornice and the hipped roof. Cultural historical value as one of the 19th century mansions of the Penstr
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments (last quarter of

properties.name: Kas di Kanchi
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs over two adjoining rectangular blocks of different length. U -shaped verandah with gingerbread fretwork around smaller block. Façades equipped with profiled cornice, weather mouldings and quoins on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a dwelling with a traditional design. Ditto because of the verandah with typical gingerbread fretwork, rarely found on Curaçao. Ditto because of the premises' fence. Specific value as part of a pro

properties.name: Kas di Pueblo
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure with a large setback from the street. Steep hipped roof with dormers with triangular frontons on all hipped ends. Stone front addition with flat roof and cornice and wooden rear addition with slant roof on first floor, both supported by columns. Short front terrace with stairs with curved stone balustrade. Two covered cisterns positioned as transverse wings at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the late 19th century classicist character of the dwelling. Architectural historical and art historical value because of the front and rear addition and its detailing. Traditional customs value beca

properties.name: Keizershof
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Three hipped roofs parallel to Hoogstraat. Front façade: windows with arched mouldings, portico supported by double columns and front terrace with balustrade of wooden fretwork. Projecting cornice with dentils over all façades. Dentate quoins on corners. Wooden balcony over full frontage of rear façade supported by plain columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the portico with terrace and typical arched mouldings above door and windows of the front façade, the tall shutter windows and panelled shutter doors, and the rear balcony supported by columns. Specific value

properties.name: Keizershof
properties.characteristics: Detached two storey double structure covered with two similar parallel hipped roofs. Projecting profiled cornice, pilasters on corners. Façades divided by pilasters and a horizontal band,. During restoration a balcony was placed over the short front terrace to fit the four panelled shutter doors on the first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the profiled cornice and mouldings, the pilasters and the panelled shutter doors and windows. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Keizershof
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure accommodating two separate buildings with a narrow space in between. Two hipped roofs parallel to street, covered central corridor. Cornice over all façades. Front façade laid out in three axes with central panelled shutter door flanked by shutter windows, both on ground and first floor. Central wooden balcony with balusters made from wooden fretwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical panelled shutter doors, tall shutter windows and characteristic wooden balcony. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Keukenstraat 18, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure. Two parallel gable roofs with ridge perpendicular to the street. Front façade with two adjacent funnel-shaped gables and later on added closed six- window gallery with lean-to roof. Typical casement doors to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the 18th century funnel-shaped gables and the later on added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Keukenstraat 20A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Gable roof perpendicular to street. Funnel- shaped gable with tall window and plain top end consisting of a triangular fronton above a rectangular moulding. Later on added front gallery covered with lean-to roof with eaves overhang.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the 18th century funnel-shaped gable and the later on added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 17th / first half of 18th century

properties.name: Keukenstraat 8 / Smallesteeg 6, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure. Flat roof. High cornice built up with 'Ysselsteentjes', small yellow brickwork, and several horizontal bands over full-frontage of all three façades. Façades laid out in vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the regular lay-out of the façades with windows placed in vertical axes and several horizontal bands over the façades. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Klein Curacaostraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey partly concrete-built structure. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge and eaves. Front façade with wooden boarding. Panelled shutter door in centre flanked by shutter windows. All openings with rectangular fanlights and arched weather profile. Side façade with plastered wooden boarding
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a modest dwelling partly built up in concrete and in wood. Ditto because of the typical windows and plastered boarding side façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Klipstraat 11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Symmetrical façade lay-out. Gate to backyard. Front fence with low walls and two entrances.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Klipstraat 19, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front addition without monumental value.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the heavy, profiled cornice and the shutter windows with profiled weather mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Koningin Wilhelminastraat 13-19
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure accommodating four row- houses. One continuous slant roof. Flat cornice. Originally clamped doors and windows with clamped shutters. Oven and chimney on exposed short façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Koningstraat 13, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to the street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge. Profiled cornice. Front façade ranging with the street and laid out with door and tall window.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Koningstraat 15, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to the street. Three parallel hipped roofs with cement hips. Profiled cornice. Front façade ranging with the street and laid out with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional dwelling with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Koningstraat 37, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Flat concrete roof tiles used for roofing. Profiled cornice with pilasters on corners. Symmetrical façade lay-out. Kitchen addition with oven and chimney at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto because of the oven with chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijn K 36, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over front façade only. Symmetrical front façade ranging with alley. Panelled shutter door and shutter windows without weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijn K18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached concrete-built one-storey structure. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges. Profiled cornice over façades. Symmetrical front façade. Door and flanking windows with weather mouldings and pseudo consoles.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built dwelling with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijn K22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built corner structure. Hipped roof with stone hips and ridge. Projecting cornice, profiled on street façades. Windows with weather mouldings and pseudo consoles. Entrance through built-in porch. Concrete cistern against rear façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built porch dwelling with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijn K3-K4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-and-a-half-storey structure with the prominence of a country estate. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front and rear galleries. Cross wing with gable roof intersecting main block. 18th century funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and semicircular fronton as top end. Cornice over facades of cross wing. Cistern with aqueduct. Structure was restored in 1986, a.o. dentate coins added.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a rare 18th century two-storey dwelling. Ditto because of the unusual size and design. Ditto because of its location, originally in an open area, nowadays in a built-up urban area. Sp

properties.name: Kortijnweg 15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached, slightly deep-set one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two parallel hipped roofs with corrugated iron roofing and finials. Cornice over front façade only. Stone-built front façade with symmetrical lay-out. Door and flanking windows with plain weather mouldings. Side façade: wooden boarding.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 21, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with thee street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over façades. Front façade with symmetrical lay-out. Door and flanking windows without weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional dwelling, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade: flat cornice with rhombic decorations. Door and three windows with tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Side façade: wooden boarding with closed, plastered joints.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest traditional dwelling with hipped roof and wooden side façade, and as part of a ribbon development. Ditto because of decorated cornice and finishing of joints in boarding. Spe

properties.name: Kortijnweg 25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials, and overhangs at eaves. Front façade with three windows. Side entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 29, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front façade with cornice continuing over side-gate to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 33, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure in bend of street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Two hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front façade with cornice, lacking on other façades. Side-entrance with access to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with stone- built front façade. Two gable roofs parallel to street, gables finished with boarding. Side-gate with access to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and gable roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front façade with cornice, lacking on other façades. Side- gate with access to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 43, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Symmetrical front façade with corner pilasters and cornice, the latter lacking on the other façades. Short fence walls on sides with entrance to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roof, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 45, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure in bend of street. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and small plain moulding. Gable roof parallel to street with cement ridge and finials, gables finished with boarding. Short wall fences on sides and side-gate with pointed gable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and gable roof, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 47-49, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two small detached one-storey structures. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat.
