Two hipped roofs, parallel and perpendicular to street, with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façades with cornice, door and step (nr.47), and door and three windows (nr.49). Wooden side façade (nr.47)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. One of the oldest buildings of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Gable roof over core and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables. Front façade with symmetrical lay-out. Door and flanking windows with plain weather mouldings. External oven with chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest traditional stone-built dwelling in ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 53, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Gable roof parallel to street, gables with flat top ends. Front façade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. Door and windows with tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Short wall fences at sides with entrance to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional stone-built dwelling with a gable roof, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 57, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Wooden dwelling with stone- built front façade. Two gable roofs parallel to street covered with corrugated iron roofing. No cornice. Short wall fences with side-gate to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, wooden dwelling with stone-built front façade and gable roofs, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 58, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached concrete-built one-storey structure with adjoining front and rear additions. Pyramidal roof with finial over square floor plan. Front façade: porch with balustrade of cast cement elements and Curaçao tile flooring. Three sided bay window.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic and sound example of a concrete-built dwelling dating from the second quarter of the 20th century. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kortijnweg 63, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of the ribbon development along Kortijnstraat. Partly stone-built and partly wooden facades. Hipped roof parallel to street with cement hips and ridges with finials. Slightly lifted eaves. Symmetrical front façade with door and flanking windows. Short wall fences on sides with entrance to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest, traditional, partly stone-built and partly wooden dwelling with a hipped roof, and as part of a ribbon development. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscap

properties.name: Kranshi Bieuw
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure set back from building line. H-shaped floor plan covered with three hipped roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Continuing profiled cornice over façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade: central shutter door flanked with three shutter windows with weather mouldings on both sides. Two shutter windows on each wing. Large covered cistern with two arched aqueducts behind west wing.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical large building with hipped roofs and a typical floor plan rarely found on Curaçao. Ditto because of the large cistern and aqueducts. Specific value as part of a protected monumental towns

properties.name: Kura di Shon Fil main building
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure, main building of corral Kura di Shon Fil. Structure includes a portico with stairs, a small front section with two, and an adjoining wider section with three parallel hipped roofs. The sets of roofs are placed perpendicular to each other and are equipped with cement hips and ridges with finials. Rear side: terrace with cistern and two structures with service quarters.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the front façade with portico and the typical standard details. Cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura di Shon Ki
properties.characteristics: Corral compound with main building and open yard surrounded by secondary structures. Main structure with gable roof over core area. Four dormers with moulded triangular top end on each side of roof. Front gallery interrupted by a two-storey structure. Adjoining side wing. Front terrace with stone balustrade and stairs to yard. Servants quarters with one continuous lean-to roof leaning to front wall of premises. Two cisterns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical 18th century inward and outward curved gables, dormers and the front terrace with Ysselsteen masonry. Ditto because of the floor plan of the main building, typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical

properties.name: Kura di Shon Toms
properties.characteristics: Large walled-in corral compound. Two-storey main building with hipped roof and one-storey front, side and rear gallery. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade: core area with four tall windows and front gallery with alternating doors and windows. Walled-in front terrace with stairs to yard. Additional structures include a cistern and service quarters covered with a lean-to roof leaning to wall of corral. Similar small structure at the corral entrance. Access to main building lined with low stone walls.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the floor plan of the main building typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as a building which is part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure typical of Otrobanda. Specific value as
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structures. Lean-to roof leaning to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Roof chimney at rear side. Front façade: plain street wall with shutter door and shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-and-a-half storey structure with basement. Gable roof with dormers and funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Oculus above tall shutter window with weather moulding. Two panelled doors with wooden shutters in front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of such elements as a.o. the gables with 19th century top end and oculus, and the panelled doors. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Core area with gable roof and dormers, galleries with slant roofs on three sides of structure. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top end. Roof chimney on western gallery. Between structure and IJzerstraat nr.10-12 original stepped rubble stone street pavement.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. its characteristic location in the upper part of sloping IJzerstraat. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with galleries typical of Curaçao. Specifi
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: One-storey structures originally part of semi-detached set of four row-houses (nrs.2-8) One continuous lean-to roof leaning to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Front façades: plain street wall with two clamped wooden entrance doors. Small cistern and aqueduct on south façade. (Dwelling nr.6 was demolished to make way for a connection between IJzerstraat and Klipstraat)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as simple low-cost housing with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: One-and-a half storey structure built against neighbouring properties and ranging with alleyway. Part of corral with 'Bellevue' as main structure. Double slant roof. Front façade: central door flanked by tall windows, profiled cornice and weather mouldings above openings, pilasters on corners. Small tower-shaped addition at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached structure containing three small one-storey row-houses. Part of corral with 'Bellevue' as main structure. One continuous lean- to roof leaning to the wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Each dwelling equipped with chimney. Front façade: plain street wall with clamped entrance door and ditto window for each dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as structures which are part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with alley. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front façade: centrally placed panelled shutter door flanked by two windows with weather mouldings, front cornice with moulding of small blocks. Side access to premises through gate with triangular fronton.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of such elements as a.o. the ornamented front cornice and the front façade with symmetrical lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape and because its prominent position in IJzerstraat.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey structure with composite roof plan. Front façade: panelled shutter doors and windows positioned in five axes, profiled cornice and full-frontage horizontal band. Framed tablet with inscription 'no.38-40 1915'. East façade: six tall windows with weather mouldings on first floor and five windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of tablet with date on structure, the panelled doors and the shutter windows. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over galleries on three sides. Eaves on slant roofs on front and west side. Dormer with triangular fronton on both sides of gable roof. Front façade with panelled shutter door and two shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the rarely found slant roofs with eaves. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental to
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with finials. Rear and side additions. Profiled cornice on front and side façades, otherwise plain cornice. Façades: shutter windows with mouldings above and below the window frames, panelled door with side lights. Front wall of garden with gate and clamped door.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. such elements as the cornice and the window mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape and because of the structure's prominence in the townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure containing two dwellings with IJzerstraat 62 slightly set back from street. Part of corral with IJzerstraat 64 as main building. One continuous lean-to roof which leans to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Front façade: plain street wall with shutter doors and windows and plain weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the old corrals of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure located in yard. Main building of corral including structures IJzerstraat 60-62 and 70-74. Hipped roof with finials over core area and lean- to roofs over one-storey side galleries. Panelled doors with shutters and shutter windows. High corral separation walls along north, east and south side of corral. Entrance gate between IJzerstraat 60-62 and 70-74.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of such elements as a.o. the panelled doors, the shutter windows and the monumental entrance gate. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with galleries typica
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached structure accommodating three one-storey row- houses. Part of corral with IJzerstraat 64 as main building. Southern part with lean-to roof leaning on street wall, northern part with continuous gable roof and separation walls protruding above roofing. Front façade: plain street wall with shutter windows (nr.70) and façade with plain cornice, shutter doors and windows with plain weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of a corral typical of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure originally part of a semi-detached set of four row-houses (nrs.2-8) Lean-to roof leaning to front wall ranging with IJzerstraat. Front façade: plain street wall with clamped wooden entrance door and ditto tall window. (Dwelling nr.6 was demolished to make way for a connection between IJzerstraat and Klipstraat)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as low-cost housing with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over side galleries. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Additions to east and west façades and additional structures on premises a.o. a cistern and aqueduct. Front façade: cornice and full-frontage dentils, shutter windows and doors. Marble tablet with inscription: '1855, 1e wijk. 66'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached double structure made up of two connected identical two-storey wooden structures. Two external staircases to first floor, one separating both structures. Two parallel hipped roofs with overhangs; corrugated iron roofing. Front façade of each unit: cantilevered triangular fronton with profiled frame supported by five sawn and decorated consoles. Shutter doors on first floor opening to full-frontage wooden balconies supported by four cut consoles. Central door flanked by tall windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because wooden houses of this type and size are rare on Curaçao. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of such elements as a.o. the typical frontons, the wooden consoles and balconies, and the shutter doors a
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure, servants' quarters of former corral of demolished structure Langestraat 10-12. Gable roof and funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with square floor plan. Pyramidal roof with cement hips and finial. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade: first floor with two tall shutter windows and weather mouldings, ground floor with clamped door. Side façade: oven and chimney, staircase to balcony and entrance door on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the prominent situation on the corner of Langestraat and IJzerstraat. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with H-shaped floor plan. Gable roof over main section, separate gable roofs over four adjoining structures. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus. Cistern with slant roof in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an assembly of various adjoining buildings, all covered with separate gable roofs.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure, part of building complex Langestraat 40-54. Slant roof with high end towards yard. Clamped door and shutter in long and short façades.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached structure consisting of four row-houses. Part of building complex Langestraat 40-54. Slant roof with high end towards yard. Two dwellings with door, other two with door and window.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Part of building complex Langestraat 40-54. Gable roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Mark with year 1861. Front façade laid out in three axes. Full- frontage plain cornice and horizontal band above first floor windows. Cistern in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the 19th century building elements and details. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure. Part of building complex Langestraat 40-54. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roof over adjoining rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Front façade with full-frontage plain cornice and horizontal band above first floor windows. Wooden board with inscription 'N30 A 1855'. Rear gallery with chimney and oven.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel Compound
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends marked with year 1857. Profiled cornice over front and west façade. Front façade with doors and windows laid out in three axes, two full-frontage horizontal bands between rows of windows. Sash windows in interior wall separating core and galleries. Cistern with aqueduct and additional two-storey structure in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the 19th century building elements and details, and the sash windows between core and galleries. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Hotel compound
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure situated off the street. Two in line, joined gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Adjoining gallery covered with slant roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Three parallel hipped roofs over core area and front and rear gallery. Front façade: door and windows placed in four axes. Windows on first floor with inverted ogee arch below window sills, door and windows on ground floor with arched tympanum containing masonry mosaic. Profiled pilasters on corners. Two-storey structure at rear side covered with pyramidal roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the characteristic ornamentation of door and windows. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.characteristics: Detached mainly two-storey assembly of different building blocks. Main structure covered with two gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with19th century top ends; oculus in plastered star. Dormers on roof. Additional structures with gable and slant roofs. East façade: sash windows with glass bars. South façade: above door medallion with inscription '57 1861'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the complexity of the structure. Ditto because, together with the structures nrs.10-12 and nrs.16-20, it forms a characteristic and compact cul-de-sac with the original rubble stone street pavement.

properties.name: Kura Hulanda Museum
properties.characteristics: Complex of L-shaped and rectangular two-storey detached structures. L-shaped building covered with hipped roof and dormers with inward and outward curved top end, consoles and cheeks. Stairs to first floor with Ysselsteen masonry. Façade facing Sint Annabaai with arched gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the typical dormers, the characteristic balconies supported by columns, the use of Ysselsteen bricks for the stairs and the gate with flat arch. Architectural historical and cultural historical
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monumentts

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Identical to adjacent structure L.B. Smithplein 14. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 19th century top end. Front façade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. Roof chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with a traditional design and gable roof. Ditto because of the funnel-shaped gable and the chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Identical to adjacent structure L.B. Smithplein 12. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 19th century top end. Front façade with cornice and symmetrical lay-out. Roof chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with a traditional design and gable roof. Ditto because of the funnel-shaped gable and the chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached deep-set two-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Hipped roof with ridge parallel to square. Heavy profiled projecting cornice with consoles. Front façade laid out in three axes. Front entrance with portico with fluted Doric columns supporting an entablature and tympanum.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: L.B. Smithplein 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two detached structures forming one building complex. One- storey front structure and two-storey rear structure separated by an open two-storey gallery with staircases at both ends. Structures covered with three hipped roofs, parallel and perpendicular to square respectively. Central path to front entrance in axis of complex paved with red bricks and lined with low guiding walls of stone openwork set between pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with a traditional design and an urban two-storey dwelling. Cultural historical value as the former residence of L.B. Smith. Specific value as part of a protected monumenta

properties.name: La Bonanza
properties.characteristics: Complex made up of three two-storey structures. Nr.33: ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof with hipped end over rectangular floor plan. Front façade: triangular fronton with profiled moulding and dentils, fluted corner pilasters. Nr. 35-37: ridge parallel to street. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Inward and outward curved 18th century gable. Wooden balcony over front and side façade. Nr.41: situated in backyard. Gable roof with dormers over core area, slant roof over front gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of such elements as a.o. the fronton with ornamented mouldings, fluted pilasters on corners, the inward and outward curved gable, the weather mouldings with consoles, and the wooden balcony along the f

properties.name: La Maravilla
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with large street front. Front section with hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Dormers on all hipped ends. Rear section with hipped roof over central unit and pyramidal roofs over flanking units. Adjoining west wing with flat roof. Heavy cornice over façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade laid out in five axes with central triangular fronton above cornice. Original lay-out of first floor: three doors opening to front balcony with window on both sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an example of a block- shaped two-storey urban dwelling with a floor plan with central corridor rare on Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: La Maria
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure with 18th century origin. Drastically renovated in the 1930's. Three-storey main structure with two two-storey rear wings enclosing a half- covered inner court. Additional one-storey structure on western boundary of premises. Main structure with core and surrounding gallery, and projecting tower with pyramidal roof on northwest corner. Terrace over front gallery topped with parapet of cast balusters. Front façade laid out in five axes with wooden front balcony supported by columns and two staircases to front garden. Gate pillars marked with text 'La Maria' and 'n.58'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic decorative details and the authentic interior dating from the thirties. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and galleries typical

properties.name: La Moda de Paris
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure covered with hipped roof. Front façade with plain cornice and a frieze with name of shop 'La Moda de Paris' in plasterwork. Interior with staircase to wooden gallery following the interior walls on the first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic late-19th century façade with name of shop and typical interior shop gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: La Moda de Paris
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure covered with hipped roof. Front façade with plain cornice and a frieze with name of shop 'La Moda de Paris' in plasterwork. Doors and windows on ground floor shut off with folding panelled doors, panels with diagonal lathwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic late-19th century façade with name of shop and typical folding panelled doors. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Landhuis Barber
properties.characteristics: Large oblong structure with rectangular floor plan. Two- storey core area flanked with two one-storey galleries. Gable roof over core area enclosed by funnel-shaped gables. Lean-to roofs over galleries. Front façade: central door with three tall windows on both sides, four sash windows on first floor of core. Interior: arched openings between core area and galleries.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a rectangular core area surrounded by galleries, a lay-out typical of the country estates of Curaçao.

properties.name: Landhuis Bever
properties.characteristics: One-storey complex situated on a hilltop at Pos Cabai. Rectangular core area surrounded by galleries on three sides. Front addition. Gable roof over core area enclosed by funnel-shaped gables, slant roofs over surrounding galleries, low gable roof over front addition. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Full-frontage front and rear terrace with stairs. Cylindrical water wells in front part and on rear corners of premises. Two graves and wooden servant's quarter.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a composite lay-out with a core area, rear gallery and front addition. Historical value because of the 17th century graves, oldest on Curaçao, and because of its location clos
properties.construction_period: First half of 19th century, additional sections

properties.name: Landhuis Bloemhof
properties.characteristics: Symmetrically laid out main structure with two-storey core area and flanking one-storey open galleries and side wings. Gable roof over core area enclosed with pointed arched gables. Three dormers on both roof sides. Lean-to roofs over side galleries, slant roofs over side wings. Additional buildings and infrastructure include a.o. an oblong structure with magasina connected by an aqueduct, also a bathhouse, water wells, reservoirs and a water dam.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the lay-out with a core area and galleries typical of Curaçao, and because of the characteristic front and rear façades. Ensemble value of country estate complex with additional buildings i

properties.name: Landhuis Bona Vista
properties.characteristics: Relatively small complex with a composite lay-out consisting of a core area, two rear wings enclosing a gallery and a front addition with side sections. Gable roofs over core area, rear wings and front addition. Semicircular front and side terrace with detached kitchen. Front façade: central section marked with pilasters with central shutter door and tall attic window in gable with undulating rim, side sections with shutter windows and corner pilasters. Detached coach house.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a core area and additional sections built in phases, a.o terraces, kitchen and coach house. Architectural historical value because of the front façade and such elements as sas

properties.name: Landhuis Brakkeput Abou
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure constructed in three phases. Lay-out with three distinct sections. Western section: gable roof over core area, slant roofs over flanking galleries. Middle section: gable roof perpendicular to roof of first phase, enclosed by typical inward curved gables. Eastern section: gable roof parallel to middle section. Terraces on three sides. Water reservoir, water wells and dams on premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate built in phases. Ditto, because of the core, front and rear gallery, oldest lay-out typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the façades, stairs, roof with woo

properties.name: Landhuis Brakkeput Mei-Mei
properties.characteristics: Symmetrically laid out one-storey complex on elevated platform. Situated on hilltop. Main structure with core area and transverse side wings covered with gable roofs. Front and rear gallery covered with slant roofs. Ditto roofs for adjoining gallery additions Large front and rear terraces with stairs. Cistern and two additional structures with rectangular floor plan on premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a main lay-out and front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao, in this case with transverse additions and terraces. Ensemble value of country estate complex with additional bui

properties.name: Landhuis Brievengat
properties.characteristics: Large one-storey structure laid out on an elevated platform. Rectangular core area with front and rear gallery. Gable roof over core area enclosed by gables with ogee-shaped rims and semicircular top end, adjoining slant roof over galleries. Four dormers on both sides of roof. Open sixteen-arched front gallery. Adjoining cistern. Large full-frontage front terrace with two towers on corners and central stairs to estate grounds. Kitchen at rear side connected with covered corridor. Interior: arched openings between core area and side galleries. Additional structures: corrals, magasina, cisterns and lime kiln.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao, Brievengat being a comprehensive example with a regular set-up. Architectural historical value because of the lay-out and deta

properties.name: Landhuis Cas Abou
properties.characteristics: Large one-storey structure laid out on an elevated platform. Rectangular core area with front, rear and side gallery. Gable roof over core area enclosed by gables with shoulders, adjoining slant roof over galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. On one corner gallery interrupted by one-storey structure with hipped roof. Large terrace around property. Additional structures: magasina, coach house with threshing floor, cistern and typical toilet building.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the lay-out with a core area and galleries typical of Curaçao. Ensemble value of country estate complex with kitchen, magasina, coach house, threshing floor, cistern and toilet building.

properties.name: Landhuis Cas Cora
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure with front yard and rear terrace surrounded by various additional structures. Rectangular core area with front and rear gallery. Gable roof over core area enclosed by gables with shoulders, adjoining slant roof over galleries. Interior: typical openings between core area and adjacent rooms, and side galleries.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the lay-out with a core area and galleries typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the existing interior elements. Ensemble value of country estate complex with magasi

properties.name: Landhuis Chobolobo
properties.characteristics: Country estate complex with main structure and additional buildings. Main building: two-storey core area and ditto transverse front addition covered with gable roofs and closed with funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Lean- to roofs over adjoining one-storey rear gallery and front kitchen. Cistern with aqueduct. Additional structure and (possibly) stable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the lay-out with a core area, gallery and later additions. Architectural historical value because of such elements as the kitchen site with oven and the frames surrounding the windows. Ense

properties.name: Landhuis Choloma
properties.characteristics: Country estate complex with main structure and additional buildings. Main building: three parallel one-storey structures with gable roofs enclosed with plain gables. Adjoining kitchen with oven and cistern. Front façade with short terrace and central door flanked with two tall shutter windows on each side. Semicircular weather mouldings above windows and plastered image of a dove above door. Circular water well, water reservoir and magasina with stable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate laid out with three parallel sections and kitchen addition. Architectural historical value because of the detailing of the front façade. Ensemble value because of the coherence of

properties.name: Landhuis Daniel
properties.characteristics: One of the oldest country estates on Curaçao. Main structure and additional buildings. Main building: one- storey structure with core area, front, rear and side galleries. Transverse front addition in middle of core section. Typical steep gable roofs closed with funnel- shaped gables with classical top end. Kitchen addition and cistern with aqueduct on both sides. Newly built row-houses on old site, corral and remnants of magasina.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as one of the older country estates of Curaçao which features characteristic elements such as a core and galleries following a differing floor plan. Architectural historical value because of the detai

properties.name: Landhuis De Goede Hoop (Popo)
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Core area surrounded by galleries. Hipped roof with finials over core area, slant roof over adjoining galleries. Dentate coins on corners. Terrace with kitchen and fogon built onto north gallery. Curved stairs leading to terrace. Partly subterranean cistern on east side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate and country house with a characteristic lay-out featuring a core surrounded by galleries, and a kitchen with fogon typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the

properties.name: Landhuis Dokterstuin
properties.characteristics: Large complex laid out along a longitudinal axis. Dominating two-storey core area covered with hipped roof. Two adjoining one-storey side wings with gable roofs positioned in longitudinal axis. One-storey front and rear galleries with lean-to roofs. Front side: small central terrace and corner terraces with stairs. Additional structures: cistern, garage and rectangular structure built later on in front of main structure.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a characteristic lay-out with a core area and a front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the two-storey core area and the exterior
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments; year 1880

properties.name: Landhuis Groot Davelaar
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure following a centralised building concept. Octagonal three-storey core area covered with a tent roof and surrounded by two concentric galleries, the first gallery topped with a flat roof serving as a roof terrace and the second one covered with hipped ends. Profiled mouldings around core section and exterior gallery. Gallery façades laid out with arched openings separated by pilasters. Rectangular transverse section with kitchen and detached cistern. Small terrace with double stairs on east side, ditto with single staircase on west side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a well-preserved estate with cistern, unique on Curaçao because of its centralised set-up. Architectural historical value because of the meticulous details and the roof construction. Ditto because

properties.name: Landhuis Groot Kwartier
properties.characteristics: Originally one-storey U-shaped floor plan originally with open patio lined with columns. Later additions and alterations: addition of one storey; filling up of patio with two storeys; addition of front gallery supported by a row of columns. Entrance in axis position and facing Groot Kwartierweg. Cistern and graveyard on premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a complex building history. Architectural historical value because of the lay-out and such elements as the interior and exterior columns and the mouldings on façades and openi

properties.name: Landhuis Groot Santa Martha
properties.characteristics: One of the oldest country estates on Curaçao. Main structure and additional buildings and infrastructure. Main building positioned on elevated platform: one-storey U- shaped structure with core area, gallery with kitchen and storeroom, and transverse side wings enclosing a patio. Typical steep gable roofs closed with funnel-shaped gables with classical top end. Patio closed with wall with arched openings, middle opening topped with fronton. Terraces with stairs on three sides. Stables, large magasina, drinking reservoirs for animals, typical cisterns with steps for human access, and hofi.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as one of the older well-preserved country estates of Curaçao.

properties.name: Landhuis Groot Sint Joris
properties.characteristics: Large complex with main structure and additional buildings. Main building: one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan divided in three equal sections. Three parallel hipped roofs over sections, core section with hipped and gable end. Front façade: core section closed with almost semicircular gable with a palmet in top end, flanking sections with slightly curved rim with volute ornamentations. Cistern with aqueduct on rear side. Large closed front terrace surrounded by additional buildings. Rear terrace with semicircular middle section. Cow stable and large well on premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a lay-out in three sections typical of Curaçao and equipped with terraces. Architectural historical value because of such elements as the façade with tablet, the use of brick,

properties.name: Landhuis Grote Berg (Seru Grandi)
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure situated on a hilltop. Steep hipped roof with dormers with typical triangular gables / frontons on hipped ends of roof. Cornice over all façades. Small terrace with stairs on west side. Servant's dwelling (kunuku-dwelling), remnants of baking oven and additional buildings on premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the excepional set-up with two storeys and the typical frontons of the dormers. Historical value because of the existing remnants of a fornu di pan and additional buildings including a servant's dwelling, and beca
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Landhuis Habaai
properties.characteristics: Two-storey complex with original 18th century structure and transverse19th century addition. Original structure: rectangular floor plan with full two-storey core and ditto flanking galleries. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Inward and outward curved gables. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Front façade: seven-arched open arcade on ground floor and six sash windows on first floor. Front terrace with stairs. Rear façade: open arcade on ground and first floor. Rear terrace surrounded by additions.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a country house with a core and galleries typical of Curaçao and because of the 18th century baroque side façades. Cultural historical value as an example of a totally two-storey country house in the outskirts of the town
properties.construction_period: Mid 18th / second half of 19th century (eastern side

properties.name: Landhuis Hato
properties.characteristics: Plantation complex with main building, graveyard and a hofi equipped with an irrigation system. Main building: rectangular floor plan with core area and flanking galleries. Steep hipped roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs with eaves over galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Addition with a.o. kitchen. Current rear façade with full-frontage walled-in terrace. Former hofi with irrigation system and graveyard on plantation grounds.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house with a core and galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as an ensemble of a country house, graveyard and hofi with irrigation system. Historical value because of the plantation

properties.name: Landhuis Hel
properties.characteristics: Plantation complex laid out on an elevated platform. One- storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Core area surrounded by galleries. Steep hipped roof over core area with slightly lifted eaves over surrounding galleries. Two dormers on both long sides of roof, one dormer on short hipped ends. Full-frontage front and rear terrace with stairs. Vaulted cistern under rear terrace. Two additional buildings on premises.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house with a core and galleries typical of Curaçao, and terraces. Architectural historical value because of such elements as a.o. the terrace stairs, the kitchen with fogon and the vaulte

properties.name: Landhuis Hermanus
properties.characteristics: Plantation complex with neo-classicist front part and traditional style rear part. Front part: two-storey core area and one-storey front gallery. Hipped roof with finials over core and lean-to roof over gallery. Rear part: one-storey core area surrounded by galleries on three sides and fogon. Gable roof over core and slant roof over galleries. Elevated terrace with stairs on three sides. Covered cistern next to front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house which consists of two parts with deviating and distinct architectural styles stemming from different periods. Architectural historical value because the kitchen with fogon. Historic

properties.name: Landhuis Jan Kok
properties.characteristics: Former salt plantation with main structures laid out on an elevated platform. Main building: one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Front terrace with slave bell and cistern below terrace floor. Plantation facilities include: a magasina, remnants of corrals, wells, pos di pia and remnants of saltpans.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house with a core and galleries typical of Curaçao. Ditto because of the unique 18th century magasina, the cistern below the terrace and the storeroom in the base. Monumental ensemble val

properties.name: Landhuis Jan Thiel
properties.characteristics: Plantation complex with main building and additional structures. Main building: rectangular floor plan with core area and slightly longer galleries than core. Typical steep hipped roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over galleries. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Short terraces surrounding the property. Plantation facilities include cisterns, a small dwelling, a stable with feeding and drinking trays, two clustered magasina's, two corrals and a water reservoir.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house with a core, front and rear gallery and terraces, typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of old elements such as the dormers. Ensemble value as a country estate

properties.name: Landhuis Janwe
properties.characteristics: Former water plantation complex and country house. Relative small one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Three and two dormers on roof sides. Full-frontage front terrace with stairs. Plantation facilities include: an additional building, cistern, coach house and well.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house with a core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao, transverse wing and terraces. Architectural historical value because of elements such as funnel- shaped gables with 19th cent

properties.name: Landhuis Klein Santa Martha
properties.characteristics: Former plantation with a mixed exploitation of salt, cattle and agriculture. Compact complex on a hilltop laid out on an elevated terrace. Main building: one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Funnel- shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Detached kitchen and two additional structures on terrace, cistern below terrace floor. Magasina east of complex.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house with core and galleries typical of Curaçao, terraces and additional structures. Architectural historical value because of elements such as a.o. the cooking site in the kitchen, the

properties.name: Landhuis Morgenster
properties.characteristics: Relatively small one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan laid out on elevated platform. Core area flanked with galleries. Gable roof over core area and slant roofs over galleries. Gables with shoulders. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Part of rear roof is lifted to allow for a stairway. Terraces on three sides, front and side stairs.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house with a core and galleries, a lay out typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as a former plantation house used as a country house in the 19th century.

properties.name: Landhuis Noordkant
properties.characteristics: Plantation complex with main building and additional structures laid out on terraces. Main building: rectangular floor plan with core area and galleries. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Plantation facilities include: adjoining transverse structures, magasina, coach house and corrals, stable, well and tanki .
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country house with galleries and terraces. Architectural historical value because of the roof construction with wooden wall-cramps, the use of bricks, the magasina roof and the cistern. Ensemble

properties.name: Landhuis Oost Jongbloed
properties.characteristics: Group of two small one-storey structures dating from late- 19th century and early-20th century. Oldest structure: remnant of former country estate complex. Rectangular block covered with gable roof enclosed with funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Later structure: Transverse positioned block with hipped roof, cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over façades, quoins on corners. Well- preserved original interior. Connecting corridor with slant roof between structures.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a group of two connected traditional dwellings dating from different periods with distinct architectural styles. Cultural historical value because of the well-preserved original interior of the 192
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Landhuis Papaya
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan placed on an elevated platform. Three adjoining parallel sections, each covered with a hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades, fluted pilasters on front corners. Front façade: dormer above central shutter door, flanking shutter windows. Front and rear terrace with stairs. Cistern at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate laid out with three parallel sections covered with hipped roofs, and equipped with terraces. Architectural historical value because of the well-preserved state and the meticulous d

properties.name: Landhuis Parera
properties.characteristics: Country estate, later on used as country house, situated on a hilltop. Rectangular, oblong floor plan laid out on an elevated platform. Two-storey core covered with gable roof, adjoining one- storey flanking galleries with lean-to roofs leaning to core façades. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Profiled cornice over first floor core façades. Profiled cornice with dentils and drapery ornamentation over ground floor façades. Full-frontage terraces over long side of structure with stairs .
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate / country house with a core and flanking galleries, a lay-out typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the exceptional first floor and the design of cornices,

properties.name: Landhuis Rust en Vrede
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan with adjoining cistern. Core area surrounded by galleries. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Small front terrace and full-frontage rear terrace. Interior: exceptionally high ceiling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a core surrounded by galleries typical of Curaçao, and a cistern and terraces. Architectural historical value because of such elements as the high core area and arched passage

properties.name: Landhuis San Juan
properties.characteristics: One of the oldest plantations of the island. Main building with rectangular floor plan laid out on elevated platform. One-storey structure with core area surrounded by galleries. Hipped roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Full-frontage front and rear terrace. Additional structures include a kitchen, a fornu di pan and salt grinders on the rear terrace, a group of magasina's with cistern connected with an aqueduct to the main building. Also a magasina, corrals and a graveyard enclosing a large walled-in rectangular open area with gate in front of the main building.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a country estate with a core surrounded by galleries, a lay-out typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate which, almost without alterations, has been preserved in its o

properties.name: Landhuis San Nicolas
properties.characteristics: Country estate complex situated on a hilltop west of Santa Marthabaai. Main building with rectangular floor plan laid out on elevated platform. One-storey structure with core area surrounded by galleries. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Typical truncated gables on short ends. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Terraces around main building with kitchen, cistern and bathhouse. Terrace stairs on four sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a country estate with a core surrounded by galleries, truncated gables and an old bath with cement tub. Ensemble value of plantation complex with additional buildings and well.

properties.name: Landhuis San Sebastian
properties.characteristics: Main 18th century structure with 19th century additions on elevated platform. Main structure: one-storey building with core area and flanking galleries. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over adjoining galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with classical top ends. Additions include a transverse two-storey block structure with gable roof positioned over southern gallery, two one-storey wings enclosing a patio laid out against the eastern short end of the main building, and a kitchen. Complex is surrounded by terraces.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with a core and galleries, a lay-out typical of Curaçao, and a kitchen with fogon. Architectural historical value because of the 18th century gable with date. Ensemble value as cou
properties.construction_period: 18th century, 1754 mark in top of gable / 19th

properties.name: Landhuis Savonet
properties.characteristics: One of the oldest and largest plantations on the island with a comprehensive well-preserved set of facilities. Main building rebuilt in 18th century style. One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan laid out on elevated platform. Core area and flanking galleries. Gable roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Terrace on all four sides. Plantation facilities include a.o. magasina's, stables, corrals, dairy and milling house, forge, threshing floor, cistern and remnants of the former slave settlement. Also a hofi with wells, pos di pia, water reservoirs, water dams and canals.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a country estate with a core, front and rear galleries, a lay-out typical of Curaçao, and a fogon and terraces. Historical value as one of the oldest and largest plantations on the island which, as one of the few plantati

properties.name: Landhuis Siberie
properties.characteristics: Country estate complex with main building and a comprehensive set of facilities. Main building with rectangular floor plan laid out on elevated platform. One- storey structure with core area surrounded by galleries. 19th Century hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over core area, original slant roofs over galleries. Internal kitchen with fogon and fornu. Terrace with stairs on all four sides. Facilities include a.o. magasina's, corrals, plantation manager's dwelling, toilet house, indigo reservoirs, and remnants of the former slave settlement and plantation walls.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with core and surrounding galleries, a lay- out typical of Curaçao. Ditto because of such elements as the kitchen with fogon and fornu and the toilet house. Cultural historical val
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments (mid-18th

properties.name: Landhuis Urdal
properties.characteristics: One of the smaller country houses around Schottegat situated in a hofi. Rectangular floor plan with two one- storey adjoining rectangular blocks covered with hipped roofs and finials. Dormers on three outer hipped ends of front block, on rear hipped end of rear block and as connection between roofs. Small front terrace and rear balcony with stairs. Adjoining cistern, and well with water reservoir.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate which has been built as a country house. Architectural historical value because of the typical lay- out with two adjoining rectangular blocks covered with hipped roofs and finials.

properties.name: Landhuis van Engelen
properties.characteristics: Country estate with rectangular floor plan laid out on a low platform. One-storey structure with core area surrounded by galleries. Typical steep hipped roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries. Three dormers on long hipped ends, one dormer on short ends. Cistern built against northern short façade. Full-frontage front and rear terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with core and surrounding galleries, a lay- out typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the typical 18th century hipped roof and the dormers with baroque tops

properties.name: Landhuis Veeris
properties.characteristics: Country estate complex with main building and additional structures. Main building: one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with triangular fronton and inward and outward curved gables at gallery level. Full-frontage front terrace and ditto short rear terrace. Additional structures include a two-storey cistern and a magasina connected with three arches to the main building.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value because of the combination of inward and outward curved gables with funnel-shaped gable ends with fronton indicating a transition phase around 1800. Architectural historical value as a country estate with core and surrounding gal
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments (around 1800)

properties.name: Landhuis Vredenberg
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure with a rectangular floor plan and situated in a hofi. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over flanking galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Kitchen with oven and chimney adjacent to rear gallery. Front façade laid out in five axes with sash windows on the first floor and a central door flanked with two windows on both sides. Magasina and cistern close to main building, hofi with dams, wells and water reservoir.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with core, front and rear galleries, a lay- out typical of Curaçao, in this case laid out over two storeys. Architectural historical value because of such element as sash windows a
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th / first quarter of 20th century.

properties.name: Landhuis Weitje (Wechi)
properties.characteristics: Small country estate. One-storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over flanking galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Pointed gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Wooden wall-cramps on gables. Kitchen with fogon in rear gallery. Facilities include a magasina, corral, well and water reservoir.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with core, front and rear galleries, a lay- out typical of Curaçao. Ensemble value of country house, additional buildings and well.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments (probably early

properties.name: Landhuis Zeelandia
properties.characteristics: Typical structure with a cruciform floor plan built in phases. 18th Century section: one-storey core area with gable roof surrounded by galleries with adjoining slant roofs enclosed with inward curved gables. 19th Century section: two-storey transverse section with gable roof. Gables drastically altered during restoration. Large detached oblong pseudo 18th century wing built in 1945 (not protected).
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with an old core with galleries with transverse extension. Architectural historical value because of the 18th century façades and dormers, galleries and terrace stairs. Ensemble va

properties.name: Landhuis Zuurzak (Sorsaka)
properties.characteristics: Country estate with a U-shaped floor plan laid out on terraces and used as a country house in the 19th century. Main section with gallery and side wings enclosing a patio. Arcade between side wings as entrance and patio closure. Continuing gable roof over main section and side wings, slant roof over gallery. Additional structures include typical tower structures with pyramidal roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a country estate with core and gallery, a lay-out typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the neo-classicist style of the patio. Ditto because of the building history indicati
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Lombokstraat 4-6, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small block containing two modest one-storey row-houses, part of a larger housing complex. Gable roof over main room, adjoining slant roof over back room. Exposed gable: funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end and semicircular oculus. Front façade with central door and flanking windows for each unit.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as examples of modest low-income traditional 19th century housing. Cultural historical value as part of the old built-up area of Penstraat containing a mix of luxurious and modest housing. Specific va
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Lopez de Morlastraat 2, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs with hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade symmetrically laid out with door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Side entrance with elegant door to backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical stone-built traditional urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto because of the side entrance. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Lopez de Morlastraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Hipped roof perpendicular to street with hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front façade symmetrically laid out with door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Detached oven with chimney at rear side of dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical stone-built traditional urban dwelling with a hipped roof. Ditto because of the detached oven. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Luna Blou complex
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two gable roofs parallel to street. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end, the front one with small window and the rear one with oculus. Eastern side façade with wooden balcony and staircase access.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Luna Blou complex
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure built on half-storey basement. Hipped roof with heavy cornice over all façades and topped with stone ornaments at roof corners. Front façade with entrance door and windows laid out in three axes. Full frontage balcony with balustrade of stone openwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical ornamented cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Maduro and Curiel's Bank
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with attic under mansard roof. Profiled cornice under attic. Front façade with two balconies on consoles. Windows with leaded fanlights. Small towers with pointed roofs on corners supported by consoles.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the windows with alternating size and the symmetrical small balconies and corner towers. Cultural historical value as the oldest building of Maduro and Curiel's Bank. Specific value as part of a protected mon

properties.name: Madurostraat 10-18, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Gable roof with dormers. Front façade with two plain funnel-shaped gables above cornice. Gables with weather mouldings only, matching windows removed. Full- frontage horizontal band below windows; similar band above windows missing.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the small funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Madurostraat 21, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-and-a-half storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Oblong structure with roof stretched between Madurostraat and Sha Caprileskade. Gable roof with eaves and four dormers on each roof side. Both façades with plain funnel-shaped gables and 19th century top ends, semicircular oculus and tall windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the rarely found eaves, and the conspicuously large dormers. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Madurostraat 24, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Twin structure of Madurostraat 26. Gable roof. Pointed gable with heavily profiled moulding with dentils and window. Profiled moulding and various horizontal bands over full-frontage of both structures. Windows in asymmetric position.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the pointed gable which forms a twin gable with the one of Madurostraat 26. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Madurostraat 26, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Twin structure of Madurostraat 24. Gable roof. Pointed gable with heavily profiled moulding with dentils and window. Profiled moulding and various horizontal bands over full-frontage of both structures. Windows in symmetric position.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the pointed gable which forms a twin gable with the one of Madurostraat 24. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Madurostraat 28A/B, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey double-structure on corner. Two parallel gable roofs with ridges perpendicular to street. Front façade: two adjacent identical funnel-shaped gables with profiled mouldings,19th century top end and small window. Two by two French windows on first floor with semicircular pseudo fanlights. Later on designed six-bay open arcade supported by belly-shaped columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Madurostraat 46A-48, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey double-structure on corner. Two parallel gable roofs with ridges perpendicular to street. Gables with plain thin moulding and tall windows, two and one respectively. First floor: seven cross-bar framed windows with arched pseudo fanlights set between horizontal bands on front façade, ditto on side and rear façades.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the balanced positioning of the windows and the continuing horizontal bands. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Madurostraat 8, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Gable roof with dormer. Front façade with cornice and decorated parapet friezes over full-frontage of first and second floor. Windows laid out in three vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the symmetrical lay-out and the decorated parapet friezes. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Mansion 'Obra di Man
properties.characteristics: Characteristic Scharloo-type mansion. Hipped roof perpendicular to the street over sala, front and rear gallery. Rear addition and side wings enclosing a patio. Rectangular front façade topped with low triangular fronton. Stairs with slightly curved stone openwork balustrades. Fence with tall pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a balanced façade lay-out with characteristic classicist elements and details. Architectural historical and traditional customs value as a typical example of a Scharloo-type mansion. Specific value as part of a pr

properties.name: Mansion 'Puerto Rico
properties.characteristics: Large one-storey Scharloo-type urban dwelling with fully enclosed rear patio. Composite roof which consists of a system of hipped roofs with dormers. Main section with sala and front gallery. Rear gallery and wings covered with U- shaped hipped roof. Façades with openings in vertical axes and topped with triangular frontons. Front façade with triangular fronton and medallion, central door with flanking windows. Front and side stairs to front section.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the characteristic floor plan with core area, front and rear gallery, and patio typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the balanced lay- out of the façades with typic

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 11-13, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Design identical to adjacent structure Mgr. Niewindtstraat 7-9A. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice with dentils over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front and rear façade laid out in three vertical axes. Front balcony on first floor, doors and windows with moulded frames. Short front terrace with balustrade. Side staircase to first floor entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban structure with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 16-18, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes. Full- frontage front balcony on first floor, doors and windows with moulded frames. Short front terrace with balustrade. Side staircase to first floor entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban structure with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the mouldings, the balcony and the street balustrade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 17-19, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Exposed concrete frame construction. Hipped roof perpendicular to street. Cement hips and ridges. Cornice over all façades. Front façade laid out in two pairs of two vertical axes. Front balcony on first floor, doors and windows with weather mouldings. Short front terrace with balustrade. Side staircase to first floor entrance
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban structure with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the concrete frame construction. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 20, Seru Domi
