properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Composite pattern of hipped roofs. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out with central door and windows with tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Full frontage low triangular fronton and decorated infill with medallion. Short front terrace with balustrade. Oven addition with chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the mouldings and the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 24, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Composite pattern of hipped roofs. Cornice with dentils over front façade, plain cornice over other façades. Pilasters on corners. Front façade: three panelled shutter doors with weather mouldings. Short front terrace with balustrade. Oven addition with chimney and cistern.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the oven and the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 26, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Three parallel hipped roofs (front one shorter) with cement hips and ridges wit finials. Cornice with dentils over front façade, plain cornice over other façades. Double pilasters on corners. Façade surfaces plastered with rustic-work pattern. Front façade: three panelled shutter doors with weather mouldings. Short front terrace with balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the oven and the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 30-32, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street with cement hips and ridges wit finials. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with doors and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Front balcony with staircase. Balcony on rear façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban structure with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 35, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs of unequal length. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades, pilasters on corners, one pilaster dividing the front façade in two unequal sections. Concrete built façades with plastered block pattern. Short front terrace with concrete balustrade and stairs to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built dwelling with a traditional design with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 36, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with full-frontage short front porch. Hipped roof with corrugated cement roofing. Concrete-built façades with natural stone block pattern. Front façade with door and flanking windows. Front porch with low arches supported by fluted and bossed Corinthian columns on high base.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a 20th century urban dwelling with hipped roofs and classical details. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 37, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over three façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Short front terrace with balustrade and stairs to street at both short ends. Cistern covered wit hipped roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a sound traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 50-52, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes, cornice with dentils, pilasters on corners. Full-frontage wide horizontal band and front balcony on first floor. Side staircase to first floor entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban structure with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 6-8, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey concrete-built block-shaped structure. Core, front and rear gallery with hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Front and rear façade laid out in three vertical axes, all doors and windows equipped with weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Ditto, as a two-storey urban structure with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mgr.Niewindtstraat 7-9A, Seru Domi
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Design identical to adjacent structure Mgr. Niewindtstraat 11-13. Two hipped roofs parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front and rear façade laid out in three vertical axes. Front balcony on first floor, doors and windows with moulded frames. Short front terrace with balustrade. Side staircase to first floor entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban structure with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mi Rancho
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey dwelling. Three parallel hipped roofs, the two front roofs smaller than the rear one. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with ornate cornice and weather mouldings, quoins on corners. Central door and flanking windows, all provided with fanlights. Fence with square stone pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional medium-sized dwelling covered with hipped roofs. Ditto because of ornate cornice and weather mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Middenstraat 8, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey corner structure. Gable roof with funnel- shaped gable with classical top end, small triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Later on added front gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the funnel- shaped gable with late- 17th / early-18th century top end and because of the added gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Mikvé Israël Synagogue
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure enclosed by three streets. Three parallel gable roofs. Enclosing façades consist of three inward and outward curved gables which jointly form one façade. Façades divided in three bays by moulded standpipes and pillars. All windows are tall windows with semicircular moulded fanlights. Interior: one nave and two aisles divided by heavy round columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of i.a the fine lay- out of the façades. Art value because of the antique mahogany furniture and the copper and silver chandeliers and ornaments. Cultural historical value as the oldest synagogue in the western hemis

properties.name: Molenplein 12-19, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-and-a-half storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof with dormers over core area and slant roofs over surrounding galleries. Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular top end and heavy curls at lower ends. Central transverse section with gable roofs. Front façade: entrance on first floor with two symmetrically placed L-shaped stairs to front door and balcony. All four galleries have sash windows on first floor and arch decorations on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic 18th century inward and outward curved gables and arches. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value

properties.name: Molenplein z/n, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached mainly two-and-a-half storey structure with U-shaped floor plan. Gable roof over core area enclosed with inward and outward curved gables and slant roof over front gallery. Two transverse wings with gable roof closed with funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Small two storey addition built against front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic inward and outward curved gables. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected m
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 19-27, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached set of five one-storey row-houses. One continuous gable roof over all units enclosed with plain funnel-shaped gables. Identical façade lay-out for each dwelling which consists of a clamped door flanked by ditto windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of low-cost urban row-housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th /first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-and-a-half storey corner structure ranging with street. Gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Plain cornice over façades. Front façade with dormer above cornice. Central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a stone-built dwelling with a traditional design and hipped roofs. Ditto because of the funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Monte Bellosraat 7-9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built structure. Two parallel hipped roofs over small front and larger rear section. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades. Symmetrical front façade with pilasters on corners. Concrete cistern in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built dwelling with a traditional design and hipped roofs. Ditto because of the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Part of corral compound of Breedestraat 192A. Two parallel hipped roofs in shifted position. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front facade with two doors and flanking windows and front terrace with typical balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the standard details and the terrace with characteristic balustrade. Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Naniesteeg 25-27, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Part of corral compound with the structures Naniesteeg 33-37 and 39-45.Gable roof over core area, slant roof over rear gallery with roof chimney. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends and oculus. Mark with year 1857. Two dormers on both sides of roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical standard details. Cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrob

properties.name: Naniesteeg 30-38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached structure made up of five one-storey row-houses with chimneys. . Part of corral compound Kura di Shon Fil. One continuous gable roof over units enclosed with plain gables. No cornice. Identical façade lay-out with central door and flanking windows for each dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Naniesteeg 33, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Part of corral compound with the structures Naniesteeg 25-27, 33-37 and 39-45. Gable roof with funnel-shaped gables and 19th century top ends. Chimney built against side façade.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Naniesteeg 35-37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached structure made up of two one-storey dwellings. Part of corral compound with the structures Naniesteeg 25-27, 33 and 39-45. Staggered gable roofs and slant roofs over core area and rear gallery. Double roof chimney at rear side. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century op end. Two symmetrically laid out façades with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical standard details. Cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrob

properties.name: Naniesteeg 39-45, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached structure made up of four one-storey row- houses with chimneys. Part of corral compound with the structures Naniesteeg 25-27, 33 and 35-37. One continuing gable roof with separation wall in middle projecting above roof surface. Cornice over façades. Identical symmetrical façade lay-out with central door and flanking windows for each dwelling.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Naniesteeg 40-50, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Row-house structure with two sets of three adjoining structures. Part of corral compound Kura di Shon Fil. Gable roofs. No cornices. Rear addition with two storeys (nrs. 46-50). Identical symmetrical façade lay-out with central door and flanking windows for each dwelling unit.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Naniesteeg 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure. Gable roof with dormers over core area, slant roof over front gallery. Gable with plain moulding, oculus and clamped window. Front façade with door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the dormers and the gable. Cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Naniesteeg 52, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Part of corral compound Kura di Shon Fil. Gable roof enclosed with plain gables. No cornice. Symmetrical façade lay-out with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Naniesteeg 8-24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Set of nine one-storey row-houses. Part of corral compound of Frederikstraat 148. Row-houses are covered with both gable roofs and slant roofs with high end facing the street. Front façade ranging with the alley. Symmetrical façade lay-out with central door and flanking windows for each dwelling unit.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 16-22, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey concrete-built double structure with rectangular floor plan. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with balconies, doors and windows in mirror-image lay-out.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a double structure for which, with the modern application of (finger-corral) concrete, a connection with the existing older architecture had been sought. Specific value as part of a p

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 2, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey concrete-built corner structure with oblong floor plan. Flat roof. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with door with fanlight and balcony on first floor and door with side lights on ground floor. Short windows on side façades.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block-shaped building for which, with the modern application of (finger-corral) concrete, a connection with the existing older architecture has been sought. Specific value as part o

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 28, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-and-a-half storey structure. End unit of a block of row-houses facing Kalksteeg. Gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof and funnel-shaped gable with19th century top end. Front façade with door on ground floor and tall window in gable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of low-cost urban housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 30, Punda
properties.characteristics: End unit of a block of three one-storey structures facing Kalksteeg. Part of a compound of two blocks of three row- houses enclosing a small walled-in rear yard. Gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Front façade with panelled door and flanking shutter windows on ground floor and tall shutter window in gable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because it is part of a rare example of a compound of modest row-houses with a walled-in backyard. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 32, Punda
properties.characteristics: End unit of a block of three one-storey structures facing Schoonesteeg. Part of a compound of two blocks of three row- houses enclosing a small walled-in rear yard. Gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Front façade with panelled door and flanking shutter windows on ground floor and tall shutter window in gable.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because it is part of a rare example of a compound of modest row-houses with a walled-in backyard. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 38-40, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Pyramidal roof with cement hips and finial. Brick chimney at rear side. Openings on ground and first floor not matching. Central balcony on first floor removed.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a detached two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 4-6, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey concrete-built structure with rectangular floor plan. Basically identical to Nieuwestraat 6-8. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with full-frontage balcony, door and windows laid out in three vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a building for which, with the modern application of (finger-corral) concrete, a connection with the existing older architecture had been sought. Specific value as part of a protected

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 42-44, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped corner structure. Probably flat roof. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners of first floor. Front façade: full-frontage horizontal and meander band and three windows with weather mouldings, ground floor with irregular lay-out of openings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block-shaped two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 50-60, Punda
properties.characteristics: Large detached block of three adjoining two-storey structures with fronts to street. Front section with three parallel hipped roofs perpendicular to street, rear section with transverse hipped roof. All roofs equipped with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, full pilasters on corners and at dividing line of structures over first floor only. Regular window lay-out on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of three adjoining urban structures accommodating apartments on ground and first floor, each with its own entrance. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Nieuwestraat 8-10, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey concrete-built corner structure with rectangular floor plan. Basically identical to Nieuwestraat 4-6. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with full-frontage balcony, door and windows laid out in three vertical axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a building for which, with the modern application of (finger-corral) concrete, a connection with the existing older architecture had been sought. Specific value as part of a protected

properties.name: none
properties.characteristics: Small two-storey structure built against adjoining properties. Ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Dormer on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top end. Front façade: cornice, three windows above full- frontage horizontal band.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Old Meat Market
properties.characteristics: Detached concrete-built one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof covered with slates. Rectangular floor plan with seventeen arched openings with clamped doors opening to seventeen-arch arcade gallery. Heavy cornice with low parapet.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of i.a the orderly façade lay-out. Cultural historical value as the former slaughterhouse and meat market. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Pachi di Sola
properties.characteristics: Detached 18th century two-storey mansion with deep setback from street. Four gable roofs forming a cruciform roof plan. Roof ends closed by18th century and 19th century gables respectively. Front balcony flanked with stairs. Façades with sash windows. Side addition with two parallel gable roofs. Former cistern and coach house. Stone wall fence.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value because of characteristic 18th century inward and outward curved gables, open gallery and balcony flanked by stairs, and steps featuring ornaments in coral stone and 'Ysselsteen'-masonry. Specific value as part of a protected mon
properties.construction_period: First half of 18th century, adaptations in second

properties.name: Pater Euwensweg z/n, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large two-storey structure set back from the street on deep lot. Rectangular floor plan with core surrounded by galleries. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Front façade laid out in axes with stairs leading to door on first floor. Front terrace with stairs to yard. Rear façade with L-shaped balcony supported by columns. Additional buildings lining the edges of front and rear yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the balanced façade lay-out. Ditto, as an example of a large urban dwelling with additional buildings situated in a corral. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with a c

properties.name: Penha Building
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey structure. Core and side gallery topped with two corner balconies and three pavilions placed perpendicular to core. Gable roofs over core and three pavilions, all closed by inward and outward curved gables with profiled mouldings, volutes and semicircular top ends. Front and side façade with arcades. All facades have tall shutter windows flanked by pilasters. Windows of gallery in addition equipped with moulded arches.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic 18th century gables, the arcades and the rich plastered ornamentation. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the gallery added later on, typical of Punda. Specif
properties.construction_period: 1708 marked on east and west gable tops / Gallery

properties.name: Penstraat 15-19, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure with a wide street frontage and slightly set back position. Low gable roof with a full-frontage span and triangular fronton with plasterwork star. Front façade: two sections separated by a pilaster in the middle and pilasters on corners. Left section laid out in four vertical axes with two doors in the centre, right section with three vertical axes with one door in centre. Balconies not original or replacements.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spaciously laid out two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Penstraat 3, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with composite floor plan. Main roof with ridge parallel to street. Main section with typical steep gable roof over rectangular area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Central transverse front addition with lower gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Cistern against rear gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a dwelling along trunk road on former boundary of town. Architectural historical value because of the façades and the mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Penstraat 36, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure on narrow, deep lot. Two-storey front section covered with two parallel gable roofs and gallery with slant roof. One-storey rear section with two transverse wings enclosing a patio. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with central shutter doors and flanking shutter windows on both floors. Triangular fronton above cornice. Central balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the late 19th century character of the dwelling. Architectural historical and art historical value because of the assembly marks in the front roof truss. Art history value because of the distinctly
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments (probably first

properties.name: Penstraat 41-45, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Two identical small one-storey structures with ridges parallel to street and separated by a narrow entrance to back yard. Rectangular floor plans covered with gable roofs enclosed by funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Front façades with two alternating doors and windows for each structure.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as examples of sober low-cost dwellings with characteristics of 19th century traditional architecture. Cultural historical value as part of the old built-up area of Penstraat which consisted both of l
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Penstraat 5, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-and-a-half storey structure with roof perpendicular to street. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan and funnel-shaped gable with classical top end and volute curl mouldings at side ends; wooden wall cramp visible in gable top. Front gallery with lean-to roof parallel to street. Gallery façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an 18th century urban dwelling, one of the oldest dwellings east of the town marked with a date. Architectural historical value because of its set-up and the gable ends. Specific value as part of a

properties.name: Penstraat 57, Berg Altena
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Main structure: two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over two rectangular blocks of different size; adjoining transverse wing. Front façade with profiled cornice, pilasters and central door with flanking windows. Small front terrace with stone balustrade. Cistern at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the classicist style characteristics such as the various blocks each covered with hipped roofs, the cornices, pilasters and the symmetrical set-up of the main building. Monumental ensemble value because it is loca

properties.name: Petit Trianon
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roofs over sala, front and rear gallery. Ditto roofs over rear side wings. All roofs with ridge parallel to street and provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Triangular dormers in centre of roofs. Profiled cornice over façades and paired pilasters on corners. Arched openings with clamped doors in platform. Cistern with flat roof. Front façade with three doors. Full-frontage front terrace with central stairs. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and front gallery and rear wings on both sides of a patio, a lay-out typical of Curaçao and of Scharloo in particular . Specific value as part of a protected m

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 100A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure quite similar to adjoining structure 102A. Rectangular floor plan with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Front façade with windows and doors laid out in five axes. Front balcony (present fretwork balcony is not original) with stairs to first floor supported by four Tuscan columns. Front terrace with pillared fence. Decorated frieze continuing to nr.102A.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Ditto, as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Architectural historical value because of the gable ends, dormers a

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 102A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure quite similar to but smaller than adjoining structure nr.100A. Rectangular floor plan with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Front façade with windows and doors laid out in three vertical axes. Front balcony with stairs to first floor. Front terrace with pillared fence. Decorated frieze continuing to nr.102A.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Ditto, as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 137, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Main building of corral with additional structures nrs.139-141. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and19th century top ends and oculus. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Walled-in yard.
properties.monument_value: Ensemble value because of the coherence with the structures nrs. 139-141. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 139-141, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure made up of two small adjoining dwellings. Rectangular floor plan with core area and rear gallery. One continuous gable roof and adjoining slant roof with funnel-shaped gables and 19th century top end, interrupted by ditto gable of separation wall projecting over roof surface. Three dormers on both sides of main roof. Front façade with modest cornice, three doors and ditto windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Ditto, as an example of modest servants' quarters of corral Pietermaaiweg 137. Specific value as part of a protected monumental

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 154, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on a basement above ground. Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and top ends with triangular fronton above rectangular mouldings. Two dormers on both sides of main roof. Rear section with transverse hipped roofs and three tent roofs surrounding a patio. Front façade: corner pilasters hide standpipes connected to cistern under front terrace. Front stairs with landing.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the cistern under the terrace and the detailing of the gable ends. Specif

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 16, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure on narrow deep lot. Front and rear section with gable roofs. Gable with typical truncated pointed arch and profiled mouldings. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes. First floor with three shutter doors topped with frontons with identical truncated pointed arches, ground floor with central door and flanking windows. Full-frontage front balcony supported by columns. Front staircase to balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the typical truncated pointed arch gable and frontons and the balcony supported by columns. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 168-170, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Main structure with gable roof and front-side dormers over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Transverse rear wings with gable roofs enclosing a patio. Gable roofs with funnel-shaped gables and 19th century top ends. Typical inward curved patio gable of rear gallery. Two servants' quarters at front side under one gable roof interrupted by a gabled separation wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery in Curaçao, and transverse wings with patio. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the detailing of the gable ends and the typical

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 18, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Three dormers on front side and two on rear side of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top ends. Widde cornice. Front façade with central door and two flanking windows on each side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the regular façade lay- out. Specific value as part of a protected monume

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 19, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached symmetrically set up one-storey structure laid out on a basement. Rectangular floor plan and gable roof with ridge parallel to street. Truncated gables with knob ornaments. Portico with classically detailed elements supported by two double columns. Full-frontage front terrace with open stonework balustrade and widening stairs with straight balustrades.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the classically profiled portico. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 20A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached symmetrically set up two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Four parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan. Cornice over façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Short full-frontage front terrace flanked with two symmetrical staircases with landings on terrace ends.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the regular façade lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 23, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached symmetrically laid out one-storey structure laid out on elevated substructure. Gable roof with ridge parallel to street over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Rear wings with gable roofs and slant roofs over galleries enclosing a patio. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Three dormers on both sides of main roof. Full-frontage front terrace with stone openwork balustrade and central stairs.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao, and wings with rear galleries. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top e

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 25B/C, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey concrete-built structure. Small front section with U-shaped front balcony on first floor and ditto terrace on ground floor, and larger adjoining main section. Broken hipped roof with ridge parallel to street. Windows with typical fanlights and weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the front façade with Art Deco traits, unique for Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 33, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped corner structure with similar design as nrs. 35 and 37-37A. Rectangular floor plan with flat roof. Cornice with parapet topping façades of main section, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on first floor and shutter doors on ground floor. Small front balcony. Short front terrace with pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block-shaped building with which, with the modern use of (finger corral) concrete, a connection has been sought with the older built-up area. Specific value as part of a protected m

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 35, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with similar design as nrs. 33 and 37-37A. Rectangular floor plan with flat roof. Cornice over façades of main section, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on first floor and shutter doors on ground floor. Small front balcony. Short front terrace with pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block-shaped building with which, with the modern use of (finger corral) concrete, a connection has been sought with the older built-up area. Specific value as part of a protected m

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 36, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with rectangular floor plan and ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Front façade with profiled cornice and central door and flanking windows. Short front terrace with stone balustrade and central entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest building built in (finger corral) concrete with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 37-37A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey block-shaped structure with similar design as nrs. 33 and 35, yet with a larger frontage. Rectangular floor plan with flat roof. Cornice over façades of main section, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on first floor and shutter doors on ground floor. Small front balcony. Short front terrace with pillared fence. External side staircase to nr.37A.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block-shaped building with which, with the modern use of (finger corral) concrete, a connection has been sought with the older built-up area. Specific value as part of a protected m

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 39, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with composite floor plan and ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Two adjoining rear structures, both with hipped roofs with ridges in different directions. Main roof closed with gable with typical shoulders and arched fronton above a rectangular moulding. Front façade with projecting cornice and central door with two windows on both sides. Short front terrace with pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and galleries typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the flawless detailing of cornice and eastern side façade with a.o. a wooden wall-c

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 4, Punda
properties.characteristics: Large detached symmetrically set up one-storey structure laid out on a basement. U-shaped floor plan covered with hipped roof. Splendidly detailed cornice, quoins with block pattern on corners. Front façade with three doors and four windows in alternating sequence. Portico with triangular fronton supported by columns. Front terrace with symmetrically laid out winding stairs.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the splendid classicist detailing of cornice, portico and front terrace. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 42, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure positioned between two alleys. Composite floor plan with ridge parallel to street. Main front section with gable roof enclosed with funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Three front dormers. Adjoining rear section with transverse hipped roofs and gable roof in middle. Front façade with cornice and five-bay lay-out marked by flat pilasters on façade. Central entrance and two windows on both sides with moulded triangular frontons above frames.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a one-storey urban dwelling. Architectural historical value because of the lay-out and design of the front façade, dormers and gable ends. Specific value as part of a protected monume

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 50, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Forms one structure with nr. 52. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries enclosed by plain gable. Three dormers on front side of roof. Front façade with central shutter door and two flanking windows on each side. Short front terrace with pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 52, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Forms one structure with nr. 50. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries enclosed by plain gable. One dormer on both sides of roof. Front façade with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows. Short front terrace with stone walls and central entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 53-57, Punda
properties.characteristics: Block of three dwellings positioned between two alleys. Hipped roofs perpendicular to street. One two-storey section (nr. 53) with plain hipped roof and two one-storey sections (nrs. 55-57) with U-shaped hipped roof. Two dormers on front side and three dormers on alley-side. Front façade: three windows on first floor of two-storey section; ground floor with central shutter door flanked with shutter windows for each dwelling, connected with a horizontal band. Full-frontage short terrace with pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a building block with an assembly of three dwellings which can be identified as separate units. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 54, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof perpendicular to street. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends and oculus. Front façade with central door on first floor and central door and window on one side on ground floor. Full-frontage front balcony supported by two square columns on corners. Short terrace on ground floor covered by balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 56, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey concrete-built structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Heavy cornice over exposed façades, small pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Concrete balcony with consoles and solid balustrades. Short front terrace with full-frontage fence with stonework infill between pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey concrete-built urban dwelling with profiled mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 58, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure on narrow, deep lot, built against adjacent structures. Ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan covered with broken gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top ends. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes; two full-frontage horizontal bands. Sort front terrace with solid stone balustrade and central entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling with funnel- shaped gables. (Brick finishing of front façade not protected). Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 60, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure on narrow deep lot, built against adjacent properties. Ridge parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Front-side dormer above cornice exposed as triangular fronton. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on ground and first floor. Full-frontage front balcony. Short front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 61, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with rear addition. Gable roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Full-frontage front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 63, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with rear addition. Gable roof with dormer over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Rear addition with pyramidal roof. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Full-frontage front terrace with pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 65, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end with moulded rim and semicircular oculus. Cornice and frieze above openings set between horizontal bands over exposed façades. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Front terrace with low stone balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a one-storey dwelling with funnel-shaped gable. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 67, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with large frontage and ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of main roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Front façade: first floor with central door flanked by two windows on each side. Full- frontage wooden front balcony supported by six columns. Short front terrace covered by balcony. (Front balcony and part of façade destroyed by heavy rainstorms in December 1999)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with two-storey core and front galleries typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the front balcony supported by columns. Specific value as part of a pro

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 68, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with composite floor plan. Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top end. Projecting cornice with dentils. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with rhombic ornaments above openings. Front terrace. Adjoining rear structure with gable roofs.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the assembly of building masses and a patio. Specific value as part of a protected m

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 69, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with additional structures. Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Two dormers on both sides of main roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Cornice with typical brick dentils. Front façade: first floor with central door flanked by windows. Full-frontage wooden front balcony supported by four columns. Short front terrace covered by balcony (Front balcony destroyed by heavy rainstorms in December 1999)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with two-storey core and front galleries typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the funnel-shaped gables, the wooden wall-cramps and the front balcony

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 70, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached concrete-built two-storey structure. Rectangular floor plan with slant roof at front and flat roof further behind. Cornice with full-frontage band of curled mouldings; fluted pilasters in two sections on corners. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Almost full-frontage balcony over ground floor terrace with concrete terrace walls.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block-shaped concrete-built two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 71, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties. Flat roof. Front section with small setback sections at corners accommodating two staircases (right one belongs to adjacent property). Projecting cornice with dentils over exposed façades and fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Weather mouldings above openings continued as horizontal bands. Almost full-frontage front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling with a front façade with neo-classicist mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 72, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached concrete-built two-storey structure with rear additions. Rectangular floor plan with two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over exposed façades, fluted two-tiered pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Small front balcony. Short front terrace with concrete balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built two-storey urban dwelling which, in its detailing, has sought a connection with late- 19th century examples. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscap

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 73A-75A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties. Flat roof. Projecting cornice over exposed façades. Fluted pilasters on corners and in central axis of façade dividing the front façade in two sections. Front façade with two doors on ground and first floor. Full-frontage front balcony with balustrade of wooden fretwork. Front terrace with pillared fence. (The two staircases are later additions)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling with a front façade with neo-classicist mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 74, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached concrete-built two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Broken hipped roof over floor plan with rectangular sections. Front façade topped with cantilevered roof with brackets. Front balcony on roof of bay flanked with a typical set of windows on ground floor. Full-frontage horizontal band with brackets on bay- roof level. Short front terrace with stone balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a characteristic example of the architecture on Curaçao in the 1920-1940 period, concrete-built structure with cantilevered roof and typical façade details. Specific value as part of a protected mo

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 76, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Main structure with rectangular floor plan and rear additions. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Roof enclosed with plain gable. Dormers with triangular fronton and 19th century top ends on both sides of main roof. Front façade with cornice and full- frontage double horizontal bands. Central door with flanking windows. Front terrace with stone terrace walls.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of the cornice and dormer details. Specific value as part of a protected monumental tow

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 77 / Vissteeg 1, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with rear addition. Oldest known structure on Pietermaai Smal. Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gable with shoulders; top end with triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Dormer on both sides of roof. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Front terrace with pillared fence and stone bench against footing. Rear addition with slant roof and high end ranging with alley.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao, and rear addition. Architectural historical value as oldest dated dwelling of Pietermaai Smal with well-preserved characterist

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 8, Punda
properties.characteristics: Large detached symmetrically set up two-storey structure with additional buildings. Main section with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with dormers over main section, adjoining slant roofs over flanking side galleries. Pyramidal roofs over two tower-shaped pavilions at rear corners. Front façade: central section with cornice, horizontal band and central door with two flanking windows on each side; windows on short ends of galleries. Front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the regular façade lay-out and the bays flanked by pilasters on the ground floor. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 80, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof, cement hips and ridge with finials. Dormer on front side. Cornice over façades, quoins with block pattern on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Front balcony with consoles and stone openwork balustrade with circles. Short front terrace with ditto balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 81, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with rear addition. Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with shoulders and 19th century top end. Dormer on both sides of roof. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Front terrace with pillared fence and central entrance.
properties.monument_value: Ensemble value because of the coherence with the adjacent structures nrs. 77 and 83 with a similar set-up, and the relation with the rear terrain with cistern shared with the surrounding properties. Architectural historical value because of the detailing
properties.construction_period: First half of19th century (\'Ano .8.2\' marked on

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 82, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure and rear additions. Main structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof, cement hips and ridge with finials. Dormer on front side. Cornice over façades, quoins with block pattern on corners. Front balcony with consoles and stone openwork balustrade with circles. Short front terrace with ditto balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 83, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with side and rear additions. Main structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gable with shoulders and top end with triangular fronton above rectangular moulding . Dormer on both sides of roof. Front façade with door and three windows. Front gallery continued to the east with gable roof. Front terrace with pillared fence and central entrance.
properties.monument_value: Ensemble value because of the coherence with the adjacent structures nrs. 77 and 81 with a similar set-up, and the relation with the rear terrain with cistern shared with the surrounding properties. Architectural historical value because of the detailing

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 85, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure on narrow lot with ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends, oculus with star ornament on front gable. Small full- frontage horizontal band above openings of first floor. Concrete balcony (possibly replacement) and side staircase. Short front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 86A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Two parallel hipped roofs wit cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with ornamented triangular fronton and profiled cornice with dentils, two-tiered pilasters on corners. Central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. All openings with decorated fanlights and classical moulded frames with weather mouldings. Full-frontage balcony, front terrace with stone openwork balustrade between pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a late-19th century two-storey urban dwelling. Architectural historical value because of the characteristic set-up and detailing of the façades using neo-classicist elements. Specific

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 89, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof with cement hips and finials. Profiled cornice and horizontal band over façade openings, pilasters on corners. Three doors on first floor and door and flanking windows on ground floor. Side staircase to first floor. Full-frontage balcony over short front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 91A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with large frontage. Ridges parallel to street. Almost rectangular floor plan with two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Projected cornice with dentils and dentate quoins on corners. Front façade with shutter doors and windows in five axes on first floor with projecting horizontal band above openings. Almost full-frontage wooden balcony supported by columns with (new) square lower section.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 92, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped structure. Front section with wider rear section. (Almost) flat roof with parapet. Front façade: cornice with dentils with a pointed and block pattern, three-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Doors and windows with projecting weather mouldings in three axes. Side staircase on west façade. Pillared fence. Front balcony removed.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a block-shaped two-storey urban dwelling. Architectural historical value because of the façades with neo- classicist mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townsc

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 93, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with two steep hipped roofs over double core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormers on all hipped ends. Adjoining rear addition with hipped roof. Front façade with central shutter door and flanking windows. Front terrace with stone openwork balustrade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with (double) core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the assembly of roofs and dormers. Specific value as part of a p
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 96, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof. Façades with decorated frieze between cornice and horizontal band; two parallel horizontal bands in zone between openings of ground and first floor. Front balcony supported by two columns. Front terrace with side stairs to first floor. Decoration with rhombic ornaments on frieze, balcony balustrade and terrace walls.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pietermaaiweg 98A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with a deep setback. Front section with two hipped roofs parallel to street and adjoining rear section with hipped roofs in transverse position. Front façade: triangular fronton above cornice with medallion with mark '1897'. Three shutter doors with semicircular weather mouldings and pseudo fanlights on ground and first floor. Full-frontage wooden balcony supported by two columns with base. Pillared fence around front yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a late-19th century two-storey urban dwelling with neo-classicist inspired facades, rare in Pietermaai. Architectural historical value because of the façade decoration and balcony col

properties.name: Pietersz Guesthouse
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to Roodeweg. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of main roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, oculus and 19th century top end with date mark '1861'. Front façade laid out in four axes with two doors in centre and two windows on both sides. Front balcony supported by columns. Short front terrace with fence of stone openwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with two-storey core, front and gallery typical of Curaçao. Ditto, because of the funnel-shaped gables with date mark and the dormers. Specific value as part of a protected m

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 25-27, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus. Front façade laid out in three axes, central door on ground floor. Plain cornice and continuous horizontal band around structure below sills of first-floor windows. Wooden balcony on west façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 26-28, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with two units located in corral of Breedestraat 192. Rectangular floor plan covered with slant roof. Front façade on high end of roof. Chimney on side façade.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure in Otrobanda, which consists of a yard with a main building and secondary structures on the edges. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 32, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with main section and transverse wing located in corral of Pieterszsteeg 34-38. Main section with hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Wing section with slant roof. Façades with shutter doors and windows. Heavy L-shaped profiled cornice. Corral wall on rear side.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure in Otrobanda, which consists of a yard with a main building and secondary structures on the edges. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the hipped
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 34-38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure, main building of large corral with structures nrs. 32, 42 and 54. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Three dormers on both sides of main roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Adjoining spaces with slant roofs built against side façades. Two meters high corral wall along Pieterszsteeg with gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curacao. Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure in Otrobanda, which co

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 42, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure located in corral of Pieterszsteeg 34-38 and quite similar to nr. 54. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends with oculus in star ornament. Front façade ranging with alley with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curacao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel-shaped gables 19th century top ends and the shutter doors and

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 54, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure located in corral of Pieterszsteeg 34-38 and quite similar to nr. 42. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Front façade ranging with alley with central clamped door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curacao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Cultural historical

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 60-62, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Adjoining gable roof over rear section. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends and square oculus. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes, central door on ground floor. Plain cornice. Two-storey structure with loggia and pyramidal roof built against eastern façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Pieterszsteeg 8-18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure accommodating six row-houses located in corral of Breedestraat 192. One continuous gable roof enclosed with funnel-shaped gables. Each unit: front façade with central door and flanking windows. Roof chimney on rear side.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure in Otrobanda, which consists of a yard with a main building and secondary structures on the edges. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Plantersrust
properties.characteristics: Large symmetrically set-up complex laid out on an elevated platform on walled-in premises. Former Military Hospital. Separate units connected with galleries. Inner court surrounded by main front building (former doctor's residence), six pavilions (infirmaries) and rear structure. Additional structures on west side such as a.o. operating room, kitchen and cistern. Pavilions with heavy profiled cornice and hipped roofs over core area and lean-to roofs over surrounding, originally open galleries with plain balustrades with wooden bars. (Present dwelling function of complex has introduced severe alterations)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the symmetrical set-up and the meticulous construction of the complex. Ditto, because of the classicist style characteristics of the main building and the colonial-style pavilions. Cultural historical value as a l

properties.name: Plaza Horacio Hoyer 15-17, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey main structure with one-storey addition. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over main structure and lean-to roof over rear addition. Front façade with pilasters on corners and in the middle dividing the façade in two sections with a similar lay out of shutter doors and shutter windows with weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an example of an early- 20th century two-storey dwelling built outside the old inner city. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Postal Museum
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure. Two gable roofs placed perpendicular to each other.
