Front façade: funnel-shaped gable with small window and plain top end consisting of a triangular fronton above a rectangular moulding marked with year 1693. Wooden front gallery with open arcade and covered with lean-to roof with eaves.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the late-17th century funnel-shaped gable and the gallery typical of Punda added in the 18th century. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Prinsenstraat 74, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top ends and oculus. Profiled cornice and horizontal band over exposed façades. Front façade laid out in seven axes with shutter windows with weather mouldings on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the regular façade lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Prinsenstraat 80, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Pointed gables with rounded top ends and oculus in star. Three dormers on both sides of main roof. Front façade with profiled cornice, three clamped doors and window. Front terrace with stone staircase access.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Quinta Antonio
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey dwelling covered with a hipped roof perpendicular to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials.Cornice over all façades. Front façade ranging with street, central door and flanking windows with tunnel- shaped weather mouldings, pilasters on corners. Text in plasterwork above front door reading 'Quinta Antonio'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional dwelling covered with a hipped roof. Ditto because of the name of the house marked above the front door. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscap

properties.name: Quintastraat 1, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Two blocks of different size covered with hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over facades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows topped with moulded triangular frontons. Front part of fence has pillars with stone openwork.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of the prominent location on a corner site. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Quintastraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan covered with gable roof with two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top ends and oculus. Front façade: small plain cornice and window flanked with two doors.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top ends, and dormers with triangular fronton and shutter windows. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Quintastraat 21, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice around façades. Front façade with central panelled shutter door flanked with shutter windows. Weather mouldings above openings. Fence with sawn small wooden boards.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a simple structure and because of the former fence still present. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Quintastraat 29-35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey double structure of unequal width. Ridge perpendicular to street. Two rectangular sections covered with hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice and horizontal band over façades. Font façade of sections laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and central door and flanking windows on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the regular and symmetrical façade lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Quintastraat 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Truncated gables with top ornament. Front façade with small window in gable and central door and flanking windows. No weather mouldings. Stonewall front fence with central entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a simple urban dwelling. Architectural historical value because of the former stonewall front fence still present. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Quintastraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan covered with three parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over facades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with decorated triangular fronton with dentils topped with knob ornament. Central door and flanking windows with profiled weather mouldings with vase ornament. Kitchen with chimney built against rear façade. Front and side fence with pillars and stone openwork, and solid stone walls respectively.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the splendid decorations of the fronton around the medallion and the dentils. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Radio Hoyer
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Rectangular roof plan with gable roof and dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gable with 19th century top ends and semicircular oculus. Flat cornice around façades. Front façade with central shutter door with two shutter windows on both sides. Strip weather mouldings above openings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an example of a small dwelling built in a country style. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Rembrandstraat 1-3, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with cut-away rear corner. Three hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over facades, tapered pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Small addition with two ovens. Short front terrace with stone openwork fence. Gates in side wall ranging with Koningstraat.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional stone dwelling with hipped roofs and an addition. Ditto, because of the ovens and the fence with gates. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Rembrandstraat 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan covered with two hipped roofs. Profiled cornice over facades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with flat tunnel-shaped weather mouldings. Short front terrace with stone openwork fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built dwelling with a traditional design with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Renata building
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure set back from street. U-shaped floor plan enclosing a patio. Parallel hipped roofs over front section and rear wings, pyramidal roof at inner end of patio. Roofs finished with cement hips and ridges with finials. Heavy cornice over façades. Front façade with symmetrical set-up and laid out in five axes. Loggia's with wooden balustrade on façade ends. Doors and windows set in a system of horizontal and vertical bands.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the concept of one building block with rear wings, and the original symmetric façade lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Reuzensteeg 13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to alley. Rectangular floor plan with two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over facades. Front façade: central door with oval ornament above door frame and flanking windows. Profiled weather mouldings. Pillared front fence with wooden bars, stonewall fences at sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the hipped roofs and the decorations of elements such as weather mouldings, quoins with block pattern and the wooden and stonewall fences. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Reuzensteeg 2, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey corner structure ranging with alley. Part of corral of Roodeweg 44 (Casablanca). Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over two rectangular blocks of different size. Plain cornice over facades. Front façade with central door and three windows with fanlights and profiled weather mouldings. High corral walls in line with front and side façade
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rialtostraat z/n, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large semi-detached structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over three-storey core area and lean-to roofs over flanking two-storey galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front façade: core laid out with windows in three axes; gallery laidout in seven axes with central door and flanking windows on both floors. Central balcony supported by columns. Ditto balcony on side façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because a.o. the19th century funnel-shaped gables and the characteristic balconies supported by columns. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and re
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Riffort
properties.characteristics: Large fort at entrance of Sint Annabaai opposite Fort Amsterdam in Punda. Broken rectangle following the coastline accommodating one continuous shooting gallery. Mutually connected vaulted spaces for the greater part used as casemates and batteries under shooting gallery. Central open space. Guardhouse, stairs and two cisterns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because it is part of a series of fortifications dating from the 1820's. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape and because of the prominent position as a landmark at the entrance

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 10A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey corner structure ranging with both streets. Ridge perpendicular to Rifwaterstraat. Gable roof with eaves over core area and adjoining slant roof over side gallery. Dormer on both sides of main roof. Truncated gable with window and knob ornament on gable end. Gable and gallery façade with single doors.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the rarely found eaves of the roof . Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormer on both sides of main roof. Front façade with profiled cornice, shutter window and two panelled shutter doors.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 16-20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to alley. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear galleries. Two dormers on both sides of main roof. Truncated gables with shoulders, rhombic oculus, and knob ornaments on gable ends. Plain cornice on front and side façades continuing into aqueduct connected with detached cistern. Front façade ranging with street; two alternating windows and doors.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic gables with shoulders. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and gallery typical of Curaçao, the fully intact rainwater managemen
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 19-21, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Twin structure of nr. 23-25. Rectangular floor plan covered with hipped roof. Two-band cornice over façades with typical corner ornaments. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with shutter windows on first floor and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Gate access to rear yard on both sides of structure.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape and as counterpart of adjacent property nr.23-25.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey (nr.2) and one-storey (nr.4) joint structures built against adjacent properties. Gable roofs, nr 2 with funnel-shaped gable, nr.4 with dormers on both sides of roof. Front façades ranging with alley with door and window with plain weather mouldings for each structure.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 23-25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Twin structure of nr. 19-21. Rectangular floor plan covered with hipped roof. Two-band cornice over façades with typical corner ornaments. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with shutter windows on first floor and door and two windows on ground floor. Gate access to rear yard on both sides of structure.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape and as counterpart of adjacent property nr.19-21.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 27, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormers on both sides of main roof. Front façade with profiled cornice; central shutter window flanked with two panelled shutter doors. Side gate with access to rear yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 29-31, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two storey structure ranging with alley. Two sections forming an L-shaped floor plan. Hipped roofs over both sections placed parallel and perpendicular to alley. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over all façades, weather mouldings above openings. Front façade laid out in four vertical axes with windows on first floor and three doors and window on ground floor. Gate with triangular fronton with access to rear yard.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 3-5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties with ridge parallel to alley. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Front façade ranging with street; windows and doors laid out in three axes. First floor windows set between two full-frontage horizontal bands. Ditto band above openings on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 6-8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties with ridge parallel to alley. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Front façade ranging with street; windows and doors laid out in four vertical axes with two doors in centre on ground floor. Plain cornice and weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in the Register of Monuments

properties.name: Rifwaterstraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against adjacent properties and ranging with street. Ridge perpendicular to alley. Rectangular main section and addition covered with broken hipped roof. Plain cornice and full-frontage horizontal band. Front façade laid out in two vertical axes: plain door and door with side windows on ground floor. Tunnel- shaped weather mouldings above openings and low horizontal band interrupted by openings.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Roodesteeg 2A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. Rectangular floor plan with gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable with arched top end above rectangular moulding and square ventilation opening. Front (gable) façade with central window and flanking doors. Gate to rear yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an older structure of Pietermaai which identifies the urbanization process of this area north of Pietermaaiweg. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an older type of two-storey urban housing in a side

properties.name: Roodeweg 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure located in the corral of Roodeweg 44. Gable roofs over core area and front gallery, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Three dormers on front and rear sides of main roofs, roof chimney at rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends and semicircular oculus in radiating moulding. Profiled cornice over front and side façades. Façades laid out in vertical axes. Front balcony supported by columns placed over full-frontage short terrace with steps.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and gallery typical of Curaçao. Architectural historical value because of a.o. the façade lay-out in axes, the dormers, mouldings and 19th century funnel- sh
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Roodeweg 38-40 / Reuzenstraat 2A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey elongated structure. One continuous hipped roof with wider base at front section and short parallel hipped roof at rear section. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Front balcony over loggia with columns, balustrades with stone balusters set between pillars.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral-structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Roodeweg 41A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to Roodeweg. Rectangular floor plan covered with three parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows. Full-frontage front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs in a row position. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Roodeweg 48, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached three-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over façades, quoins with block pattern on corners. Front façade laid out in three axes with small windows with semicircular fanlights on second floor, three doors with fanlights and profiled weather mouldings on console on first floor. Full- frontage front balcony. Side staircase to first floor. Eastern two-storey front addition and balcony (probably) later additions.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Roodeweg 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery and also over part of side gallery. Two dormers on both sides of main roof. Funnel- shaped gables with plain top ends. Kitchen with chimney in corner of side gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Roodeweg 64-66A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached spaciously set-up two-storey structure set back from street. Elongated floor plan covered with five parallel hipped roofs in a row, all provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice with dentils and fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out with doors on both floors in three axes. Two-tiered front portico with richly decorated fronton supported by fluted bossed columns with Corinthian capital. Winding stairs on both sides of front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a large two-storey urban mansion with hipped roofs. Ditto, with cistern, additional structure and the front façade with richly decorated neo-classicist two-tiered portico with fronton. Specific val

properties.name: Roodeweg 68-72A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi detached group of three separate buildings. Two two- storey structures facing Roodeweg with ridges parallel and perpendicular to street, one-storey structure with gable roof set back behind infill addition. Plain funnel-shaped gables.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a cluster of adjoining buildings. Ditto because of the funnel-shaped gables. Ensemble value because of a.o. the coherence of the masses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Roodeweg 76A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to Roodeweg. Rectangular floor plan with three parallel hipped roofs in a row provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Additional rear structures with pyramidal and slant roofs. Front façade laid out in three axes with shutter windows on first floor and two clamped doors and ditto window on ground floor. Side wall with entrance to yard and stairs to balcony (new) on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban dwelling with apartments on ground and first floor. Ensemble value because of its location. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Roodeweg 80-84, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block with large frontage and ridge parallel to street. Elongated floor plan with two long parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over exposed façades. Front façade with lay-out of three identical patterns: central door flanked with windows on ground floor and three windows on first floor. Rear balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban dwelling with three row-dwellings. Ditto, because of its size and its corner location. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Roodeweg 86, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Forms one building block together with nr. 88A. Rectangular floor plan with two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice, two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with central shutter door with flanking shutter windows on ground and first floor. All openings provided with softly curved weather mouldings. Central front balcony. Staircase on side façade to balcony with entrance on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban dwelling with adjoining counterpart. Ditto, because of the mouldings. Ensemble value because of its location. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Roodeweg 88A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Forms one building block together with nr. 86. Rectangular floor plan with two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice, two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out in three axes with central shutter door with flanking shutter windows on first floor. All openings on first floor provided with softly curved weather mouldings. Central front balcony. Staircase on side façade to balcony (not original) with entrance on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a two-storey urban dwelling with adjoining counterpart. Ditto, because of the mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Roodeweg 9-9A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Tapered floor plan covered with front hipped roof and adjoining ditto roof in transverse position. Tasselled cornice over front and side façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door with flanking windows on first floor. Inverted ogee arch with tassel decoration below windows. Front balcony on consoles.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the prominent corner location and the characteristic decorations below cornice and windows. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Roodeweg 92A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with three parallel hipped roofs in a row provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. (Original lay-out of front façade covered with full-frontage advertisement)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical roof and façade elements such as cornice, pilasters and shutter windows with weather mouldings on exposed façades.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sabelstraat 28-30, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two structures with different set-up. Lay-out and structure built and keyed to one another on the same premises. Nr.28: small two-storey wooden structure covered with a slightly slant roof with eaves and adjoining stone-built section with flat roof. Nr.30: one-storey structure covered with three parallel hipped roofs in a row with cement hips and ridges with finials and traditionally detailed elements. Pillared front fence with stone openwork infill.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of two structures keyed to one another. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: San Antonio
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Part of corral compound of Breedestraat 192A. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. All façades laid out in vertical axes. Panelled shutter doors and shutter windows. Wooden balcony with staircase access on side façade. Roof chimney at rear side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. lay-out of the façades in vertical axes and the standard details. Cultural historical value as part of one of the few existing examples of the old corral structure in Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a pr
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Santa Ana Church
properties.characteristics: Detached church building in densely built-up main street of Otrobanda. Church tower facing Consciëntiesteeg and chapels facing Breedestraat. Floor plan with nave and flanking aisles. Façades: grey plasterwork finishing with traced joints suggesting large stone blocks. Arched windows with grey-white block pattern. Stepped gables covered with gabled cover plates.
properties.monument_value: Cultural historical value because of the location where the first Roman Catholic church on Curaçao was founded in 1752. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Santa Ana Parish Hall
properties.characteristics: Two-storey semi-detached structure with ridges perpendicular to street. Two structurally similar blocks covered with gable roofs. Similar architecture as church building. Façades: grey plasterwork finishing with traced joints suggesting large stone blocks. Arched windows with grey-white block pattern. Stepped gables covered with gabled cover plates.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as part of Santa Ana Church. Architectural historical value because of the characteristic details such as the stepped gables, arched windows with grey-white blocks and the block- simulating plasterwor
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Santa Ana Parish Hall
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure covered with gable roof. Façade facing the alley features a stepped gable and arched windows. Façades: grey plasterwork finishing with traced joints suggesting large stone blocks. Arched windows with grey-white block pattern. Stepped gables covered with gabled cover plates.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as part of Santa Ana Church. Architectural historical value because of the characteristic details such as the stepped gables, arched windows with grey-white blocks and the block simulating plasterwork
properties.construction_period: Not listed in register of Monuments

properties.name: Santa Famia Church
properties.characteristics: Large structure positioned in axis of, and with its front to Mgr.Niewindtstraat. Gable roof over a six-bay nave with three-sided choir, two lean-to roofs over adjoining four- bay aisles. Front façade with central gable between two square towers topped with octagonal lanterns. Heavy profiled ornamented cornice around nave section; cornice with dentils and buttresses for aisle sections. Entrance platform with U-shaped block of stairs. Interior: nave and aisles divided by Doric columns with supporting arcades.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a large Roman Catholic church building with a basilica lay- out and design. Ditto, because of the street axis position. Cultural historical value because it forms a part of the history of Roman Cat

properties.name: Scharlooweg 100, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Main section with rear wings on both sides of patio (now covered). Hipped roof over sala, front and rear gallery of main section, hipped roofs over eastern rear wing. All hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades, pilasters with block pattern on corners. Front façade laid out in three axes with central door and flanking windows on ground and first floor. Openings with weather mouldings on pseudo consoles. Front balcony. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an example of a cube- shaped mansion. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 102, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Front section and rear section with side wings enclosing a patio. Front section: three hipped roofs over core area, front and rear gallery. Rear section: transverse hipped roofs over rear wings and gable roof over cistern behind eastern wing. Wing section of patio closed with aqueduct, rear end of patio with wooden balustrade. Front façade with curved fronton with leaded glass panels above cornice, and English liberty- style tile finishing on ground floor. Curved balcony supported by columns.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and art historical value because of a.o. the splendid architecture of the front façade, the leaded glass panels in the fronton, and the tile tableaux.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 104, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with symmetrical set-up of floor plan and façades. Two-storey main section and one-storey rear section with side wings enclosing a patio. Patio closed with wall with arched opening, fan-shaped stairs to backyard. Projecting cornice over façades, two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out in five axes with central door and two windows on both sides on ground and first floor. Front balcony on iron consoles. Full frontage front terrace with grey and white marble tiles and fan-shaped stairs to yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery, and rear wings on both sides of a patio typical of Scharloo, the symmetrical set-up and typical elements and details. Specific value as part of

properties.name: Scharlooweg 106, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Front section with two rear wings on both sides of patio. Cornice with dentils, pilasters with block pattern on corners. Front façade with central door and two windows on both sides. Semicircular portico supported by columns and pseudo terrace on roof. Decorated curved fronton behind terrace. Full-frontage front terrace with grey and white marble tiles, fan-shaped stairs to front yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic circular portico. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 11, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roofs over sala and front gallery. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings. All roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Projecting profiled cornice over façades and fluted pilasters with fantasy capital on corners. Front façade with three doors. Full-frontage front terrace with stairs. Stone wall fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and front gallery and rear wings on both sides of a patio, a lay-out typical of Curaçao, and of Scharloo in particular. Specific value as part of a protected m

properties.name: Scharlooweg 130, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Main section with front addition, central and back room, and two rear wings on both sides of patio. Patio closed with arched opening in wall. Cornice over façades. Façade of front addition with triangular fronton with window above cornice. Central door and flanking windows. All openings topped with a moulded triangular fronton. Full-frontage short front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to front yard. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and traditional customs value because of a.o. the floor plan with main section with front gallery and back room, and rear wings on both sides of a patio typical of Scharloo. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townsca

properties.name: Scharlooweg 162, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped structure with symmetrical floor plan and additional structures. Main section with two rear wings on both sides of patio. Patio closed with arched opening in wall and stairs to backyard. Heavy profiled cornice with dentils over façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade laid out in five axes with central door and two windows on both sides on ground and first floor. Profiled weather mouldings with dentils above openings. Full-frontage front terrace with fan- shaped stairs to front yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an example of a block- shaped two-storey urban dwelling. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery, and rear wings on both sides of a patio typ

properties.name: Scharlooweg 164, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with symmetrical floor plan laid out on elevated platform. Main section with two rear wings on both sides of patio. Patio closed with back room. Hipped roofs with dormers a.o. on hipped ends on sides of building. Heavy profiled cornice over façades. Front façade with triangular fronton with cut ornament in tympanum. Central door and flanking windows with so-called 'kupials', arched corner loggia's, on corners. Full- frontage short front terrace with wooden balustrade and fan- shaped stairs.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical 'kupials' and the triangular fronton with cut flower ornament in tympanum. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery,

properties.name: Scharlooweg 17, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with ridges parallel to street. Two- storey front section and one-storey rear section with patio. Hipped roofs over sala, front and rear galleries. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings enclosing a patio. All roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Projecting profiled cornice over façades and fluted pilasters on corners. Closing wall of patio with arched opening, aqueduct to large cistern. Front façade laid out in three axes with central shutter door and flanking shutter windows on ground and first floor. Full- frontage front terrace with stairs. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic cube shape. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with main building and rear wings on both sides of a patio, a lay-out typical of Scharloo.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 20, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with finials over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Heavy cornice over all core façades and gallery façade. Front façade with three windows on core section and central door and two flanking windows on both sides. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 21, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with irregular floor plan. Hipped roof over main rectangular section. Asymmetrical front addition with small hipped roof and cantilevered pyramidal roof supported by fretwork consoles built over projecting tower structure. Front balcony with quarter- circle floor plan over ditto terrace in inner corner of structure. Two-tiered corner loggia. (Original balustrade of stone balusters of front balcony, loggia and terrace replaced by solid stone balustrade. Closed fanlight on ground floor window changed into glass one).
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the characteristic architectural and decorative details. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 25, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with front and rear section with patio. Two-storey front section with sala and front gallery. One- storey rear section with transverse hipped roofs over rear rooms. All roofs with ridge parallel to street and provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over all facades of front section, quoins with block pattern on corners. Front façade laid out with central door and flanking windows on both floors. Front balcony on consoles. Full-frontage terrace with fan-shaped stairs to yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic cube shape. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 27, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Front and rear section with patio. Parallel hipped roofs over sala, front and double rear gallery. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings and rear addition. All roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades, block-shaped quoins on corners. Front façade: fronton with decorated tympanum and lace decoration, three shutter doors with pseudo fanlights. Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to front yard. Pillared fence with infill of wooden bars in between.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic fronton with decorated tympanum and lace decoration on top edges. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery and

properties.name: Scharlooweg 29, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio and rear garden. Hipped roofs over sala and front gallery. Rear gallery and side wings form wider U-shaped floor plan. Two- storey rear addition with flat roof and arched corridor. Patio with columns. Profiled cornice over façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade: fronton with decorated tympanum and medallion set in plastered eagle; lace decoration on top edges. Three shutter doors with pseudo fanlights. Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to front yard. Gate pillars marked with date 'ANNO 1893'.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic fronton with decorated tympanum and lace decoration on top edges. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery and

properties.name: Scharlooweg 2A, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with three façades exposed to surrounding streets. Hipped roof with ridge parallel to Scharlooweg. Three dormers on both sides of roof, one on short hipped end. Rear dormers with slant roofs. Front façade with cornice and horizontal band above two of four large openings. One and two openings on side façades. Former dwellings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as example of industrial property in Scharloo identified by the various large doors.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 31, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roof over sala, adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Rear gallery and side wings form wider U-shaped floor plan around patio with columns. Front section with parapet and fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade: three shutter doors with pseudo fanlights; frieze above openings with three medallions connected with garlands and ribbons. Full-frontage front terrace with fan- shaped stairs to front yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic decoration of the parapet. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery and rear wings on both sides of a patio, a

properties.name: Scharlooweg 35, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roofs over sala and front gallery. Rear gallery and side wings form wider U-shaped floor plan around patio. Dormers on hipped ends of roofs, a.o. on east and west side. Profiled cornice over façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with decorated fronton above cornice, three shutter doors opening to full-frontage front terrace with stairs. Date '1889' on gate pillar.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery and rear wings on both sides of a patio, a lay-out typical of Scharloo. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 37, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front section with sala and front gallery covered with hipped roof with dormers on both sides. Rear section with three back rooms, middle one with second storey. Profiled cornice over façades. Rear façade: three gables with oculus and sun image in top ends. Front façade: central door flanked with two windows with semicircular fanlights and mouldings. Full-frontage front terrace with balustrade and stairs to yard. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and front gallery, a lay-out typical of Scharloo. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 39, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Rectangular floor plan with parallel gable roofs over front and middle room and adjoining slant roof over back room. Three dormers on both sides of front roof and rear side of middle roof. Front dormers with cheeks. Cornice over façades, pilasters with block pattern on corners. Pointed gables on side façades. Front façade with central door and two windows with weather mouldings on both sides. Plain front terrace with stairs. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the balanced and symmetrical set-up of the façades and the characteristic elements. Cultural historical value because it accommodated the synagogue of the Jewish Ashkenaze congregation of Curaç

properties.name: Scharlooweg 4-10, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure accommodating four row- houses. One continuous hipped roof with ridge parallel to Scharlooweg on elongated floor plan. Five dormers on both sides of roof, two on short hipped ends. Rear dormers with slant roofs. Front façade with cornice and horizontal band above doors and windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as example of modest housing in Scharloo. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments (First half of

properties.name: Scharlooweg 41, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Front and rear section with patio. Gable roof over sala and front gallery. Gable roof over back room and transverse hipped roofs over side wings. Three dormers on both sides of front roof. Front dormers with triangular frontons with full-frontage span. Font façade with cornice and dentate quoins on corners, door and two windows on both sides. Full-frontage front terrace without balustrade and stairs to front yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetrical set-up of façades and the typical triangular front dormers. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery and rear win

properties.name: Scharlooweg 5, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached cube-shaped two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Front section with parallel hipped roofs over front gallery and sala. Rear section with transverse hipped roofs over side wings and small central corridor. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Roof chimney. Front façade laid out in five axes; central door flanked with paired windows with arched weather mouldings on both floors. Central front balcony.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the classicist cube shape of the property, the paired windows with arched weather mouldings, typical of Antoine Martis' creations, Scharlooweg 5 being the earliest known example.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 51, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roof over front section, gable roof over back room and transverse hipped roofs over side wings. Dormers on outer sides of roof complex, front dormers with triangular frontons. Three additional structures at rear side including a cistern with aqueduct and stairs. Font façade: central door and two windows on both sides. Full-frontage front terrace with wooden balustrade between pillars, stairs to front yard. Front fence with pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala and rear wings on both sides of a patio, a lay-out typical of Scharloo. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 52-54, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey main structure with additional buildings in front yard. Gable roof over core, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Truncated gables with knob ornaments. Front façade with shutter doors and windows and wooden front balcony supported by columns. Additional buildings include a cistern and structure with chimney. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery, a lay- out typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 53, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Front and rear section with patio. Hipped roof with dormers on front and side hipped ends over sala, adjoining slant roof over open front gallery. Hipped roof over rear gallery and ditto transverse roof over side wings. Patio with corridors and columns closed with two-storey rear structure. Font section with open gallery and semicircular portico with parapet supported by double columns. Stairs to front yard. Pillared fence. Interior with decorated tiles and glass panels, and wall paintings on textile.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and art historical value because of a.o. the decorated front façade with typical semicircular portico and the unique wall paintings. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala,

properties.name: Scharlooweg 61, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with ridge parallel to street. Front section and rear section with side wings enclosing a patio. Front section with hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over two-storey core area and lean-to roofs over one-storey front and rear galleries. Patio closed with arches. Front façade with three windows on core wall and central door flanked with windows on gallery façade. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with main building with core, front and rear gallery, and rear wings on both sides of a patio typical of Scharloo. Specific value as part of a protected monumental towns

properties.name: Scharlooweg 64-66, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over front and rear section. Profiled cornice and horizontal band over façades. Front façade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor (central window is replacement of door with balcony) and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Stone benches between front façade and fence. Pillared fence with central gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an early example of a cube-shaped mansion. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 68, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached structure set back from street behind Scharloo 64 and 70. Symmetrical two-storey main structure with front addition covered with gable roofs. Main building: cornice and horizontal band over façades. Front addition with central door and window and flanked with windows on ground and first floor. Triangular fronton with oculus above cornice of front façade. Stone benches perpendicular to front façade on corners. Flanking cisterns in backyard with aqueducts to main building. Gate between nrs. 64 and 70.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because its set-up which deviates from the Scharloo type. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 7, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio. Parallel hipped roofs over sala, front and rear gallery. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings and rear addition. All roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with projecting profiled cornice with dentils, pseudo brick plasterwork finishing and block-shaped quoins on corners. Three shutter doors opening to front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to front yard. Pillared fence with infill of iron bars in between.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the symmetric lay-out of the façades supported by balanced detailing. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of o.a, the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery and rear wings on

properties.name: Scharlooweg 70, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice with dentils and horizontal band over façades. Front façade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor (central window is replacement of door with balcony) and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Above door marble tablet with old house number and date ' 11.1862.B'. Stone benches between front façade and fence. Pillared fence with central gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as one of the earliest examples of a cube-shaped mansion on Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 75, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Former 'Club De Gezelligheid'. Large detached structure with ridge parallel to street. Main two-storey section with one-storey east and west additions and ditto rear wings on both sides of a patio. Patio closed with three arches supported by columns. Main section: gable roof over core area, slant roofs over adjoining front and rear galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top ends. Cornice and horizontal bands over façades, pilasters on corners. Portico added during restoration of 1970.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao and rear wings on both sides of a patio typical of Scharloo. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townsc

properties.name: Scharlooweg 79, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Front section with three parallel hipped roofs over core area, front and rear gallery. Rear section with transverse hipped roofs over side backrooms and ditto gable roof over middle one. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Two-storey portico with decorated triangular fronton supported by double columns. Balcony on first floor. Pillared fence and gate with old house number ' 39a' on right pillar. Left pillar with marble tablet and date '1873 ' removed.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the characteristic two-storey portico. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear galleries typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a prot

properties.name: Scharlooweg 81, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Main building and rear section with patio. Main section with gable roof over sala and adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Hipped roofs over transverse side wings on both sides of a patio. Cistern parallel to western wing. Cornice over façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with three doors opening to full frontage front terrace and steps to front yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and art historical value because of a.o. the characteristic funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gallery,

properties.name: Scharlooweg 86-88, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure with main structure and additional buildings. Main structure with symmetrical set-up and rectangular floor plan covered with four parallel hipped roofs. Dormers on short hipped ends of roofs. Front and rear portico in central axis. Profiled cornice over façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade with two sets of three coupled windows with arched weather mouldings on both sides of portico. Symmetrical winding stairs to portico balcony. Two so-called azoteas - one-storey square blocks with terrace and open stonework balustrade on flat roof - on corners of front yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the portico typical of Scharloo and the azoteas. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 9, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front and rear section with patio. Pyramidal roof over sala and front gallery, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Transverse hipped roofs over side wings and rear addition (One-storey added later on over rear addition). Hipped roofs provided with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with projecting profiled cornice and dentate quoins on corners. Three shutter doors with triangular frontons above openings. Full-frontage front terrace with steps to front yard. Pillared fence with infill of iron bars in between.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery and rear wings on both sides of a patio, a lay-out typical of Curaçao and of Scharloo in particular. Specific value as part of a protec

properties.name: Scharlooweg 96, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Main building and rear section with patio. Main building: gable roof over rectangular floor plan, flat roof over front section and hipped roof over two-storey back room. Rear section: wing and additional structure on both sides of patio. Patio closed with arches. Front façade with three doors with fanlights and weather mouldings. Frieze above doors divided in three sections with decorated infill. Balustrade above frieze around roof terrace of front section. Triangular fronton with oculus behind terrace with central door to terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic ornamentation of the front façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Scharlooweg 98, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure. Main section with front addition and rear wing. Hipped roofs over sala and back rooms of main section, gable roof over front section. All hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade: windows with moulded tympanums on façades of main section and front addition. Front addition with triangular fronton with medallion and infill with date '1878' above single door. Dentate quoins on corners. Pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic front addition. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Schoenmakerstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-and-a-half storey corner structure. Part of row-house structure with Frederikstraat 101-103. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormer on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped separation wall and end gable with flat top end. Gable façade with window in gable top and door in core section, two windows in front and clamped door in rear gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery, a lay-out typical of Curaçao and scarce in this part of the town. Ditto, because of the dormers and the funnel-shaped gables. Specific

properties.name: Schoonesteeg 5-7, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey block of two structures. Part of a compound of two blocks of three row-houses enclosing a small walled-in yard. One continuous gable roof with dormers on both sides of roof. Plain end gable. Each dwelling equipped with two dormers with tall windows and triangular frontons.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because it is part of a rare example of a compound of modest row-houses with a walled-in backyard. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 12-14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Front and rear sections with gable roofs perpendicular to one another. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Dormer on both sides of front-section roof. Profiled cornice on front façade only. Façade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Plain triangular moulded frontons above openings.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 15-17, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to alley. Roof with gable and hipped end. Doors and windows of front façade altered during renovation.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure ranging with alley. Gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over front gallery. Transverse gable roof over back room.. Funnel-shaped gables. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Dormers altered and cornice lowered during renovation to match cornice of adjacent property nr. 18.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure built against adjacent properties and ranging with street. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Front façade with profiled cornice, door and window. Dormers, front door and window altered during renovation.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Part of a block of five row-houses with nrs. 2-10. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over front gallery. Front dormer with inward and outward curved gable top. Front façade with modestly profiled cornice and full- frontage horizontal band halfway the façade. Two clamped doors and window in the middle.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic mid-18th century gable with shoulders. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Curaçao.

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey corner structure ranging with street. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders. Front façade with small cornice, door and window. Dormers, front door and window altered during renovation.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 5-9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure ranging with the alley. Gable roof over core area and slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Roof with eaves. Funnel-shaped gables with top end made up of a small triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Two dormers with slant roofs on both sides of roof. Alley façade altered during renovation in 1994.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic gables and the roof with eaves sporadically found. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and front gallery typical of Cur
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Schrijnwerkerstraat 6-10, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure ranging with alley. Part of a block of five row-houses with nrs. 2-10. Gable roof over core area and slant roof over front and rear gallery. Gable with shoulders and curved end, knob ornament on top and date mark '1747'. Front façade with modestly profiled cornice and full-frontage horizontal band halfway the façade. Front façade and dormers altered during renovation in 1998.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic mid-18th century gable with shoulders. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao.

properties.name: Sebastopol
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-and-a-half storey structure with main building and additional structures in walled-in premises. Main building with two parallel gable roofs with dormers over core area, on three sides surrounded with adjoining slant roofs with roof with eaves over two-storey galleries. Funnel-shaped gables on front side with moulded curls at lower ends and inward curved top end with semicircular fronton with pinnacles and date mark '1742'. Ditto gables on rear side with small semicircular fronton and pinnacle above rectangular moulding. Front façade with horizontal band below shutter windows and ditto band above partly blind arcade with wooden fretwork infill.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical, scientific and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic 18th century funnel- shaped gables, the galleries on three sides and the arches on the ground floor. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as one

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 1, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan. Front façade ranging with alley. Façade laid out with three shutter windows on first floor and two clamped doors on both sides of window with shutter.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 10A, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Front façade ranging with street. Gable roof over core and slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top ends. Font façade with profiled cornice. Three windows on first floor. Two doors on both sides of central window on ground floor. Plain strips for weather mouldings above openings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure ranging with street. Gable roof over core and lean-to roof over rear gallery. Funnel- shaped gables with plain top ends. Font façade with profiled cornice. Two shutter windows on first floor with plain strips for weather mouldings. Full-frontage horizontal band above doors and window on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 2, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus in moulded star. Two dormers on both sides of roof, the eastern ones with slant roofs. Front façade with profiled cornice and full- frontage horizontal band. Façade laid-out in four vertical axes with shutter windows on first floor and three shutter doors and one ditto window on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 31-33, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half corner structure. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over font and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end and oculus. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Front façade lay-out not original.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, font and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Town planning value because of its location on the corner of Sebastopolstraat and the direction to Molenplein. Specific v
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 5-7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey block-shaped structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over all façades. Front façade laid out in five vertical axes with shutter windows on first floor and four doors and one window on ground floor. Fanlights above windows and doors with two-piece yellow and green glass panels and three-piece yellow, white and green glass panels respectively.
properties.monument_value: Town planning and architectural historical value because of a.o. the location on a corner of a widened section of Sebastopolstraat. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 6, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure ranging with street. Gable roofs over core and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top ends. Front façade with profiled cornice. Two- tiered pilaster on left corner with remnants of profiled top of pilaster on cornice on right corner. Plain strips for weather mouldings above doors on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 8, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Front façade ranging with street. Gable roof over core and lean-to roof over one-storey rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with plain top ends. Font façade with profiled cornice. Two windows on first floor. Two doors on both sides of central window on ground floor with plain strips for weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-and-a-half storey structure with rectangular floor plan. Gable roof over core area, slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Truncated gable with shoulders and knob ornament on top end. Three dormers on front side and two on rear side of roof. Typical profiled rounded cornice and ditto white painted corners with capital on front façade. Full-frontage short front terrace with pillared fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the truncated gables with knob ornament and the rounded corners of the cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sebastopolstraat z/n, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof over three-storey core, lean-to roofs against core over two-storey side galleries. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus. Rear balcony on columns with staircase to backyard. Two-storey square addition placed against southern gallery and covered with pyramidal roof, adjoining cistern in inner corner.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top ends and the balcony on columns. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear galler
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Seranostraat 11-13, Otrobanda
