properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof with eaves over rectangular floor plan. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and flat top end. Front façade with central clamped door and flanking windows with shutters.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional stone-built dwelling with gable roof and funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Seranostraat 15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Two parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan. Roofs equipped with cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Short front yard, fence with stone balustrade with central entrance. Rear addition.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Seranostraat 17, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan, adjoining slant roof over gallery on west side, built over half length of structure. Roof chimney. Funnel-shaped gables with flat top end. Front gable façade with central door.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional stone-built dwelling with gable roof and funnel-shaped gables. Ditto, because of the oven. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Seranostraat 25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey wooden structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge over rectangular front section, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest wooden dwelling with hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Seranostraat 31, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with main section and front addition. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over main section, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Later on built front addition with roof with hipped and gable end. Front door in gable façade and side windows. Flat cornice continuing on sides and gable of front addition.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs and front addition. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century, front addition first

properties.name: Seranostraat 35, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with T-shaped floor plan. Main rear section and front addition. Gable roof over one-and-a-half storey main section, gables with shoulders. Later on built one-storey front addition with lower gable roof. Flat cornice on sides, pilasters on corners. Front gable façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a stone-built dwelling with front addition. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century, front addition last

properties.name: Seranostraat 39, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over rectangular floor plan, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Projecting cornice over front façade, pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Cistern next to gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a stone-built dwelling with hipped roof and cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: Seranostraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure ranging with the street. Gable roof over core, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and flat top end and knob ornament. Modestly profiled cornice. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Semicircular step at front door.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Ditto because of the façades and the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Seranostraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with off-street location behind Seranostraat 7. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and flat top end. Front façade with door and window.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional stone-built dwelling with gable roof and funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sevillaanstraat 1-5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey block accommodating three small row- houses. One continuous gable roof with flat concrete tile roofing over core area and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with 20th century top end. Rear additions with transverse slant roofs over kitchen units with roof chimney. Front façade: central door with steps to street and flanking windows for each unit. Walled backyard with gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of sound 20th century low-cost row-houses with a traditional design and funnel-shaped gables. Ditto, because of the kitchens. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Sevillaanstraat 11, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel- shaped gables with flat top ends. Front façade with plain cornice and central door and flanking windows. Small window with shutter for access to sub-floor space. Short front terrace with stairs to street.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest dwelling with gable roof and funnel- shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Sint Martinus College
properties.characteristics: Two structures, part of St. Martinus College: A detached three-storey structure covered with a hipped roof. Façades with cornice and tall windows with arched fanlights. An oblong two-storey structure covered with two hipped roofs. Front façade with tall paired windows with arched fanlights. South façade with two-storey gallery.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the regular façade lay-out with paired arched windows and the balanced design of receding and protruding elements. Cultural historical value because of the local and religious history referring
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Sommelsdijkstraat 4, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties and ridge perpendicular to alley. Gable roof with rounded top end. Gable section of façade with heavy profiled mouldings and window above heavy cornice. Façade with one central window on first floor and pilasters on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the heavy profiled mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Spaansesteeg 22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to alley. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades. Front façade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and central door and flanking windows with plain full-frontage horizontal weather moulding on ground floor. East façade with external staircase to central door and flanking windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Monumental property with simple characteristic architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Spaansesteeg 3, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to alley. Gable roof over core area, adjacent slant roof over rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and truncated top end and knob ornament. Horizontal band connecting the shoulders. Dormer on both sides of roof. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. High stone wall around backyard with gate between pillars in middle of rear wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the 18th century inward and outward curved frontons of the dormers. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and rear gallery typical of Curaça

properties.name: Stadhuis
properties.characteristics: Detached three-storey structure with elongated floor plan and symmetrical set-up. Front section with hipped roofs over five pavilions with projecting central and corner pavilions. Rear section with one continuous hipped roof parallel to front section row of hipped roofs. Front façade laid out in two distinct layers: ground floor and first and second floor with columns over two-storeys in façade. Central portico on first floor with double stairs to square.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the application of the colossal order emphasized by the portico. Cultural historical value because as Parliament Building and Court of Justice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Surinamesteeg 10-20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One structure accommodating three one-storey dwellings. Compactly built against adjacent properties and ranging with alley. One continuous gable roof with three front and two rear dormers with slant roofs. Façade with six doors and three windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of the sporadically found roof with eaves. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Swaen
properties.characteristics: Large yard with main structure in back area and additional structures along west and east boundaries. Main structure accommodating three (originally) identical one-storey row- dwellings. Two parallel gable roofs over rectangular floor plan with three transverse gable roofs over front and rear additions. Left dwelling: second storey added and front addition replaced by balcony. Additional structures: cistern connected with two aqueducts to main structure; on west and east boundaries servants' quarters in elongated blocks, the latter with lean-to roof and roof chimneys.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic details such as gables, cornices, wooden fences, and pillars. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because it is one of the last remaining examples of small and modest dwe

properties.name: Tafelsteeg 1, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-storey unit, part of one structure originally accommodating three row-houses with nrs. 1-3-5, left are nrs. 1-3. Compactly built against adjacent properties and ranging with alley. Almost flat slant roof with higher end facing alley. Central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a simple dwelling in an alley connecting main roads. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Tafelsteeg 2-6, Punda
properties.characteristics: Almost alley-long, elongated structure accommodating three row-houses. Compactly built against adjacent properties and ranging with alley. One continuous gable roof. Three dormers with triangular fronton on both sides of roof. Façade with four windows and doors, three doors with separate upper and lower part.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a row of low-cost dwellings in an alley connecting main roads. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Tafelsteeg 3, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-storey unit, part of one structure originally accommodating three row-houses with nrs. 1-3-5, left are nrs. 1-3. Compactly built against adjacent properties and ranging with alley. Almost flat slant roof with higher end facing alley. Central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a simple dwelling in an alley connecting main roads. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: The Cathedral of Curaçao with Parish Hall
properties.characteristics: Large building complex made up of a cathedral with parish hall. Cathedral: basilica design with nave and aisles, two towers and choir closed at five sides. No transepts. Gable roof over nave and lean-to roofs over aisles. Towers covered with pyramidal roofs. Parish hall: large detached oblong two-storey structure with ridge parallel to square. Gable roof. Gable top in axis of front façade, arched door and windows laid out in thirteen axes.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the coherence of cathedral and parish hall. Ditto, because of the basilica concept and the elements referring to the gothic style. Cultural historical value as the Cathedral of Curaçao and

properties.name: Van de Brandhofstraat 12, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan with front and rear gallery laid out on a basement. Small hipped roof over rear wing with cistern. Front façade with cornice. Two doors and window opening to full-frontage balcony on first floor. Central door with flanking windows on ground floor. Full-frontage front terrace with stairs to garden.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Van de Brandhofstraat 8, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Typical steep gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roof over front and rear gallery. Front dormer with triangular fronton and 19th century top end. Front façade with small cornice and central door and windows on both sides. Stairs to front garden.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Van de Brandhofstraat 9-10, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached cube-shaped two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over core area, front and rear gallery. Front façade with profiled cornice with dentils and fluted pilasters on corners. Four windows on first floor. Front terrace with fan-shaped stairs to front yard with stone wall side fences and pillared front fence. Full-frontage front balcony with staircase and ditto rear balcony added during restoration in 1929.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as an example of a 19th century cube-shaped dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Van Lennepstraat 1-5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached corner structure with main and secondary structure with north- and eastward facing front facades. Two-storey main structure with hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over facades. Front façade: windows with weather moulding and plastered flat frame above a plastered triangle with tassel ornament. One-storey secondary structure with hipped roof over rectangular floor plan.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic plastered ornamentation around the windows of the main building. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Van Raderstraat 2A-4, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with elongated main building and additions. Main building: gable roof over structure with one-and-a-half storey and basement. Five dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Cornice and horizontal band over façades. Large door in basement opening to Waaigat. Additions include a cistern and two one-storey additions with hipped roofs on east façade, and a one-storey elongated addition with gable roof on north side closed with small structure with transverse hipped roof.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a mixed-use structure with dwelling and warehouse on Waaigat. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Van Raderstraat 6-18, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached elongated structure with ridge parallel to alley accommodating six row-houses in two sections. Northern section: four units with gable roof and four dormers on both sides of roof. Southern section: two units with identical features and higher ridge. One full-frontage plain cornice over facades of both sections. Front façade ranging with alley with six doors and three windows, and two doors with steps and two windows respectively.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of low-cost housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Van Raderstraat 9-23, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Concrete-built structure with large street frontage. Two storeys with low attic. Type of original roof unknown. Front façade with symmetrical lay-out in eleven axes with shutter doors and windows. Large arched gate to back yard below window in central axis. Three windows and two doors with wooden balconies on both sides of central axis on first floor. Three doors and two windows on both sides of central gate on ground floor. Full-frontage horizontal bands above openings of ground and first floor. Band elevated above gate interrupted by rectangular moulding.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a unique example of a typical gate-building. Cultural historical value because it is the first known example of an apartment building on the island. Architectural historical value because it is one of the oldest examples

properties.name: Van Walbeecksteeg 1-3, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure. Three parallel gable roofs over rectangular floor plan. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and oculus in star decoration. Front façade with profiled cornice and central door with flanking windows. Structure is seriously disturbed because west façade is covered by a full-frontage wall built over two storeys.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of traditional low-cost dwellings with gable roofs and funnel-shaped gables. Architectural historical value because of the typical star decoration around the oculus, and the profiled cor
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Van Walbeecksteeg 15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey corner structure. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Back room with lean-to roof leaning to wall of premises. No cornice. Front façade with door and window, gable façades with window.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional low-cost dwelling with gable roof and funnel-shaped gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Van Walbeecksteeg 2, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with façades ranging with alley. Flat roof over rectangular floor plan. Two-storey rear addition with slant roof. Plain cornice over front façade. Door and two clamped windows on ground floor, three shutter windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditional dwelling located in a narrow alley. Architectural historical value as one of the few examples of a dwelling covered with a flat roof in the historic inner city. Specific
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Van Walbeecksteeg 4-6, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Front façade ranging with alley. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Plain gables, funnel-shaped gable on west side. Plain cornice with roof-tile gargoyle over front façade. Two doors on both sides of window on ground floor, two windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a simple dwelling with a funnel-shaped gable and a plain cornice in a densely built-up area of Otrobanda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Villa Colombia
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey dwelling. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Slant roof over front gallery. Marble tablet above front door with inscription 'Villa Colombia 74-79'. Cornice over all façades. Front façade ranging with street, central shutter door and flanking shutter windows, pilasters on corners.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a typical example of a traditional dwelling with a hipped roof and a gallery. Ditto because of a tablet on the façade with name of the house and original house number. Specific value as part of a p

properties.name: Villa Legal
properties.characteristics: Detached group of two structures with corridor in between and connected by continuing cornice only. Hipped roofs over core and rear gallery. Hipped roof perpendicular to street for smaller structure. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade: continuing cornice and corner pilasters, panelled shutter doors and windows and panel with inscription 'Villa Legal'. Cistern with slant roof in backyard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of such elements as a.o. the hipped roofs with cement hips, ridges and finials, the profiled cornice and weather mouldings and the shutter doors and windows. Architectural historical and cultural historical value bec
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Villa Margarita
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with a symmetrical set-up. Two parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan, transverse hipped roofs over rear wings and hipped roof over closing rear addition. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with three panelled shutter doors and portico. Triangular fronton with decorated oval medallion, supported by two caryatides resting on pillars of front fence. Short front terrace with stairs on ends.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spaciously set up stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, rear wings, portico and oven. Ditto, because of its soundness and the rare neo-classicist portico with caryatides. Ditto, as one of a ser

properties.name: Villa Maria
properties.characteristics: Detached block-shaped structure laid out on an elevated platform. Main section with portico and rear section with side wings enclosing a patio. Cistern under rear section. Two parallel hipped roofs over main section, transverse hipped roofs over side wings. Patio exit with U-shaped staircase to backyard. Side facades: eight shutter windows with triangular fronton and pilasters with block pattern on main floor and six doors to former servants' quarters in substructure. Front façade: portico with triangular fronton on Doric frieze with triglyphs, supported by fluted Doric columns. Quoins with block pattern on corners. Steep fan-shaped staircase to front yard.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a monumental example of a Neo-Greek mansion following American counterparts. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Villa Rosa
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure. Two hipped roofs with ridges parallel to street. Cement hips and ridges with finials. Front façade with central panelled shutter door and flanking shutter windows with profiled weather mouldings. Above front door: name of building and year 1911 applied in plasterwork.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as a characteristic example of early 20th century architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Villa San Ramon
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure laid out on elevated platform. Front section and rear section with two patio's. Hipped roofs over sala and front gallery. Rear gallery and side wings form wider U-shaped floor plan around patio with columns. Adjoining ditto structure around second patio. Dormers on hipped ends of roofs on east and west side. Profiled cornice over façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with decorated portico supported by double columns, three shutter doors opening to full- frontage front terrace with fan-shaped stairs. Date and text '1889' and 'Villa San Ramon' on gate pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the symmetrical set-up with portico and characteristic elements and details. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with sala, front and rear gall

properties.name: Villa Sixta
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof over main block. Central front addition with gable roof and U-shaped wooden front balcony supported by plain columns. Two winding stairs to balcony. Façades with profiled heavy cornice. All windows equipped with moulded frames with arched fanlights. Dentate quoins on corners. Typical wooden bridge structure as a side addition on the first floor. Five arched lattice windows with herringbone pattern on front side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the typical symmetrical design, the characteristic front addition with balcony and stairs and the decoration of windows and corners. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Vissteeg 2-8, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-storey elongated corner structure accommodating four row-houses. One continuous roof with hipped end on corner. Four roof chimneys on front side. Plain cornice over exposed façades. Front façade with clamped door with doorstep and clamped window for each unit. Short strip of stone pavement over full frontage of front façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of low-cost row-housing in an alley connecting main roads. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Vissteeg 3-9, Punda
properties.characteristics: One-storey elongated structure of four row-houses and built against neighbouring properties. One continuous gable roof interrupted by funnel-shaped gables projecting over roof. Plain cornice over façades. Front façade with four clamped doors and clamped windows on either left or right side.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of low-cost row-housing in an alley connecting main roads. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Vuurtoren Klein Curaçao (Lighthouse Klein Curaçao)
properties.characteristics: Lighthouse complex situated in the centre of the island of Klein Curaçao. Symmetrical lay-out with lighthouse positioned on semicircular structure flanked with two identical dwellings. Semicircular structure: cistern on ground floor, corridor with flat roof on first floor. Dwellings: dwellings on first floor with gable roofs, storehouse in basements with arched openings. Oven with chimney (one left) for dwellings. East-west axis with staircase on west side to first floor terrace giving access to dwellings and lighthouse, and staircase on east side to corridor of semicircular structure. Low circular platform holding former flag post south of complex.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a unique lighthouse complex dating from the 19th century. Architectural historical value because of the meticulous set-up and details. Ditto, because of the symmetrical lay-out influenced by the ne

properties.name: Waterfort
properties.characteristics: Large fortification at entrance of Sint Annabaai opposite Riffort in Otrobanda. Irregular fortification strip following the coastline from Sint Annabaai to Marichi. Structure accommodates one continuous shooting gallery laid out above mutually connected vaulted spaces used as casemates and batteries. Staircase, two chimneys and baking oven.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as part of a series of fortifications dating from the 1820's. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Werfstraat 6, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with main section and two rear wings on both sides of an inner court closed with a cistern. Gable roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries on three sides of core. Inward and outward curved gables with arched top ends and pinnacles. High cornice with dentils and drapery with tassels, continuing on façade of exposed south wing. Front façade laid out in four axes with windows on first floor and two doors and flanking windows on ground floor. Gate to south wing. Full-frontage front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the characteristic 18th century inward and outward curved gables of the main building and the passages in the interior with inward and outward curved arches. Architectural historical and cultural historical v
properties.construction_period: Before 1744, restoration and additions in 1861 and

properties.name: Werfstraat 8, Scharloo
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Typical steep hipped roof with dormers over core area, adjoining slant roofs over galleries on three sides of core. Additions: one-storey structure and tower with gable roofs on northern, and ditto structure with hipped roof on eastern boundary of premises. Gable roofs with eaves on dormers and on additional structure. Full-frontage front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core and galleries. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 1, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached three-storey symmetrical double structure with ridges perpendicular to square. Two parallel gable roofs with eaves on exposed side. Funnel-shaped gables with classical top end. Later on added front gallery. Profiled cornice over front and side façade of gallery. Front façade laid out in five vertical axes with glass windows on first and shutter windows on second floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the late- 17th / early-19th century funnel-shaped gables, the later on added gallery typical of Punda and the symmetrical façade lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 14-16, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge of front section parallel to square. Hipped roofs over T-shaped floor plan; flat roofs over additions in inner corners of T. Cornice over façades, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade with full-frontage decorated triangular fronton above projecting cornice. Façade laid out in five axes. Windows and central portico with triangular frontons. Plinth on both sides of portico.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the balanced symmetrical lay-out of the façades, the classicist decorations of the front façade in particular and the prominent location at Wilhelminaplein. Cultural historical value because it was built by t

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 19-23, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two structures on lot stretched between Wilhelminaplein and Windstraat. Wilhelminaplein: three-storey structure with gable roof. Asymmetrical funnel-shaped gable laid out in three axes with windows on first and second floor. Windstraat: two- storey structure with gable roof over core area and adjoining slant roof over gallery. Dormer with triangular fronton and date '1760'. Typical frieze divided in four panels below first-floor windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the balanced lay-out of Wilhelminaplein façade and the typical frieze on Windstraat façade. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 2, Punda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with U-shaped floor plan. Main building and two side wings at front side; gallery built against inner façades of U-shape. Hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges over main section and wings, lean-to roofs over gallery. Profiled cornice over façades of main section and wings. Original structure with one-storey set-up; second floor added on main section and wings in 1934 and 1940 respectively.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the U- shaped set-up with a gallery on inner sides of the U-shape. Cultural historical value because this was the former Wilhelminaschool. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 25, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure. Hipped roof over almost square floor plan. Dormers on front and rear side of roof. Front façade with cornice and three tall windows divided by pentice in upper and lower section.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the balanced façade lay-out. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Wilhelminaplein 2A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to square. Steep gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel-shaped gables with rustic work finishing of gable façade. Windows on ground and first floor separated by two horizontal bands on exposed façades. Front façade laid out in five axes with Art Deco style central section flanked with two windows on both floors. Pentice above entrance.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the regular façade lay-out and the Art Deco style entrance section. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Willemstraat 1, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over front façade, plain cornice over side and rear façades. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Willemstraat 25, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade with plain cornice and central clamped door with two ditto windows on both sides. Rear addition with slant roof and chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest urban dwelling. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Willemstraat 4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges over rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over front façade, plain cornice over side and rear façades; pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Full-frontage horizontal band above openings continuing beyond front façade over side gates, one gate with triangular floor plan.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the front façade with cornice, band and pilasters and gate with triangular floor plan. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Willemstraat 7, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Dormer on both sides of roof. Front façade with two doors and three windows. Rear addition with chimney.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Willemstraat 9, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over rectangular floor plan. Funnel- shaped gables with 19th century top end. Front façade with profiled cornice and central door opening with two window openings on both sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest traditional dwelling with funnel- shaped gables and cornice. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Willemstraat11-13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to roof. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials. Cornice over façades, fluted tiered pilasters with base on corners. Front façade laid out in three vertical axes with windows on first floor and doors on ground floor. Horizontal moulded bands above openings of ground and first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the regular façade lay-out emphasized by the openings in vertical axes and the profiled mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Windstraat 11, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Façade ranging with alley. Gable roof with eaves and dormers with inward and outward curved gables. Wooden full-frontage gallery on first floor covered with slant roof with overhang. Gallery provided with eight segmental arches supported by wooden pillars and closed with cantilevered wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the dormers with 18th century inward and outward curved gables and the later on added front gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Windstraat 13, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Façade ranging with alley. Gable roof with eaves over main section. Wooden full-frontage gallery on first floor covered with lean-to roof with overhang. Gallery was provided with three flat arches supported by wooden pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the later on added front gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Windstraat 15A/B, Punda
properties.characteristics: Three-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Façade ranging with alley. Gable roof over main section. Dormer with slant roof with overhang. Funnel- shaped gables, eastern one with triangular fronton above rectangular moulding. Wooden full-frontage two-tiered gallery on first and second floor covered with lean-to roof with overhang. Gallery provided with six flat arches supported by wooden pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the funnel- shaped gable with 18th century top end and the later on added front gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Windstraat 19-23, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to alley. Façade ranging with alley. Gable roof with dormers over main section. Plain funnel-shaped gables. Full-frontage modernized gallery on ground and first floor covered with slant roof. Gallery provided with five bays on first floor and six openings on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the later on added front gallery typical of Punda. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Windstraat 2, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Façades ranging with alley. Gable roof with pointed gable on one side. Dormer with slant roof on front side. Front façade with cornice and two full-frontage horizontal bands. Four tall windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because a.o. the regular façade lay-out with sash windows and bands. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Windstraat 25A, Punda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Typical steep gable roof with eaves parallel to alley. Two front dormers covered with gable roofs with eaves ranging with front façade. Later on added adjoining structures on rear side. Front façade with four clamped windows on first floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as one of the few existing examples with a façade appearance as was usual in the17th and 18th century before addition of front galleries were introduced; also because of the eaves rarely found here and the numbering marks of

properties.name: Winkelsteeg 10-22, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached complex with composite floor plan built on sloping terrain. 18th Century main building with three rear additions. Main building laid out on elevated platform. Gable roof over two-storey core area, adjoining slant roofs over surrounding galleries. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Inward and outward curved gables with semicircular top end and classical moulding. Front façade with central stairs with landing and stairs to balconies on both sides. Three adjoining rear additions with hipped roofs along Langestraat, the corner additions connected with main building with corridor on attic level.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the complicated assembly of structures reflecting a typical building history, the inward and outward curved gables, remnants of a former arched gallery and decorated rubble pavement. Architectural historical

properties.name: Witteweg 15, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge over rectangular floor plan. No cornice over façades. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Full- frontage short terrace. Front fence with concrete panels of circular ornaments between pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 16, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built structure with ridges parallel to street. Three hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Front façade with profiled cornice. Central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Full-frontage front terrace with stairs and spread balustrade. Stone wall fence on three sides of premises, gate in rear wall.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a concrete-built dwelling with hipped roof set-up with a traditional design. Ditto, because of the terrace and stone wall fences with gate. Specific value as part of a protected monum

properties.name: Witteweg 18, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey concrete-built structure with ridges parallel to street. Two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges over rectangular front and larger rear section. Roofs with eaves on all sides. Front façade with central door with doorstep and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest dwelling with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey concrete-built structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge over rectangular floor plan. No cornice over façades, slightly lifted eaves with fascia board instead. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Full- frontage short terrace. Front fence with concrete openwork panel infill between pillars.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 21, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridge with finials over rectangular floor plan. Front façade with profiled cornice and central door with doorstep and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 23, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two hipped roofs with cement hips over rectangular floor plan. Cornice over front and side façades. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest dwelling with a hipped roof. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with truncated top end and knob ornament. Cornice over front façade, dentate quoins on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Full-frontage short front terrace with stairs on ends.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area, front and rear galleries typical of Curaçao. Ditto, because of the façades and mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 26, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with oculus and truncated top end and knob ornament. Cornice over all façades, decorated pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Full-frontage short front terrace with stairs on one end.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of the floor plan with core area, front and rear galleries typical of Curaçao. Ditto, because of the façades and mouldings. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 30, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two hipped roofs with cement hips over rectangular floor plan. Small cornice over front and wider cornice over side façades. Front façade with two doors and one windows. Full-frontage short front terrace with stairs on one end.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a dwelling with hipped roof set-up with a traditional design. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 37, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey corner structure with ridge parallel to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan, adjoining slant roof over later on added rear gallery. Cornice over front and side façades. Front façade with door and small flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a modest stone-built dwelling with hipped roof and rear gallery set-up with a traditional design. Ditto, because of the oven with chimney. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape

properties.name: Witteweg 42, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Five parallel hipped roofs of different size and adjoining flat roof over rectangular floor plan. Roofs equipped with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over all façades, on front façade with dentils, and pilasters on corners. Front façade with full- frontage triangular fronton with dentils in top mouldings. Three panelled shutter doors opening to full-frontage short terrace. External oven on rear corner. Stone wall fence on three sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditionally set up spacious dwelling with hipped roofs and oven. Ditto, because of the relative large size of the dwelling in this part of the town. Specific value as part of a pr
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Witteweg 44, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel hipped roofs, the rear one slightly larger, and side wings. Roofs equipped with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over all façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows. Full-frontage short terrace. External oven on rear corner. Stone wall fence on three sides.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a traditionally set up spacious dwelling with hipped roofs and oven. Ditto, because of the relative large size of the dwelling in this part of the town. Specific value as part of a pr
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Witteweg 45, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached structure made up of front and rear section. Ridges parallel to street. Front section: two parallel hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan. Profiled cornice over front and side façades, continuing on façades of rear section. Fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with three doors. Pillared front fence with gates on ends. Rear section: Gable roof over one-and-a-half storey structure. Three dormers on both sides of roof. Pointed gables.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs and gable roof. Ditto, because of the mouldings and the fence. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Witteweg 46, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with a symmetrical set-up. Rectangular front section covered with two parallel hipped roofs and adjoining square rear section with pyramidal roof. Profiled cornice over façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with portico. Plain triangular fronton supported by caryatides on base. Full frontage short front terrace. Pillared fencing continues as stone walls to sides. Forms twin structure with Witteweg 48, however with caryatides of a different design.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, adjoining larger rear section and a portico, and because of the rare neo-classicist portico with caryatides. Ditto, as one of a series
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Witteweg 47-51, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Symmetrically set up small complex with main building with deep setback and flanking front pavilions on both sides of patio. Main building: three hipped roofs parallel to street over rectangular floor plan. Front façade with cornice with dentils and drapery ornamentation. Central door and flanking windows with triangular frontons. Front pavilions: basically identical structures with hipped roofs perpendicular to street. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Central gate between pillars connecting the front pavilions.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, and because of the mouldings. Ditto, because of the pavilions enclosing a patio with the main building. Specific value as part of a pr
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Witteweg 48, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with a symmetrical set-up. Rectangular front section covered with two parallel hipped roofs and adjoining square rear section with pyramidal roof. Profiled cornice over façades, pilasters on corners, block pattern in plaster finishing of side façades of front section. Front façade with portico. Plain triangular fronton with oval medallion, supported by caryatides on base. Full frontage short front terrace. Pillared fencing continues as stone walls to sides. Forms twin structure with Witteweg 46, however with caryatides of a different design.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs, adjoining larger rear section and a portico. Ditto, because of the rare neo-classicist portico with caryatides. Ditto, as one of a ser
properties.construction_period: Last quarter of 19th / first quarter of 20th century

properties.name: Witteweg 50, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan and adjoining wider rear section. Rear addition with chimney. Cornice over façades, two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows on first floor and three doors on ground floor (balcony and staircase not original). Full-frontage terrace with stairs on ends. Pillared fence with gates on ends. Two small one-storey additional structures with gable roofs in backyard. Façades ranging with back street Rembrandstraat.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spaciously laid-out two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the additional buildings as an example of modest dwellings which form a part of a larger dwelling. Specific valu

properties.name: Witteweg 52, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Large detached two-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan (adjoining wider rear section collapsed). Cornice over façades, two-tiered fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with three tall windows on first floor and three doors on ground floor. Full-frontage terrace with stairs on ends. Pillared fence with gates on ends. Two small one-storey additional structures with gable roofs in backyard. Façades ranging with back street Rembrandstraat.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a spaciously laid-out two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the additional buildings as an example of modest dwellings which form a part of a larger dwelling. Specific valu

properties.name: Witteweg 54, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with a symmetrical set-up. Two parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan, adjoining slant roof over rear gallery. Profiled cornice over façades, pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows and portico. Plain triangular fronton with decorated oval medallion, supported by two Tuscan columns resting on pillars of front fence. Short front terrace with stairs on ends.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs and portico. Ditto, because of the rare neo-classicist portico with caryatides. Ditto, as one of a series of four basically similar pro

properties.name: Witteweg 56, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with a symmetrical set-up. Two parallel hipped roofs over front section and ditto roofs over adjoining wider rear section. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice over façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Full frontage short front terrace with quarter circle stairs on ends. Pillared fencing with central gate.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up spacious stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the stairs of the terrace. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 60, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached structure with front and rear section with hipped roofs perpendicular to each other. Roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Two storey concrete-built rear addition with slant roof flanked with a covered open wooden balcony and a closed wooden addition supported by columns. Profiled cornice over façades, pilasters on front corners. Front façade with three doors opening to full-frontage short front terrace with quarter circle stairs on ends. Front fence with two gates on ends. Gate with clamped door and pointed lintel in rear fence.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up spacious stone-built urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the concrete-built rear addition. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 63, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Two parallel hipped roofs of different length with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over façades, small pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the concrete-built rear addition. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Second half of 19th century / first quarter of 20th

properties.name: Witteweg 65, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Two parallel hipped roofs of different length with cement hips and ridges with finials. Profiled cornice with console moulding over façades and fluted, tiered pilasters on corners. Front façade with shutter window and two shutter doors opening to (new) front balcony on first floor, central shutter door and ditto flanking windows on ground floor. Profiled weather mouldings above openings. Front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the mouldings, pilasters and fencing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 66-68, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached assembly of structures on pointed street corner. Main structure: two storeys covered with two hipped roofs, the rear one longer and cut following the street angle. Rear addition with slant roof. Cornice with lambrequin frieze over facades. Front facade with shutter doors and windows laid out in three axes. Front balcony over full- frontage terrace with stairs on ends. Corner structure: one- and-a-half storey covered with flat roof used as terrace with wooden balustrade of diagonal boards. Front façade with clamped central door and ditto flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the mouldings. Ditto, because of its setting and assembly of masses. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 67, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to street. Two parallel hipped roofs over rectangular floor plan. Plain cornice over façades. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. (Original roofing replaced by corrugated cement sheets)
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as one-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 69A/B, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan. Two small rear additions. Cornice over façades, pilasters with block pattern on corners. Front façade laid out in three axes with central panelled shutter door with flanking shutter windows on first floor and three ditto doors with weather mouldings on ground floor. Wooden cantilevered balcony. Short front terrace.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as two-storey urban dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the mouldings, pilasters and fencing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 77, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Small detached one-storey structure with a deep setback from the street. Gable roof over main section, adjoining slant roof over rear addition. Truncated gable with knob ornaments. Small addition with on front corner.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up stone-built dwelling with pointed gables. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 79, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridges parallel to street. Three parallel hipped roofs. Shorter rear roof. All roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials. Cornice over façades, fluted pilasters on corners. Front façade with central door and flanking windows with weather mouldings. Short front terrace. Rear terrace with cistern.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as a traditionally set up stone-built dwelling with hipped roofs. Ditto, because of the cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Witteweg 81, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey concrete-built corner structure with ridge perpendicular to the street. Hipped roof over rectangular floor plan, adjoining lower hipped roof over front addition. Basement with storage and cistern. Rain gutter around roofs. Front porch covered with slant roof and supported by two fluted columns. Almost original interior.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an early example of concrete building and as an example of the architecture in the second quarter of the 20th century. Monumental ensemble value because more dwellings dating from the same period c

properties.name: Witteweg 9-13, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey corner structure accommodating three dwelling units. Hipped roof with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan. Cornice over façades. Front façade with door and window for each unit. Plain addition with pyramidal roof and cistern with slant roof in backyard
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value as an example of a modest dwelling with hipped roof, kitchen addition and cistern. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Wolkstraat 7, Punda
properties.characteristics: Four-storey structure with large frontage built against neighbouring properties. Structure consists of two properties; open space in between later on covered. Recessed fourth storey. Three full-frontage wooden balconies. Second and third floor originally with three and two doors, fourth floor with four and two doors in western and eastern section respectively.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the regular lay-out of the front façades and because of the wooden balconies. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 1-3, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey corner structure ranging with the alley. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 19th century top end and oculus in star moulding. Front façade with cornice laid out in three axes with three shutter windows on first floor and two doors and window on ground floor. Tablet with inscription '1835 332' on façade.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the prominent location on a corner and because of the 19th century gable ends. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear ga

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 14, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: One-storey structure built against neighbouring properties. Ridge parallelto street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormer on both sides of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders, 18th century top end and pineapple top ornament. Front façade central panelled door and flanking shutter windows. (During restoration small plain cornice replaced by firm, profiled one to match altered design of nr.16).
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical, esthetical and art value because of the 18th century gable ends with top ornamentation. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. S

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 18-20, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey corner structure with ridges parallel to alley. Three parallel gable roofs over core area and smaller front and rear gallery. Pointed gables with oculus, core section with oculus in moulded star. Front façade with plain cornice laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and central door and flanking windows on ground floor. Stone tablet above front door with text '1852 no 347
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the three characteristic adjacent gables on the side façades. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaç

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 2-4, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with composite floor plan, on three sides surrounded with alleys. Rectangular floor plan successively covered with two parallel hipped roofs, gable roof with dormers and rear gallery, and two transverse gable roofs. Gable roof with funnel-shaped gables and triangular top end. Full-frontage wooden balcony over front façade covered with lean-to roof. Balustrade of wooden fretwork and splendidly decorated upper section. Rear fence with two firm gates with clamped doors.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the complicated assembly of structures reflecting the complex building history. Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic wooden balcony. Specific value as part of a pro
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 22-24, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached corner structure with addition forming one complex with Gasthuisstraat 5. Main section: one storey; gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Gables with shoulders and top end of triangular fronton. Two dormers on both sides of roof. Gate to backyard. Two-storey corner addition with slant roof over square floor plan and adjacent one-storey addition with slant roof and chimney. Gasthuisstraat 5: gable roof with dormers over small one- storey structure.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value increased because of the prominent location on a corner. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 26-28, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to alley. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders and 19th century top end. Two dormers on both sides of roof. front façade laid out in three axes with windows on first floor and two doors and window on ground floor. Full-frontage horizontal bands above openings.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic funnel-shaped gables wit 19th century top end. Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 30-38, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached one-storey structure with ridge perpendicular to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over three galleries. Two dormers with slant roofs on both sides of gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with semicircular fronton as top end. Front façade ranging with street; door flanked with one and two windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core and galleries on three sides, typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 42, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Detached two-storey structure with ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front, and part of the rear gallery. Two dormers on front side and one on rear side of roof. Funnel-shaped gables with semicircular fronton as top end. Front façade laid out in four axes with windows on first floor and door and three windows on ground floor with full-frontage horizontal band. Rainwater transport from front roof gutter along gable to rear gutter and vertical gutter to (removed) cistern.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of the characteristic funnel-shaped gables and the complicated rainwater gutter system. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 43, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached one-storey structure with ridge parallel to roof. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Dormer with slant roof on both sides of gable roof. Funnel-shaped gable with triangular fronton as top end. Front façade with central door and flanking windows.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 44 and 56-74, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Assembly of structures forming a corral. Two main buildings (nr.44) and elongated block of secondary units (56-74). Main buildings: gable roofs over two-storey structures with ridges perpendicular to each other and separated by a small corridor. Open gallery in corridor space with block of stairs to front court. Adjacent wooden balcony supported by columns. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end and triangular fronton above rectangular moulding respectively. Monumental entrance with two pillars topped with ball ornaments. Secondary structure ranging with Zaantjessteeg accommodating ten small one-storey row-houses. One continuous lean-to roof and ditto gable roof, each covering five units, now turned into small housing units.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and esthetical value because of a.o. the characteristic assembly of large and small structures, the 19th century funnel-shaped gables and the wooden balcony with columns. Architectural historical and cultural historical value as o
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments (mid-19th

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 45, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached structure with main ridge parallel to street. Gable roof over two-storey core area, lean-to roofs over one-storey front and rear gallery. Transverse roof with hipped end over two-storey structure adjoining the main core area. Cornice over façades of core area sections.
properties.monument_value: Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 5, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two-storey corner structure built against neighbouring properties. Gable roof over core area, adjoining slant roofs over front and rear gallery. Funnel-shaped gables with shoulders,19th century top end and rhombic oculus. Front façade with cornice laid out in three axes with three shutter windows on first floor and two doors and window on ground floor.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical and cultural historical value because of a.o. the floor plan with core, front and rear gallery typical of Curaçao. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 6, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached structure covered with lean-to roof. Front façade with plain horizontal end. Central shutter window flanked with two panelled shutter doors with weather mouldings. Full-frontage profiled horizontal band over façade.
properties.monument_value: Property set up inn a simple and characteristic architecture. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 63-69 and 73-77, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Two detached elongated structures accommodating small one- storey row-houses with front facades ranging with alley. Monumental gate to back yard. Zaantjessteeg 63-69: structure of two dwelling units covered with gable roof. Funnel-shaped gables with 19th century top end. Adjoining two units with lean-to roof and roof chimneys on rear side. Zaantjessteeg 73-77: structure of three dwelling units covered with one continuous gable roof. Gables with plain top end. One chimney left of original three chimneys.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value as examples of low-cost housing. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments

properties.name: Zaantjessteeg 8-12, Otrobanda
properties.characteristics: Semi-detached two-storey main structure with side addition. Two hipped roofs with cement hips and ridges with finials over rectangular floor plan. Adjoining slant roof with eaves over two-storey addition, its side ranging with front façade of main structure. Front façade with cornice and two doors on first floor and door and window on ground floor. Smaller windows on façades of additional structure.
properties.monument_value: Architectural historical value because of a.o. the prominent corner location. Specific value as part of a protected monumental townscape.
properties.construction_period: Not listed in Register of Monuments
